24a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du gzhal yas khang lhag par mos par byas la/ de'i dkyil du bdag nyid bdag med ma dang mnyam par 'dus pa'i zhal brgyad pa'i gzugs kyis de kho na nyid gsum brjod pas/ rang rang gi las nges par byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs gsal
24a4(rgyud 'grel): por bltas la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /nyal dus su yang dga' bral mdza' can gyi rnal 'byor mngon sum du byas
24a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ gnyid log par bya'o/ /sad pa'i dus su yang/ puk+ka sI la sogs pa lha mo bzhis glus bskul bas langs par bsam mo/ /langs nas kyang de lta bu nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /ji srid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob kyi bar du nyin re bzhin bya'o zhes
24a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gal te phyag bcu drug pa la mos par byed na/ gzhal yas khang de nyid du phyag drug pa 'am phyag bzhi pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de la bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sa bon dang/ phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni pha rol tu
24a7(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa drug go /stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas zhal gsum mo/ /sku dang rtsa ba'i zhal ni 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra'o/ /g.yon ni dmar po'o/ /g.yas ni zla ba'i 'od lta bu'o/ /spyan gsum pa skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang
24b1(rgyud 'grel): po ni rdo rje'o/ /phyag gnyis pa ni gri gug go /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa'o/ /phyag gnyis pa na dril bu'o/ /phyag lhag mas ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la mnyam par 'khyud pa khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyis ro mnan pa'o/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni mdog sngon mo ste/ bdag med ma ltar rgyan sna
24b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang gi bdag po gnyug ma'i mgul nas 'khyud par bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin bdud nges par bcom pa'i rnam par dag pas phyag bzhi ste/ 'dam skyes sngon po dang 'dra'o/ /spyan gsum pa/ /ro rnam par
24b3(rgyud 'grel): gnon pa/ skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis mnan pa'o/ /g.yas kyi dang po na ni rdo rje'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na ni mi'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis gang ba'o/ /phyag lhag mas ni rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma ni sku mdog sngon mo ste/ phyag g.yas dang
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la ni gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyu'i rdo rje 'dzin 'di dag gi phyag mtshan dang 'khor la yang 'bras bu bzhin te/ khyad par zla ba'i gdan dang/ zla ba'i 'od bsgom par bya'o/ /phyag drug pa dang/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal brgyad pa med na yang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rang rang gi
24b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi pa spu'i bu gar gzhug par bya'o/ /oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni phyag drug pa'i 'o/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la b+hyo hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni phyag bzhi pa'i'o/ /lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/ /dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje/ /ye shes bsam yas
24b6(rgyud 'grel): brnyes gyur pas/ /yang dag rjes gnang thob gyur nas/ /bris kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal min/ /bdag gis 'di bris nongs pa rnams/ /ston ka'i dri med 'od 'dra ba'i/ /yid dang ldan pa'i mkhas rnams dang/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bzod par 'os/ /khrag mthung sgrub thabs byas pa las
24b7(rgyud 'grel): legs pa bdag gis gang bsags pa/ /des ni 'jig rten ma lus rnams/ kun mkhyen ye shes pa rol son/ /dpal rnal 'byor pa yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kun tu bzang po dang/ lo 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he ru ka sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ he ru ka'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khrag 'thung 'jig rten gsum las
25a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /dpal ldan bla ma mgon btud nas/ /de yi sgrub thabs zhi ba ni/ /gsung pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bya/ /dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /bdag med ma yis mgul nas 'khyud/ /'khor lo la sogs rgyan dang ldan/ /spyan gsum stag gi sham thabs can/
25a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud 'dir bsgom pa la dbang ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas tho rangs langs te/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM bltas te/ de'i 'od zer gyis dpal he ru ka mngon du byas la/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga yis yang dag par mchod par bya'o//
25a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas te/ byang chub chen por sems bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad bde ba la dgod par 'dod pa'i byams pa dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral
25a5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod pa'i snying rje dang/ bde ba nges par rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'i rang bzhin ston ka'i dri ma med pa nam mkha' i dkyil ltar gnyis su
25a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ye shes chul gcig pa'i stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas langs te nam mkha' i phyogs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM bltas te/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje lte ba la
25a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i nyi ma la hUM bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'od la nas 'thon te/ dpal he ru ka'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas nas de nyid du zhugs pa dang/ de yongs su gyur pa las dpal he ru ka pad+ma sna tshogs mdab ma can la ro'i steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa/ zhal
25b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon rdo rjes mtshon pa'i thod pa bsnams pa/ gar gyi stangs dang ldan pa stag gi sham thabs can spyi bor mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid mi'i mgo bo las byas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang/ rna bar 'od
25b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med kyi bdag nyid mi'i rus pa'i rna cha dang/ mgul par rin chen gyi rang bzhin mgul rgyan dang ldan pa/ lag pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin gdub bu dang ldan pa/ rked par don yod grub pa'i bdag nyid ska rags kyis brgyan pa/ skra'i mchod phyir thogs
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rkang gdub kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ bdag med ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i bdag med ma mgul nas 'khyud pa'o/ /de lta bur gyur par bdag nyid bsams la/ rna bar bdag
25b4(rgyud 'grel): med ma'o/ /mig ni rdo rje ma'o/ /sna la gsang ba'i go rI ma/ lce la chu'i rnal 'byor ma/ lus la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ yid la bdag med mas byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas spyi bor pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i lte ba la/ hi kha thur du bltas
25b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mgrin par pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa la oM gyen du bltas pa'o/ /snying gar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba la hUM kha thur du bltas pa'o/ /lte bar pad+ma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i steng aM kha gyen du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' lta bu'i ye
25b6(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o/ /chu dang 'o ma bsres pa lta bu ro mnyam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar nyi ma la rdo rje/ de'i lte bar hUM gi 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs
25b7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal he ru ka bkug la mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur cig ces gsol ba gdab bo/ /de dag gis bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pas dbang bskur bas bdag la mi bskyod pa mgon
26a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbu rgyan dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs thams cad kyis rang rang gi byang chub sems kyi rdzas kyis mchod par bsam mo/ /de nas mche pa gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che/ /sngags kyi me tog phreng bas
26a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /sha chen rab tu gsol mdzad pa/ /he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bya bas bstod par bya'o/ /de nas snying gar hUM yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje/ de'i 'og tu oM yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'i snod bskyed de/ de'i dbus su oM gyis mtshan pa'i go ku da
26a3(rgyud 'grel): ha na ma ra mu su bi la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzes bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dang/ pad+ma'i sbyor bas/ me 'bar ba des rdzas rnams bsres te bskol nas zhu bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du bltas te/ ye shes kyi nyi
26a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'bar ba/ ye shes sa bon de'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rtsi bkug nas/ dngos po de dag dang lhan cig par bya ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ges byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de nas hUM dkar po'i rang bzhin gyis lce
26a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs la/ bdag nyid de yis chim par bya'o/ /de nas snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM la bskor nas gnas pa'i/ /oM tre lOkyA k+Sha pa huM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge bcu gnyis kyis sngags kyis phreng ba mar me'i phreng ba ltar 'bar zhing
26a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba yid kyis bris te/ kog pa'i rim pa bzhin du/ mi 'gyur bar bzlas par bya'o/ /gung dang rgongs kyi dus su yang bdag nyid he ru ka'i rang bzhin du skad cig gis bskyed de/ de mig la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dang/ 'khor lo'i sgom pa dang/
26a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba dang/ bzlas pa la sogs pa byas te/ ji bzhin par gnas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ gtor ma btang ba la sogs pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus te/ skad cig mas lhar sprul pa ci bder gnas
26b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum bskyod pa'i/ /sgrub thabs bla med byas pa las/ /bsod nams gang zhig bsogs pa des/ /'jig rten rdo rje 'dzin par shog /dgyes pa rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
26b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po sa ha dza bi la sa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba len+d+ra ru tsi'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// (//man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ tri kra mo pa de
26b3(rgyud 'grel): sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pas thog mar rlung ma dang/ gnyis ma rtse sprang la tsaN+Da li shin tu drag yun thung bar sbar te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ spyan la sogs pa'i rtog pa
26b4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg go /de ltar yang nas yang du bsreg pa dang/ sbar bas phyi'i dngos po gang la dmigs shing bltas kyang 'bar zhing 'dar ba byung na sngags kyi rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te/ bsgom pa 'phro bcad la/ bde ba chen po phab la nor bu'i dkyil du srog gi rlung gzung la sems
26b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig tu shin tu bsgrims la yang dang yang du gtad do/ /de ltar gtad pa dang nor bu 'gags pa snyam byad cing mi bzod na/ rdo rje'i rked par sems bde ba la yang dang yang du gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang bde bas mi bzod pa dang/ rtsa bar bde ba la sems gtad/
26b6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gtad pa dang/ yang mi bzod pa dang/ lte bar bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa de yang mi bzod na/ de nas gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su sems gtad/ de ltar sems gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi nang du bde ba la sems
26b7(rgyud 'grel): gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar bstan pa dang yang bde ba mi bzod na snying gar bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa na bde bas mi bzod cing snying 'dar zhing sprug? pa snyam byed na/ yang gyen du bzhi
27a1(rgyud 'grel): cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang yang bde bas mi bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang bde bas yang mi bzod na bzhi cha gcig gis gnas su bde ba la sems
27a2(rgyud 'grel): gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang yang mi bzod na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig tu bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang/ yang bde ba la mi bzod na lkog mar bde ba la sems gtad de ltar gtad pa na/ bde ba mi bzod cing yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la
27a3(rgyud 'grel): sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang/ mi bzod pa snyam byed na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar yang gtad pa dang mi bzod pa snyam byed na/ skad 'gags pa snyam byed cing smra mi shes pa snyam byed pa na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi
27a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas su bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang/ yang mi bzod pa snyam byed na yang gyen du bzhi cha gcig gi gnas su bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang/ yang mi bzod pa snyam byed na smin mtshams phrag tu bde ba la sems gtad/ /de ltar
27a5(rgyud 'grel): gtad pa dang/ smyo ba 'am/ 'gyel pa 'am/ dngos po gang la dmigs shing bltas kyang smyos pa snyam byed na ye shes rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te/ 'phro bcad pa la gsang ba'i rim pa la bya'o/ /der yang sna sgor dbugs bsdams/ nang gi sems dang sems las byung bar
27a6(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad 'dus pas phyi rol gyi yul la mi rtog par/ nang gi sems kyi rtog pa'i byung tsher ci byung ba la mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgoms pa dang lus ras bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du yang zhing smig rgyu lta bu la sogs pa rtags lnga mngon sum du mthong bar
27a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa dang/ gsang ba'i rim pa mthar phyin pa yin te/ de bas na nang gi sems dang phyi'i yul thams cad dbyer mi phyed cing gnyis su med par mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgoms pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga rim gyis skyes na bde ba chen po thob bo/ /ro smad bshad?
27b1(rgyud 'grel): cing mi theg pa snyam byed cing/ 'grong gi 'phrag tu zug cing na thur du sel ba'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te/ de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir smin phrag tu bde ba la sems gtad do/ /de ltar gtad pa dang/ sna rus na ba dang/ mig rus na ba dang/ spyi gtsug na ba dang/ rna ba na zhing
27b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ur 'ur zer na gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te/ de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir lte bar bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar sems gtad pa dang/ lte bar zug cing spo ba snyam byed na/ me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin te/ de zhi bar bya
27b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir mgrin par bde ba la sems gtad/ kha chu spring cing skad 'gags pa snyam byed na/ lce'i dbang po la gnas pa'i rlung zin pas shin tu rgyas pa yin te/ de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying gar bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang snying gcu zhing sprugs pa snyam
27b4(rgyud 'grel): byed na/ rlung la gnas pa'i rlung zin pas rgyas pa yin/ de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nor bu'i dkyil du bde ba la sems gtad/ de ltar gtad pa dang lus kyi tshigs thams cad na zhing spring pa snyam byed cing lus thams cad la be ra ba langs na/ khyab byed kyi rlung zin pas rgyas
27b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin te/ de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba la rang bzhin med par bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgoms pa dang/ rgod snying 'dod cing ku co'i sgra 'don snying 'dod na shin tu rgyas pa bde ba la rgyas pa yin te/ shin tu yang bsgrims la bde ba la mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgoms
27b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang shin tu myos shing dran pa med cing rmongs na/ zhi gnas shas che ba yin te de med par bya ba'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad sgyu mar bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgoms pa dang sems rgod cing 'phro na sgyu ma mi dmigs par bsgom/ de ltar cha snyams nas yang dang yang du
27b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pas gsal ba rtog pa med pa skyes nas bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /gong ma de ltar bsgom pa'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma nyams sod pa'i phyir 'ong ba'i tshe brda bya'o/ /de ma shes na rtog pa med par bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgoms pa dang/ mkha' 'gro mas byin gyis brlab
28a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /'gro kun gsang sngags don ldan zhing/ /tshe 'di nyid la byang chub thob par shog /man ngag rim pa gsum pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po DoM ba he ru ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// (//go par byed pa'i snying po brgya pa'i ming bzhugs//)
28a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pra ti kar h+ri da sha ta ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa'i ming/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ci'i phyir phyag btsal zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ dga' ba bzhis rgyas pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje'i rnal 'byor mas bskor ba'o/ /sprul
28a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i dpal dang ldan pa/ /de'i phyir phyag btsal ba'o/ /slob dpon la yang phyag btsal ba'o/ /ci'i phyir phyag btsal zhe na/ rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi thugs su chud pa dang/ bde ba chen pos shin tuAng mdzes pa/ de yang slob dpon
28a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis slob ma la go bar byed pas na/ go bar byed pa'i snying po'o/ /de'i phyir slob dpon lnga phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas don gyi snying po bshad par bya ste/ kye rdo rje zhes bya ba zhi/ rang gi sems nyid kye'i rdo rje'o/ /ci'i phyir rang gi sems nyid yin zhe na/ rnam par rtog
28a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro/ /he ru ka'i ngo bo de la bri ba dang gang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de'ang don du na rang gi snying gar byang chub sems zla ba lta bu bsam mo/ /de las 'gro ba'i don du sprul pa sna tshogs spro ba dang/ bsdu
28a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ldan pa'i thig le yin te/ spro ba dang bsdu ba tsam yang mi dgos te/ thig le nyid du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya ste/ de la spro ba'i phyir ro/ /de ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin yang de nyid yin no/ /de nyid me mar rlung gis
28a7(rgyud 'grel): ma bskyod pa bzhin du bsgom mo/ /de gcig dang du ma bral zhing mi g.yo ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha zhes de la bya'o/ /mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i dga' ba bzhi'i ngo bo yang de yin no/ /de rtag tu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni nyon mongs pa thams
28b1(rgyud 'grel): cad spong byed do/ /gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin med par shes par bya ba yin gyi spang bar bya ba ma yin no/ /chos thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ thams cad kyi snying po nyid de la bya'o/ /stong pa nyid dang rang gi sems nyid tha mi dad
28b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom pa ni/ rang bzhin 'ga' ba' i don shes ba'o/ /stong pa nyid dang rang gi sems gnyis kyi rtog pa med par rtogs na/ de nyid 'bras bu yin no/ /de yang phung po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang bsgoms nas mngon
28b3(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa 'bras bu yin no/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba yang gi tsa nyid mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang bsgom pa ni rgyu yin la mkha' 'gro mar shes pa ni 'bras bu yin no/ /brjod par mi nus pa'i sems kyis chos thams cad
28b4(rgyud 'grel): la khyab po/ /de yang phyag rgya zhes bya ba yang snang srid kyi gzugs thams cad do/ /phyag mtshan zhes bya ba yang kha dog thams cad la bya'o/ /de ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa la yid bde ba skyes pa ni/ rdo rje pad+ma bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ro gcig tu bsgom mo/ /lus las sems logs na med na/ sems las kyang lus logs na med par bsgom mo/ /de ltar bsgom na byang chub kyi sems thig le de la nyi ma dang zla ba de ngal so ba yin no
28b6(rgyud 'grel): thig le de nyid sems yin la/ /sems de la chos thams cad snang ngo/ /sems nyid me long yin par bshad do/ /me long la tshon dmar pos bsgos pa la bzhin mi snang ba bzhin du/ rang gi rnam par rtogs pas bsgribs pa ma bsal bar ye shes mi
28b7(rgyud 'grel): skye'o/ /de'i phyir ji ltar bsgoms pa ltar 'gyur te/ rang gi sems brtan par byas phan chad phyi nang gi chos thams cad thig le de'i 'od zer gyi/ thig le bsdus nas bsgoms na de kho na ltar bstan par bya'o/ /de yang yun ring du bsgom mo/ /da yang ci'i phyir
29a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhe na/ bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa bsal pa dang/ sems las ma gtogs pa'i chos med par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu'i bsgom pa la rtag tu dga' bar bya'o/ /des ni 'dod pa lnga la yang rtag tu yongs spyad par bya'o/ /ji ltar spyad kyang
29a2(rgyud 'grel): nyes par mi 'gyur te/ dngos grub thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar zla ba drug bsgoms na rtags 'byung ste/ dang por drod skye'o/ /gnyis pa la sprul pa ston pa dang/ gsum pa gang du bsam par phyin pa'o/ /bzhi pa dpral ba'i dbyes su
29a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod spu g.yas su 'khyil ba dang/ lnga par mngon par shes pa lnga skye'o/ /drug par snying ga'i thig le las khams sum gyi sems can mthong ba'i thig le las/ /khams sum gyi sems can thams cad spro ba dang bsdu ba yang nus so/ /de ltar spro bsdu'i 'gro don byas pas rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ gal te zla
29a4(rgyud 'grel): ba drug ma nus na yang zla ba phyed de/ des rtags phra mo 'ong bar bshad do/ /de ltar bsgoms na sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa spangs la rtag tu bsgom par bya'o/ /chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsgom par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
29a5(rgyud 'grel): du bsgoms nas 'gro pa'i don ji ltar bya zhe na/ dper na mun pa la rjes kyi dngos po mi mthong/ snang ba bteg na rdzas mthong ba bzhin du rang gi rnam par rtog pas bsgribs pas/ yang dag pa'i don mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ gong gi don de bsgoms pas thams cad
29a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /da ni lus dang ngag gi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ de yang sems kyi mtshan nyid mi bshad par ma yin te/ kun 'joms ma zhes bya ba ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye
29a7(rgyud 'grel): shes skye ba'i rang bzhin no/ /de la dbu ma zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir dbu ma zhes bya zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /yod pa dang med pa spangs pa'i phyir te/ de gnyis kyi bar na gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /yod pa zhes bya ba ni ro can ma zhes bya med pa zhes bya ba ni 'phyang
29b1(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya de gnyis ji lta bu zhe na/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la mthong bar bya'o/ /kun 'joms ma gang du shes par bya zhe na/ gnyis po gcig tu gyur pa'i dus su shes par bya'o/ /ol gong dang mid pa gnyis kyi nang du yi ge baM re re bsams la/ gnyis
29b2(rgyud 'grel): las chu'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su bsams la/ de'i steng du baM re re bsam de las pad+mar gyur par bsams la/ g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru la aM/ g.yas phyogs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru la kaM bsam de ltar yun ci ring du bsgoms la/ de nas yi ge gnyis la nyi zla
29b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su gyur bar bsam/ nyi zla'i steng du aM dang kaM bsam de la yun du bsgom/ de yang so bsdams la dbugs nang du rdubs pa las nyi zla gnyis su med par gyur te mi rtog pa skye'o/ /so bsdams la dbugs nang du rdubs ba de mi lcogs na longs spyod kyi rtsa
29b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mnan par bya'o/ /des kyang ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bsgoms pas dang po bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /des mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye nges so/ /mi rtog pa de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma'i gzhi gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de la
29b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur mthong ngo/ /de ltar zla ba drug tu bsgoms pas gsung gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ ji skad smras pa bden par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bsgoms pa de snang ba mdza' yas
29b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur ro/ /ngag gi de kho na nyid rdzogs so// //da ni lus kyi de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o/ /dpral bar yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gcig bsam/ de'i steng du oM bsam mo/ /oM las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsam mo//
29b7(rgyud 'grel): de gnyis kyi bar du oM bsam/ de ltar yun ring du bsgom mo/ /de ltar dpral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed par byas la/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa byas te/ so bsdams la dbugs drang ba dang/ rtsa gnyis mnan pa dang/ dbugs nang du drang ba gang yang rung ba gnyis bya'o/ /ngag
30a1(rgyud 'grel): gi de kho na nyid ston pa'i skabs dang po bde ba skye ba nas/ sgyu ma lta bu mthong ba la sogs pa'i bar du gong du bshad pa dang mthun no/ /de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi dngos grub bstan
30a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lus kyi dngos grub ni lus sna tshogs su sprul nus pa'o/ /lus kyi de kho na nyid rdzogs so// //de yan chad ni las dang po pa'o/ /da ni rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste/ rdzi ma sdebs pa bco brgyad pa phrag sum cu la chu tshod gcig ces
30a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /chu tshod gcig sna bug g.yas nas byung ste nyi ma'i rang bzhin no/ /chu tshod gcig sna bug g.yon nas byung ste zla ba'i rang bzhin no/ /g.yas g.yon gyi dbugs re re zhing yang bzhi bzhir shes par bya'o/ /de la bzhi ni thur du 'byung ba chu'i rang bzhin no/ /
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gyen du 'byung ba bzhi ni me'i rang bzhin no/ /logs nas byung ba bzhi ni rlung gi rang bzhin no/ /thad kar 'byung ba bzhi ni sa'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin spyan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sna bug gnyis kyi bar ni nam mkha' o/ /de nyid he ru ka'i rang bzhin no/ /
30a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bzhi he ru ka la 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i dus su mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu gang gis mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ lha mo bzhi po he ru ka la 'dus pa'i dus su/ rtsa thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis gang bar 'gyur
30a6(rgyud 'grel): ro/ he ru ka la lha mo bzhi'i ji ltar 'du bar 'gyur zhe na/ g.yas pa'i rlung chu tshod gcig tu 'byung ba dang/ 'jug pa'i rjes la g.yon nas 'byung ste/ de 'jug tu mi gzhug par g.yas su drang/ de g.yas su mi 'dug par g.yon du 'jug pa'i dbang gis bar ma'i
30a7(rgyud 'grel): ho ru ka dang 'phrad g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir na he ru ka la lha mo bzhi 'dus pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i man ngag bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// //de ltar he ru ka la lha mo bzhi 'dus pa'i dus na/ dngos grub thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang
30b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /chu tshod nas lha mo bzhi he ru ka la 'dus pa'i bar du rlung gi de kho na nyid ces bya'o/ /des 'dod chags chen po'i me sbar bas 'khor lo bzhi po 'od du zhu nas mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye'o/ /phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad rang gi sems yin la/ sems nyid
30b2(rgyud 'grel): du shes pa ni dngos po bsregs pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i rang bzhin shes pa ni tsaN+Da lI zhes bya'o/ /phung po la sogs pa thams cad bsregs pa'o/ /de gang yin na ni sems yin la/ sems de nyid kun 'joms ma zhes bya'o/ /thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du shos pa gang yin pa de
30b3(rgyud 'grel): la bdud rtsi 'bab pa zhes bya'o/ /sems kyi de kho na nyid rdzogs so// //da ni don dam pa'i de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste/ ngag gi rang bzhin ma grub ste/ ci'i phyir ma grub ce na/ ngag gi gnas lugs nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro/ /ci'i phyir lus ma grub ce na/ brtags pas
30b4(rgyud 'grel): dben pa'i phyir ma grub po/ /de yang lus de rang gi ngo bo yod pa gcig yin na ni/ bud med kyi lus gcig la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i blo tha dad par 'byung bar mi rigs so/ /gnas ma grub pas na gnas ma grub pa'i phyir ro/ /dper na pi bang gi sgra dang 'dra ste/ rgyu rkyen tshogs pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin med par mngon no/ /de la dngos po mtshan ma gcig la blo tha dad pa 'byung ste/ rnal 'byor pas don dam par gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su mthong la/ gzhan dag gis ni rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis sna tshogs par mthong ste/ de'i phyir
30b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med pa la gnas pas sems can thams cad la snying rje skyes te/ sems can gyi thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis gong ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug go /zhugs nas 'bras bu thob par byed do/ /sems can gyi don bya bar sems bskyed do/ /rdo rje lta bu'i
30b7(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin ni rnal 'byor pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams te/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed do/ /de'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor bskyed do/ /de'i steng du d+haM las chos kyi 'byung gnas bskyed do/ /de'i steng du baM las pad+ma/
31a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du khaM las sna tshogs rdo rje bum pa'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dkyil du hUM hUM de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin/ de las kha dog rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin 'od zer rnam pa lnga spros te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas
31a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bla ma rnams spyan drangs te/ gong gi hUM nyid la thim pas hUM nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi bar du byang chub sems kyi thig le gcig tu gyur nas/ thig le'i nang na hUM gnas par bsam mo/ /rang gi rlung gis thig le'i nang na hUM gnas par bsam mo/ /
31a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rlung gis thig le de nyid spyan drangs te/ gong gi hUM sna rtser bsam mo/ /de ltar nyin dang mtshan du bsgoms pas rtags 'byung ste/ smig rgyu la sogs pa 'byung ngo/ /gong ma de ltar bsgoms na/ sems kyi bde ba skye ba nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
31a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang phrad pa yin no/ /nga yis go 'byed snying po brtsams pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus sems can thams cad kyis/ /dri med dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob pa/ /rtog pa'i dra ba bsal nas kyang/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /chos thams
31a5(rgyud 'grel): cad go bar byed pa'i snying po/ /slob dpon chen po snang ba mdza' yas rdo rjes mdzad pa/ shlo ka brgyad rim pa bdun du phye nas chos thams cad go bar byas pa'o/ /dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las/ rdo rje ba las snang ba mdza' yas rdo rje la zhal gyis gnang/
31a6(rgyud 'grel): des yi ge 'di mdzad do/ /dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las slob dpon chen po snang ba mdza' yas rdo rjes mdzad pa'i go byed snying po rdzogs so// //don gyi go byed snying po ni gnyis med do/ /mtshon par byed pa'i go byed snying po ni tshig dang yi ge'o// //
31a7(rgyud 'grel): !/ (/dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrubs thabs rin po che'i sgron ma bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he badzra ratna pra lo kye sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
31b1(rgyud 'grel): lo/ he ru ka dang bdag med bcas/ /de chos 'khor la phyag 'tshal te/ de 'dod phyir na de sgrub thabs/ /de don gnyer la sgron 'di bri/ /chags med byang chub sems dang ldan/ /dbang thob blo ldan lung blangs pas/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas bde bar/ /rnal 'byor brtson pas
31b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya'o/ /tho rangs byams pas mal nas langs/ /gdong la sogs pa dri bkrus nas/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i stan la 'dug /bdud rtsi'i ril bu lce la bzhag /snying rjes ma rnams bzung byas la/ /zhal brgyad nga rgyal bdag bsgoms te/ /rakshas sa sbyangs nas
31b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba/ /me ri dra gur brtan par bsgom/ /he ru ka yi snying ka ru/ /baM dang raM las gsal bar ni/ /pad+ma nyi ma dmar po bsgom/ /de steng hUM nag 'od zer lngas/ /phyogs bcur spros pa bskul dang sbyang/ /byas nas thams cad mkha' la bzhugs/ /bla ma sangs rgyas
31b4(rgyud 'grel): rang dang lha/ /gsal bsgoms lus sprul phyag bya'o/ /de yang 'og nas ston pa yi/ /bcom ldan sku mdog phyag dang rgyan/ /phyag mtshan bcas pa bzhugs pa ni/ /bdag med yum dang ldan pa'o/ /de mdun gau ri nag mo ni/ /byang chub sems dga' ri bong
31b5(rgyud 'grel): can/ g.yas na tsau ri dmar mo yang/ /byang sems dmar po nyi 'od 'bul/ /rgyab na sor mo bet+tA lI/ /lhung bzed chu bzad bkang ba 'bul/ /g.yon na ljang khu g+hasma rI/ /dri bzang thod pa bkang ba 'bul/ /byang shar puk+ka sI sngon mo/ /sha lngas thod pa dgang ba
31b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bul/ /me na mdog dkar sha ba rI/ /ro ldan btung ba sna tshogs 'bul/ /lho nub mdog dmar tsaN+Da li/ /DA ma ru sgrogs sgra rnams 'bul/ /rlung na Dom+bi sna tshogs gzugs/ /phyag rgya bsnol nas mchod pa 'bul/ /bla ma mi bskyod spyi bor bzhugs/ /bsal bar
31b7(rgyud 'grel): brtan par legs bsgoms la/ /snying ga'i sa bon spro bsdu las/ /phyi yi lha mo mchod pa'i tshogs/ /yon chab me tog spos la sogs/ /rab gnas le'u'i sngags kyis mchod/ /sa bon spros la gau rI tshogs/ /bshams dang gnas nas byon pa dang/ /mdun na
32a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i rim pa yis/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga 'bul/ gtso bo'i sa bon gyis bskul nas/ /Dom+bi gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul/ /mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyang/ /spros pa de dag gnas nas bsdu/ /de nas de dag mdun du yang/
32a2(rgyud 'grel): pus btsugs thal sbyar 'jigs sems kyis/ /thog med dus nas deng dus su/ /'khor bas 'khor bar bsams pa'i sdig /bgyes dang bgyid du stsal ba dang/ /yi rang bshags shing slan chad pa sdam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal
32a3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos so so yi/ /skye bo'i dge la rje yi rang/ gsum la skyabs dang sems gnyis bskyed/ /skul dang gsol ba dag kyang gdab/ /thams cad byang chub chen por bsngo/ /de nas byams dang snying rje dang/ /dga' dang btang snyoms yun rings bsgom//
32a4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gsum dang mu(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas/ /mdun gyi spyan drangs gnas su gshegs/ /chos rnams stong par shes byas la/ /blo gnas pa la sngags 'di brjod/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+honya haM/ brjod pas gzung ba'i chos
32a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun/ /rmi lam mig 'phrul smig rgyu dang/ /chu zla mig yor sgyu ma tsam/ /sems snang tsam las yod ma yin/ /oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ brjod pas sems snang de dag kun/ rdul dang du ba khug rna sprin/ /skyon spang ston ka'i
32a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi phyed kyi/ /nam mkha' i dkyil ltar sems bzhag bya/ /chos nyid spros dang bral ba las/ /smon lam byams pas 'gro ba dran/ /nam mkha' i dkyil du raM dang hUM/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dus me 'bar/ /de nas hUM las byung ba yis/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi
32a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ra ba gur dang bla re dang/ /rdo rje ra ba 'bar bar 'phro/ de nas e las chos kyi dbyings/ /chos 'byung gru gsum nam mkha' mnyam/ /bsgoms pa'i nang du yaM raM baM/ /laM gzhi sngon dmar dkar dang ser/ /yaM zhu sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs/ /rlung gi dkyil
32b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dan ldan/ /de steng raM las gru gsum dmar/ /me yi dkyil 'khor raM gyis mtshan/ /de steng baM las zlum po dkar/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor bum pas mtshan/ /de stong laM las gru bzhi ser/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan/ /sems kyi snang bas de rnams
32b2(rgyud 'grel): zhu/ snang ba mched pas gzhal yas grub/ /rin po che las grub pa yi/ /zur bzhi sgo bzhi logs bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ri dags gdugs/ /ba dan dril bu 'phan la sogs/ /
32b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mang po'i sna bas khyab/ /dra ba dra phyed twa ra na/ /bum pa rdo rje phreng ba dang/ /sgo khyud zla phyed rdo rje mdzes/ /dur khrod brgyad na mtsho brgyad klu/ shing brgyad zhing skyong gdan mgo brgyad/ /phyogs skyong chung ma bu 'khor brgyad/ /steng na lha brgyad lha yi 'khor//
32b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten brgyad dang rnal 'byor tshogs/ /grogs byed rnal 'byor ro langs 'dre/ /bya dang gcan zan sna tshogs sprul/ /sha za gdug pa ro yi tshogs/ /shar sogs sgo yi logs rim par/ /glu ma gar ma yon chab ma/ /me tog spos dang mar me ma/ /dri
32b5(rgyud 'grel): chab zhal zas sgra sna tshogs/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /rgyan phreng ma rnams sna tshogs mdog /de nang dkar ser dmar dang ljang/ /gzhal yas dbus ni mthing ka 'bar/ /rdo rje ra ba pad+mar ldan/ ge sar bdud bzhi'i nyi mas mnan/ pad+ma brgyad la lha
32b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi/ /snying gar zla bas mnan pa'o/ /mdzes pa'i gzhal yas de nang gi /dbus kyi bdud bzhi'i nyi steng du/ /hUM dang aM las 'og dang steng/ /A li nyis 'gyur zla dkyil 'khor/ /A li nyi 'gyur nyi dkyil 'khor/ /thod pa gri gug phyag mtshan ma//
32b7(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gnas pa spros bsdus pas/ /thams cad gcig tu gyur pa las/ /zhal brgyad yum dang kha sbyar ba/ /'og bzhi gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /chags can bskyab phyir thugs rje yis/ /bdag nyid thugs ka'i sa bon las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
33a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tu byon/ /thugs ka'i sa bon so sor gnas/ /oM pad+ma su khaM d+ha ra ma hA rA ga dat+ta tsa tu rA nan+ta b+ha gi bi shwa hUM hUM hUM karyaM ku ru Shwa me/ /pad+ma sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlab/ /oM badzra mahA de sha tsa tu rA nan+ta dA ya ka kha ga mu
33a2(rgyud 'grel): kha e ka rA so nA tha hUM hUM hUM karyaM ku ru Shwa me/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga ta badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ de ni sbyor ba dang po yin/ /de nas rjes su chags pa yis/ /shar sogs tshangs sogs snying ga ru/ /gaM tsaM baM gaM paM shaM laM DaM/ de nas phyogs mtshams rnams su babs//
33a3(rgyud 'grel): shar du g+haM yig gsal ba las/ /A li nyi 'gyur las zla ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor me long ye shes dang/ /steng du kA li nyis 'gyur las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid/ /gaM gyur gri gug nag po la/ /zla ba sa bon so sor rtogs/ /sa bon sbrul spyang gcig gyur pa/ /bya ba
33a4(rgyud 'grel): nan tan ye shes yin/ /gau ri bzhengs pa'i sku de ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/ /sngon du bsgoms pa'i gtso bo dang/ /'og gi lha mo bdun po yang/ /de bzhin ye shes lnga yi sku/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brtan par bsgom/ /shar du gri gug las byung ba'i/ /tshangs
33a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i steng na gau rI nag/ g.yas na gri gug g.yon na nya/ /gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom/ /lho ru dbang po'i steng gnas dmar/ /Da ma ru las tsau rI bzhengs/ /Da ma ru g.yas phag pa g.yon/ /tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom/ /nub tu ba las bet+tA li//
33a6(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog nye dbang gdan la bzhugs/ /g.yas na rus sbal thod pa g.yon/ /'du shes phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom/ /byang du g+haM las g+hasma rI/ /drag po'i steng na mar kad mdog /sprul g.yas phyag g.yon thod pa 'dzin/ /'du byed phung po'i rang bzhin bsgom//
33a7(rgyud 'grel): byang shar paM las seng ge las/ /puk+ka sI sngo gshin rje'i steng/ /g.yas na seng ge dgra sta g.yon/ /sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /me ru shaM dang dge slong las/ /sha ba ri dkar gnod sbyin gdan/ /g.yas na dge slong gsil byed g.yon/ /chu yi khams kyi rang
33b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /srin por laM dang 'khor lo las/ /gtum mo mkha' mdog srin po mnan/ /g.yas na 'khor lo thod gshol g.yon/ /me yi khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /rlung du DaM dang rdo rje las/ /Dom+bi kha dog sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje g.yas la sdig mdzub mdzod/ /rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin
33b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /lha mo de rnams spyan gsum mo/ /dmar zhing zlum la mche ba gtsigs/ /dbu skra kham ser gyen du brdzes/ /rus thod 'khor lo snyan cha dang/ /mgul rgyan la sogs phyag rgya lnga/ /mi mgo skam po bco lnga'i phreng/ /gcer bu g.yon bskyang gar thabs bzhugs/ /gtso la
33b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud pa'i stangs dang ldan/ /bar dor gnas pa'i lus ngag yid/ /oM dang A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dkar dmar nag /ho(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thabs dang shes rab brten/ /'khor lo sgyu ma ltar mthong nas/ /gtso bo'i spyir zhugs gtso nyid zhu/ /yum yang zhu nas hUM aM gnyis/ /sa bon dkyil 'khor
33b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas pa/ /rtog med bde ba chen por bzhugs/ /bdag po stor bas lha mo rnams/ /shin tu 'dod pa'i sems gdungs pas/ /puk+ka sI tshogs lha mo bzhis/ /rdo rje'i glu ni lan par byed/ /rje btsun thugs rje'i yid bzhengs shig /puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs//
33b5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /bdag la bde chen sbyor ba mdzod/ /khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas/ /thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad bzhengs/ /stong nyid bcom ldan ci la bzhugs/ /sha ba rI 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron pos nas/ /stong
33b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci/ /gtum mo bdag ni gsol 'debs na/ /bcom ldan kyi yi thugs rje bzhengs/ /bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis/ /mig 'phrul lta bur khyod bzhengs shig /Dom+bi bdag ni dran nyams bas/ /bcom ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhengs
33b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i glu ni sgra snyan gyis/ /rmi lam lta bur gtso bo bzhengs/ /mngon byang lnga yi ye shes las/ /bcom ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /dkyil 'khor dbus na gang dgur bzhugs/ /zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /steng zhal cung mdog mche ba gtsigs/ /kham ser skra brdzes
34a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dus/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu skra brgyan/ /dang po sku dang mthun pa'i zhal/ /g.yas dkar g.yas gnyis sku dang mthun/ /g.yon dmar g.yon gnyis ji bzhin sku/ /dbu skra gyen 'bar thod lnga'i thed/ /spyan gsum dmar zlum mche ba
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs/ /snyan cha mgul rgyan dpung pa'i rgyan/ /phyag zhabs gdu bu 'og dpag brgyan/ /stag gi sham thabs stengs na bcings/ /thod rlon phreng ba thal bas byugs/ /tshangs pa brgya byin nye dbang drag/ steng na zhabs bzhi g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /phyag g.yas dang
34a3(rgyud 'grel): po glang po che/ /thod par gnas pas yum las 'khyud/ /de bzhin rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang seng ge byi la bsnams/ /phyag g.yas thod pa'i rim par 'dzin/ /phyag g.yon dang po thod pa'i nang/ /sa yi lha mo bcas pa 'khyud/ /steng 'og rim par thod par gnas//
34a4(rgyud 'grel): chu dang me dang rlung nyi ma/ /zla ba gshin rje nor sbyin no/ /de yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /mdog nag gri gug thod pa 'khyud/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan thod skam phreng/ /skra ser gyen 'bar spyan gsum dmar/ /bdag po ro myang g.yon brkyang zhabs/ /bdud bzhi'i steng na
34a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhugs/ /de nas bdag dang 'khor de dag /gsal bar legs par brtan par bsgom/ /de gsal dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /ting 'dzin gsum du bstan pa yin/ /de dag gsal ni rang rang gi /snying gar gdan la phyag mtshan bsgom/ /de yi sa bon phyogs
34a6(rgyud 'grel): bcur spro/ /bskul sbyangs sa bon so sor thim/ /hUM gi ye shes 'khor lo bkug/ shar gyi nam mkhar bzhugs la mchod/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bzhis/ /dbug gzhug gnyis med dgyes par bya/ /de nas skye mched byin gyis brlab/ /gtso bo 'khor lo thams
34a7(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje dkar/ /rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje nag /sna la ser sna rdo rje ser/ /lce la 'dod chags rdo rje dmar/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ljang/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor gnag /de dag tshangs sogs pad zla'i steng/ /gri gug thod pa phyag rgya lnga/ /sku gsung thugs
34b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang byin brlabs te/ /mgo dang kha dang snying ga ru/ /oM dang A:hUM dkar dmar nag /sa spyod mkha' spyod bdag med ma/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa yi/ pad zla tshangs pa bdag la bsgom/ /yang na rang snying sa bon gyis/ /phyogs bcu bla ma rgyal ba dang/ /'khor lo khro bo
34b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams/ /spyan drangs mchod nas gsol ba 'debs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM brjod pas gnang nas rigs lnga yis/ /bum pa bdud rtsis bkang bas bskur/ /rigs kyi bdag pos spyi bor mtshan/ /bdag la mi bskyod rdo rje yin/ /phyogs kyi lha mo
34b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po la/ /mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung/ /'od dpag med dang bzhi yang bsgom/ /de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /ser sna 'dod chags bzhi yis kyang/ /puk+ka sI sogs mtshams bzhi la/ /rim pas spyi bor mtshan par bsgom/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a
34b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hi She ka badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ da ni bdud rtsi myang bar bya/ /yaM raM(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM oM rnams bsgom/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /rlung dang me dang thod skyed dang/ /sa bon gnas pa'i ka pA la/ /hUM gis sbyangs dang a(rgyud 'grel): yis 'bar/ /oM gyis ye shes bdud rtsir 'bab
34b5(rgyud 'grel): bruM dzraM aM khaM hUM lnga dang/ na haM shaM ShaM g+haM lnga dang/ bdud rtsir gyur pa rdo rje lces/ /myangs la 'khor lo bde bas mchod/ /de la sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mri ta satwa badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ hUM gi sa bon gyis bkug nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
34b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal du zhugs/ /phyir spros mchod pa'i lha mo yis/ /rim pas mchod nas gnas su thim/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ lha mo de dag rigs yum dang/ /gsung gcig tu ni mthun par bstod/ /bcom ldan lha mo brgyad kyis bskor/ /thugs rje
34b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyis 'gro ba sgrol/ /snod dang 'gro ba bcom ldan thugs/ /thugs dgyes mdzod cig bcom ldan khyod/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /dug lnga dag mdzad khyod la bstod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ de dag brtan par rab gsal ba
35a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor bya/ /pho brang rnam dag rnam snang mdzad/ /rjes su chags pa rdo rje sems/ /dbang ni mi bskyod rdo rje dag /bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med/ /mchod pa don yod grub pa ste/ /bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /yan lag
35a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu dang ldan bsgoms pas/ /dngos grub myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po sprin bar nyi ma 'dra/ /gnyis pa sgyu ma lta bur snang/ /snang ba thob rmi lam ltar/ /'od gsal mnyam gzhag rjes thogs med/ /bdag nyid de ltar brtan gyur pas/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal
35a3(rgyud 'grel): la bltas te/ /byams dang snying rje'i 'khor lo'i lta/ /rgyun mi chad par phyogs phyogs 'phro/ /so so'i gdul bya sbyangs byas nas/ /slar 'dus nang du 'khor mo bsgom/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung zhing/ /byang chub sems ni spro dang bsdu/ /mdog mtshan
35a4(rgyud 'grel): cha lugs thams cad kyang/ /ji ltar gsal bar brtan par bsgom/ /de ltar rdzogs bskyed rdzogs pa'i rim/ /lha mo rim par zhal la bsdu/ /zhal dang phyag rnams mdza' nas rim/ /rtsa ba'i zhal dang phyag dang bsdu/ /zhabs gnyis yum la thim pa dang/
35a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi yi rgya yis gdab/ /lte ba snying mgrin spyi bo na/ /sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bsgom/ /de yang sku bzhi'i ngo bo yin/ /sprul par rtsa 'dab drug cu bzhi/ /lte bar aM 'bar rtsa 'dab la/ /kA li bzhi dang drug cu gan/
35a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lnga ldan rab tu 'bar/ /snying gar rtsa 'dab brgyad gnas la/ /lte bar hUM nag 'dab ma la/ /b+huM dzriM aM khaM e waM ma/ /yaM dang brgyad ni legs par bsgom/ /mgrin par bcu drug 'dab ma la/ /lte bar AM 'bar rtsa 'dab la/ /A li bcu drug dag gis
35a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /'bar ba'i rnam par gnas pa yin/ /spyi bor rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis/ /lte bar haM dkar 'dab ma la/ /A li nyis 'gyur dag gis bskor/ /kha dog dkar po bdud rtsi 'bab/ lte bar gtum mo spar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing/ /spyan
35b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ /bsregs pa'i ri bong rgyun haM 'bab/ /yi ge gsal bar gyur nas ni/ /yi ge de dag spo dang bsdu/ /bskul sbyang byas nas slar 'dus te/ /yi ge rang rang gnas la zhugs/ /srog dang rtsol ba las byung ba/ /lte ba'i 'og nas ri 'bar bas//
35b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo legs sbyangs 'og min gyi/ /bdud rtsi blangs nas spyi bor bsam/ /sbyangs pa'i 'khor lo rnams gang nas/ /thams cad snying kar rab tu thim/ /don dam bdud rtsi zag med bsgom/ /hUM yang rim pas nA dar gnas/ /shin tu yun rings goms mi gnas/ /nam
35b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i dkyil ltar rdul dang bral/ /thog ma tha ma dbus med cing/ /'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bdag dang gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /'di ni bde chen rgyal po yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /sems sbyong ba la skyo ngal na/ /rim pa rim par sku
35b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la/ /yab dang yum gnyis zhal phyag rgyas/ /snying gar sa bon yi ge la/ /bskor nas gnas pa zhal nas zhal/ /rdo rje lam nas pad+ma dang/ /pad+ma'i zhal nas zhal du 'khor/ /rang 'dod pa yis bzlas pa bya/ /bsam gtan kha dog dbye ba yis/ /zhi la
35b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs par shes par bya/ /oM aSh+TA na nA ya/ ping+ga a'urd+ha/ ke sha barha ma ne/ tsa turbiM sha ti nai trA ya/ sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya/ kriSh+NA dzI mU ta/ ba pu She ka pA la mA lA ne kaM d+hA ri Ne/ a d+hma ta krU ra tsit+tA ya/ ard+hendu daMSh+Tri Ne/ oM mAr ya/ mA ra ya kA ra ya/ kA ra ya/
35b6(rgyud 'grel): gardza ya/ gardza ya/ tardza ya/ tardza ya/ sho Sha ya/ sho Sha ya/ sapta sa ga rA na/ band+ha band+ha/ na gASh+Ta kAn /grih+Na grih+Na/ sarba sha trUM sarba duSh+Ta na/ ha hA/ hi hI/ hu hU/ he hai/ ho hau/ haM haM(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa sngags yin/ oM de ba mi tsu badzra hUM hUM
35b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po'i sngags su shes par bya'o/ /oM badzra karta ri he badzra ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ de ni nye ba'i sngags kyang yin/ oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha hUM swAhA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags yin no/ /oM trai lokyA k+She pa huM huM huM phaT swAhA/ phyag gnyis pa'i snying
36a1(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /oM badzra dzra dzra la b+hyo/ huM huM huM phaT swAhA/ de ni phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so/ /oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag drug pa'i snying po yin no// //tshogs gnyis bsags dang gzhan dbang bsdu/ /bdag dang sems can sung
36a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /lha dang chos skyong sems can la/ /bdud rtsi mchod sbyin gtor ma sbyin/ /shar lho'i dur khrod nam mkha' la/ /chos 'byung sum brtsegs steng 'og rim/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad nag /shar nas phyogs mtshams go rims su/ /brgya byin gshin
36a3(rgyud 'grel): rje chu lha dang/ /gnod sbyin bdag po 'byung po'i bdag /me lha srin po rlung gi lha/ /dkar nag dmar skya ser po dang/ dkar dmar dud kha ljang gu yi/ /mdog kyang rim pa bzhin du gsal/ /rdo rje dbyug pa sbrul gyi zhags/ /dpal 'bras rtse gsum dbyu
36a4(rgyud 'grel): gu gsum/ /gri gug ba dan lag na thogs/ /glang po ma he chu srin dang/ /rta dang khyu mchog ra skyes dang/ /mi ro ri dags zhon pa dang/ /dur khrod rgyan dang chung ma dang/ /bu 'khor bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /steng gi chos 'byung pad+ma dkar/ /shar nas
36a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa snga ma ltar/ /brgya byin tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag /gzhon nu tshogs bdag dga' byed dang/ /legs ldan nag po rim par gnas/ /dkar ser dmar dang nam mkha' i mdog /dkar gnyis ser dang nag po ste/ /mdog kyang de bzhin rim
36a6(rgyud 'grel): par gsal/ /rdo rje dbyu gu rtse gsum dang/ /'khor lo rtse gsum mda' gzhu dang/ /la phug ba dan ral gri 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i gdan gnas rin chen brgyan/ /chung ma bu 'khor lha yi 'khor/ /rim pa bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /'og gi chos 'byung pad+ma
36a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar/ /sngon bzhin 'jog po dung skyong dang/ /mdza' yas rigs ldan pad+ma che/ /dga' bo nor rgyas pad+ma brgyad/ /gdengs ka sprul zhags pad zla'i gdan/ /dkar ser dmar ljang yang dkar dang/ /sngo dang dmar skya dkar po'i mdog /rin chen rgyan dang
36b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang/ /chung ma bu 'khor bcas pa dang/ ngan 'gro gsum dang bcas pa yin/ /pad+ma'i lte ba gsum po la/ /rang gi he ru ka nyid bsgom/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgug pa dang gzhug /nam mkha' khyab pa'i gtso bo 'khor/ /mi bskyod rnam snang 'od dpag med/ /rang bzhin
36b2(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang dkar dmar mdog /rdo rje dril bu rang 'od bcas/ /rus rgyan gtso dang 'khor de bzhin/ /de nyid gsum dang dbang bskur rgya/ /lce rnams rdo rje sbu gur sgom/ /de rnams mdun du gtor dag la/ /byin gyis brlabs la rang gzhan btung/ /sngon du bstan
36b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdud rtsi ltar/ /dgyes rdor lha dgur gyur pa'o/ /oM inda dza ma dzak+kha b+hA ta bah+ni bA yu rAk+kha tsanda sUdzdzra maM sa bap+pa tA la pA ta la aTTha sap+pa swAhA/ i daM ba li b+huM dza dzi g+haM phul+la d+hu pa maM sa bing+ga am+b+ha sarba kadzdza khan+ti khu ni phe la ga ta swAhA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba
36b4(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA tAM/ Adya nutpan+na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ gsum gsum brjod la gtor ma gtang/ /yi ge gsum dang mu(rgyud 'grel): yis gshegs/ /bar chad zhi dang lhag chad zhi/ /rdo rje'i glu 'di dal bus blang/ /kol+la ir TThi a bo lA/ mu mu ni re kak+ko la/ g+ha Na
36b5(rgyud 'grel): a kri Ta ni TTha ha/ ka ru Na ki A i na ro lA ha hi ba la kha li/ ma inbi dza/ ki la ka liny+dza rU pa Ni/ a a'i d+hu ru d+hu ru/ Nadzdza a i ce u sa ma sha ts+tsha ri sihlA/ kap? ra lA i a i ma khu la a ind+ha/ na sa liny+dza/ ta hi b+ha ru khA/ i a i/ phraM kha na khe Ta
36b6(rgyud 'grel): ka ran+te/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha N+Na ma Ne/ e i ni raM su aM/ tsa DA bI/ ta hiM dza sa ra sa tsi ba ni A a'i ma sa sa li dzar kundu ru bA Ta/ i DoN+Di/ ma hA hiSh+Ta badzdzi a i/ mchod pa dang gtor ma gtong ba/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor 'dun blang/ /bza' dang btung ba longs spyod
36b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bdud rtsi sbyor bas lus rgyas 'gyur/ /thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /bsgrubs na 'grub kyi gzhan du min/ /sngon du bstan pa legs rtogs nas/ /tshogs gnyis gzhal yas dkyil 'khor gsum/ /zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar/ /dbus ni
37a1(rgyud 'grel): sku dang mthun pa nyid do/ /rdo rje ral gri g.yas na 'dzin/ /dril bu rtse gsum phyag g.yon na/ /rang ni rang rig yum la 'khyud/ /phyag bzhi rdo rje thod pa dag /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag na 'dzin/ /gnyis ni rigs ma nyid la 'khyud/ /phyag gnyis
37a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rdo rje dang/ /thod pa kha TwAM phyag g.yon na/ /de gsum tshangs pa'i steng na bzhugs/ /gzhan dag sngon du bstan pa nyid/ /spro dang bsdu dang 'khor lo dang/ /de don sgoms dang gtor ma sngags/ /zhal gsum phyag bzhi la sogs rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
37a3(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod bsgom/ /rjes thob rnam par dag pa yang/ /dbye ba shes pas rtag tu bsgom/ /me ri gur bdud las rgyal/ /rnam thar chos 'byung chos kyi dbyings/ /gshin rje dbugs 'byin dur khrod brgyad/ /sgo bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag /gru bzhi yang dag skrong ba bzhi
37a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo brgyan rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi/ /'dod yon lha mo dbang po lnga/ /rtsig pa lnga yang stobs lngar dag /rta babs bzhi ni bsam gtan bzhi/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pas ni/ /rim pa bcu gnyis 'od 'bar ba'o/ /rgyan rnams byang chub yan lag bdun/ /ka ba
37a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad mdzes 'phags lam brgyad/ /'khor lo bzhi ni bden ba bzhi/ /de bzhin gdugs ni tshad med bzhi/ /byams pa'i thugs ni sku mdog nag /snying rje spyan dmar 'gro ba gzigs/ /dpa' bo gar dgu 'gro rnams sgrol/ /btang snyoms sna sogs rdo rjes mdzes/ /
37a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i gzugs ni mi bskyod pa/ /rna cha dag la 'od dpag med/ /mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso/ /yan lag kun bkod rnam snang mdzad/ /'od dpag la ni don yod grub/ /yan lag kun thugs rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /sku gsum dkar dmar
37a7(rgyud 'grel): gnag pa'i zhal/ /phyag rnams stong pa bcu drug ste/ /nad rnams 'joms pas glang po sogs/ /dngos grub myur bas lha mo sogs/ /rus pa'i rgyan yang bden pa bzhi/ /stag gi pags pa byang chub bdun/ /bsdu ba bzhi ni zhabs bzhi yin/ /skye rga bcom pas bdud bzhi
37b1(rgyud 'grel): mnan/ /bdag med chos sku rnam dag nyid/ /phung po dag pas gau rI sogs/ /ye shes dag pas kha dog bzhi/ /gri gug sogs kyis bdud bzhi byed/ /tshad med goms pas khams bzhi la/ /puk+ka sI sogs lha mo bzhi/ /mdog dang phyag mtshan de bzhin no/ /nyin om bcom lan
37b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs su gnas/ /mtshan mo shes rab stong pa nyid/ /'gro ba'i gar dang phyag rgya bskyod/ /brjod pas thams cad sngags yin no/ /khrus byed dbang bskur bsam gtan dang/ /nyal ba nyid kyi bsam gtan bsgom/ /de ltar brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dbang po mi dag
37b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rnams bskyab/ /bla ma'i rim 'ongs rgyud rgyal don/ /bsgoms pas blo la gsal ba'i don/ /dgyes rdor mos la phan phyir byas/ /'di las byung ba'i bsod nams ngas?/ /bdag dang 'gro pa ma lus pa/ /dgyes rdor myur du 'grub par shog /dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i
37b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dA na sh'ri dang/ lo tsA ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus so// //dpal dgyes
37b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa bshad par bya'o/ /dang por bsnyen pa bya ste/ /rang gi yi dam lha'i 'dza''bum bzlas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i 'dzab 'bum bzlas/ /lha dang lha mo gzhan gyi 'dzab khri khri bzlas/ de
37b6(rgyud 'grel): yang tshul ji ltar bzlas she na/ dkyil 'khor gar byed pa'i sar maN+Dal gru bzhi pa khru gang pa byas la/ de la ba'i rnam lnga dang/ tsandan la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos byug /bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas kyang go ma yang bya la/ de nas dri'i thig le dgu byas te de'i steng
37b7(rgyud 'grel): du me tog gtsang ma bzhag ste/ de dkyil 'khor gyi lha yin par bsams la/ de nas de la spyan drangs la bstims la/ de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba yan chad bya'o/ /de nas yi dam lha'i nga rgyal byas la/ yi dam lha'i 'dzab
38a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ gtso bo'i nga rgyal byas la/ gtso bo'i sngags bzlas/ lha mo brgyad po rang rang gi nga rgyal byas la/ oM A gau rI hUM/ bet+tA lI/ tsau rI/ pra mo ha /puk+ka sI/ sa pa rI/ tsaN+Da lI/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): Dom+bi ni hUM/ zhes bzlas pa dang/ yi dam gyi lha 'am dkyil
38a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi gtso bo'i 'dzab mi dgos zhes rmi lam na zer na/ 'dzab ma rdzogs kyang 'phro bcad la de'i 'og tu mchod bstod byas la yi ge brgya pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /de ni dang po'i bsnyen pa'o// //sa gzhi yongs
38a3(rgyud 'grel): su gzung bar bya'o/ de la yang brgyad de/ sa btsal zhing brtag pa dang/ sa bslang ba dang/ sa brtan par gzung ba dang/ sa sbyang ba dang/ sa byin gyis brlab pa dang/ bgegs bskrad pa dang/ phur pa gdab pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i slob dpon dbus
38a4(rgyud 'grel): na 'dug pa la gau rI la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de la btsal zhing brtag pa ni/ sa bzang po zug rdu med pa nyes pa med pa/ shang dang byang du gzhol ba/ me tog dang shing dang chu dang ldan par bya'o/ /yang na yid
38a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'ong bar bya'o/ de ni btsal zhing brtag pa'o/ /sa bslang ba ni slob dpon dgyes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pas/ ba'i lci ba sa lam lhung bas maN+Dal khru gang ba zhig byas la/ des dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dmigs la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa bya zhing/ 'jig
38a6(rgyud 'grel): rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma byin la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la thal mo sbyar nas sa bslang bar bya ste/ gang sa 'di la gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang sha za la sogs pa rnams las bslang bar bya ba yis/ sa'i gnas 'di ru yon bdag che
38a7(rgyud 'grel): ba mo'i don du dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod kyis/ khyed rnams la mi gnod pa dang/ bzod pa yod na sa 'dir byed kyis/ yang nas 'dir nyal bas rmi lam du mtshan ma ston cig /ces brjod pas/ gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ bzlas pa byed cing seng
38b1(rgyud 'grel): ge'i nyal thabs kyi nyal bar bya'o/ /rmi lam na nges rnams la mi gnod kyis gyis shig zer na de nyid du bya'o/ /sa brtan par bzung ba ni/ ma khung na spyi de zhag gi snga dro dang po la sngar gyi maN+Dal la zhal bshal la/ de ru dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dmigs la/
38b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gi mchod pa bya ste phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma byin la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /sa 'di tsam zhig khugs na dgyes pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor byed kyis/ khyed rnams sems me nur zhing bgegs med pa dang/ grogs kyis shig ces sgo bar bya'o//
38b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu phyogs thams cad nas/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dag /bdag dang che ge mo zhig gi /don du brtan par bzhugs nas ni/ /mngon shes can gyi mchod yon bzhes/ /zhes lan gsum brjod de gsol ba
38b4(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o/ /kye bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang/ byin gyis brlabs cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol zhes brjod do/ /gal te dgang ba'i sa gzhi rmi lam du ma khugs na/ khro bo'i nga rgyal byas la mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg byas te
38b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad pas snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /de ni sa bzhi brtan par gzung ba'o/ /sa sbyang ba ni zhi ba'i sbyin reg tshul bzhin byas la/ me lha'i thaugs kar sa'i lha mo bsams la de la mchod pa dang sbyin bsreg byas la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas nam mkha' 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ji tsam 'dod pa'i gnas gru bzhir dmigs la klu'i bdag po bsams te/ brko bar bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po ni ston zla gsum la glo g.yon pa sa la phab ste mgo shar du bstan nas kha lhor bltas te nyal lo/ /dgun
38b7(rgyud 'grel): zla gsum la mgo lhor bstan kha nub tu bltas nas nyal lo/ /dpyid zla gsum la mgo nub tu bltas kha byang du bltas nas nyal/ dbyar zla gsum la mgo byang du bstan kha shar du bltas te nyal lo/ /ma brko thabs ni/ klu'i mgo bo dang rgyab dang 'phongs por nas
39a1(rgyud 'grel): bko bar bya'o/ /mngon par dga' ba'i dngos gru kyi don du/ brang gi phyogs su lkog ma dang lte ba dang pus mo tsam gyi bar dngos grub 'bring tha ma gsum 'dod pa'i don du g.yas g.yon na bzhugs par bsam zhing brko bar bya'o/ /sa phyung
39a2(rgyud 'grel): la rdo ba dang gseg ma dang/ mgal du ma dang/ sel ba dang/ rus pa dang/ gyo mo dang/ bod ba la sogs pa med par byas na/ sa gzhan snum pa bzang po dang dri zham bsres te blug bar bya'o/ /de nas dri zhim po dang chu bsres pa la yi ge hUM zlos shing
39a3(rgyud 'grel): bka' la 'thas par bcag ste/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'i steng du/ gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi dang rgyan la sogs pa dang lan par bsam mo/ /de nas spos dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chu la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la gtor bar bya'o/ /sman dang
39a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bru dang rin po che la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la gzhug par bya'o/ /sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug la/ gyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya ste/ khaM las sa gzhi nam mkha' ltar bsgom/ /suM las ri rab ser po gru bzhi
39a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom/ /laM las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhis gru bzhir mtshan pa ser por bsgom/ hUM las sa gzhi rdo rjer bsgom/ de nas me dI ni badzri b+ha ga badzra band+ha hUM zhes brjod pas sa gzhi 'od can du
39a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab po/ /de ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /bgegs bskrad pa ni/ h+rI gsum brjod la slob dpon phyir byung ste/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'dug la/ bdag gi snying ga nas byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo las sprul pa byung bas nam mkha' 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): khyab par bsams te/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sra dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis/ bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod cing/ snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i dbus su bcug la
39b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gcig tu gyur par bsams te/ rang gi lus dgyes pa rdo rje'i nga rgyal byas te/ hUM brjod cing sems dpa' i skyil krung phyed pa la gnas nas/ mig g.yon par Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/
39b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu gnyis las hUM shin tu g.yo ba bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba las rdo rje'i mig bya'o/ /de nas g.yas par rdo rje gsor zhing/ g.yon par dril bu dkrol zhing dkur bzung la mgo dang mig g.yon du cung zad btud de/ rkang thil gnyis su hUM las rdo rje rgya
39b3(rgyud 'grel): gram du brtsams la/ bang shar du gnas te 'di skad brjod do/ / nyon cig bgegs tshogs thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas pa rnams/ /dpal sogs dgyes rdor bdag gis ni/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor la byed pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /
39b4(rgyud 'grel): gal te gang gis bdag tshig 'das/ /'dod gsum bskyed bya gsang bya ste/ /tshal bar 'gas pa gdon mi za/ zhes brjod la g.yas brkyang dang/ /g.yon brkyang la sogs pa'i stang stabs kyis dkyil 'khor la lan gsum du hUM brjod cing bsko bar bya'o//
39b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni bgegs bskrad pa'i rim pa'o/ /phur pa gdab pa ni/ lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa dri dang bdud rtsi'i chus gtor te mdun du bzhag la stong par bsgom/ stong pa las hUM ljang nag gcig tu gyur par bsam/ de las bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gsum phyag
39b6(rgyud 'grel): drug pa cig tu lte ba yan chad bsgom mo/ /smad phur pa zur gsum 'od 'bar ba cig bsam mo/ /de nas dbang ldan nas brtsams te skor phyogs su/ oM he badzra big+ha nAM u ts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bu la bzlas shing phyogs bcur btab
39b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ 'og gser gyis gzhi la thug pa'i bar dbab par bsam mo/ /de ni phur pa gdab pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i rdo rje slob dpon la/ gau rI la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin can gyi lha mo bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa ni/ dkyil 'khor
40a1(rgyud 'grel): bri phyir shar phyogs nas gau rI'i rnal 'byor pas dbus su gtso bo mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul nas 'di skad brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/
40a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol zhes bskul lo/ /lho phyogs nas tsau rI'i rnal 'byor pas dbus kyi gtso bo la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul nas 'di skad ces brjod do/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs
40a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol zhes bskul to/ nub phyogs nas pra mo ha'i rnal 'byor pas/ dbus kyi gtso bo la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul nas 'di skad brjod do/ /zhi ba'i mchog ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes
40a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa rnam sbyor ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes bskul lo/ /byang phyogs nas bet+tA lI rnal 'byor pas/ /dbus kyi gtso bo la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul nas 'di skad brjod do/ /sems can kun gyi sems
40a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes bskul lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas langs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' khyab par dmigs te/ 'di
40a6(rgyud 'grel): skad brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da band+ha naM ka ro ya mi zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ langs la dgyes ba rdo rje'i nga rgyal bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag gis/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag /phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po'i bdag/ byin gyis brlab cing bzhugs su gsol/ /zhes bskul lo/ sa gzhi
40b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bzung ba'o/ /da ni sta gon la gnas par bya ba ston te/ de la yang gnas pa bzhi ste/ sa'i lha mo sta gon la gnas par bya ba dang/ lha sta gon la gnas pa dang/ bum ba sta gon la gnas pa dang/ slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o/ de la sa'i
40b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo sta gon la gnas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dri'i thig le byas la/ thig le'i steng du yi ge laM ser po zhig bsam/ de 'od du zhu bas sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser po/ rin po cha'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
40b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bgrang phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon gser gyi bum pa thogs pa zhig bsam mo/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar gshegs pa'i sa'i lha mo dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bzhis dgug pa dang bzhug pa dang bcang ba dang/ dgyes par byas la/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul
40b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de ltar bdud kyi tshogs brtsom nas/ /bdag
40b5(rgyud 'grel): gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod pas sa'i lha mo mnyes nas/ dga' ba'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis zer nas sa la thim mo/ /de ni sa'i lha mo sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /lha sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /lha dgu
40b6(rgyud 'grel): so so'i bzhugs gnas su dri dang bdud rtsi'i thig le byas la gdan dgu ru bsam/ de'i steng du so so'i snying po brjod cing/ me tog re re bzhag pas dam tshig sems dpa' lha dgu ru bsam/ de nas dza:hUM baM ho la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/
40b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi lna dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la gnyis su med par bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul la bstod pa nyi shu pa byas te 'di skad do/ /thams cad dngos po'i rang bzhin mchog /gdod nas thams cad bdag
41a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis bdag pa/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /bcom ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gis rdo rje dkyil 'khor
41a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir/ mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste/ /slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang/ /khyed la mchod pa'i don du yang/ /de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la/ /byin brlabs snang ba mdzad par 'os/ /dgongs shig bdag la sangs rgyas dag /'gro ba'i 'khor lo
41a3(rgyud 'grel): don byed dang/ /'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gang zhig gzhan yang sngags kyi lha/ /lha rnams 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /'byung po byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba'i/ /gang zhig rdo rje mig ldan pa'i
41a4(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /dgyes rdor dkyil 'khor dngos byung ba/ /ji ltar nyer spyod nus pa yin/ /'gro bar mngon? du bri bar bya/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /byin rlabs gnang ba mdzad par 'os/ /zhes lan gsum du spos thogs la
41a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad do/ /de ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /bum pa sta gon la gnas pa ni/ bum pa'i dbyibs ni chu'i dkyil 'khor lta bur zlum pa/ zhabs phra ba mchu 'phyang pa lto ba che ba dgu byas la/ spos kyi chus dag par bkrus la/ maN+Dal gyi steng
41a6(rgyud 'grel): du ngas sam dar dkar bting la me tog chal par bkram la gong gi bum pa bzhag go /de nas tsan dan dkar po la sogs pa'i dri zhim po la sogs pa dang dkar rtsi bsres la bum par bya/ de nas pad 'dab brgyad re bri/ /de'i lte ba la
41a7(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi phyag mtshan re bri/ /de nas rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dngos po med par bsam/ de las yi ge khaM dkar po cig tu gyur/ de 'od du zhu ba las bum pa gong ma 'dra ba zhig byung bar bsam/ de'i nang du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa
41b1(rgyud 'grel): zhig pa bsams? de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ de'i steng du aM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig bsam/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM mthing nag cig bsam/ de 'od du zhu ba las rdo rje mthing nag hUM gis mtshan pa cig bsam/
41b2(rgyud 'grel): de 'od du zhu ba las dgyes pa rdo rje zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi phyag bcu drug spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa brgyad na band+ha'i nang na glang po rta bong la sogs pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa brgyad na band+ha'i nang na sa'i lha mo la sogs
41b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du 'phreng ba/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bsam mo/ /yang na dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsam mo/ /de nas ris drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag go /de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzhis ye shes kyi lha dgug
41b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba la sogs pa byas la de nas gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug gis skye mched drug byin gyis brlab/ mkha' spyod ma la sogs pa gsum gyis gnas gsum byin gyis brlab bo/ /rigs kyi bdag po rgyu'i dgyes
41b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rjes dbu brgyan par bsam mo/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs pa la bsang gtor bya/ gsang gtor la sogs pa'i sngags ni/ oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ me tog la sogs pa'i sngags so/ /oM A:swAhA band+ha'i nang du bzhag pa'i bdud rtsi lnga sbyang ba'i sngags so/
41b6(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ dam tshig gi chu bsang ba'i sngags so/ /oM sh+rI hUM g+haM dzaM swAhA/ sha lnga sbyar ba'i sngags so/ /de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga po de hUM lar bsams la hUM 'od du zhu ba las/ me tog la sogs pa 'od dang ldan pa bzang por gyur par bsam/ de nas rnam par
41b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i bum pa la/ oM badzra swA b+hA ba swAhA zhes brjod la ras dbul/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): khaM raM zhes brjod la yon dbul/ oM ni ri ti hUM khaM zhes brjod la zhal bsil dbul me tog bzang po mchog 'di dag /dri med gtsang ba'i skye gnas nas/ /bdag gi dad pas phul ba
42a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /bzhes te bdag la bka' drin skyobs/ /oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ nags tshal las byung dri yi mchog /dri tshogs bdug spos bla med pa/ /bdag gi dad pas phul ba nyid/ /bzhes te bdag la bka' drin skyobs/ /oM badzra d+hU pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM
42a2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa/ /dge shing mun pa rnams sel ba/ /bdag gi dad pas phul ba nyid/ /bzhes te bdag la bka' drin skyobs/ /oM badzra dI pa A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ lhan cig skyes nas sbyar ba'i dri/ /shangs la tshim byed dag pa 'di/ /bdag
42a3(rgyud 'grel): gi dad pas phul ba nyid/ /bzhes te bdag la bka' drin skyabs/ /oM badzra gand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ bshos gtsang thams cad yan lag ldan/ /bza' dang bca' bar ldan bcas pa/ /kha dog dri dang rong ldan pa/ /dbul gyis so sor bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra nai bi
42a4(rgyud 'grel): dye A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ de nas dri chab bzang po dur phor du glub? la bum pa'i kha ru bzhag /hUM bdun bzlas pa'i srad bu dkar po rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la gdags/ me tog gi phreng ba tsan dan dkar po'i dri chur bcug la rdo rje'i dbus su bcings la dur phor gyi kha ru bzhag
42a5(rgyud 'grel): go /de nas gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa da bum par blugs pas/ de'i stobs kyis dgyes pa'i rdo rje yab yum 'od du zhu nas/ de nas dri chab bzang po gang bar blugs/ de nas kha rgyan dang mgul chings la/ oM hUM swAhA zhes bzlas la bcing zhing
42a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya'o/ /'bru lnga sman lnga bdud rtsi lnga rin po che lnga la gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis byin gyis brlabs la ras su gtums la/ kha rgyan la btags bum pa chu'i nang na bcug la/ spos kyis bdugs la bzhag /de nas bum pa gzhan ma brgyad
42a7(rgyud 'grel): po la/ rang rang gi snying bo g+haM tsaM la sogs bskyed pa dang/ so so'i ye shes sems dpa' i lha spyan drang ba dang/ dgug pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor du snga ma bzhin du bzhag go /de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i nang
42b1(rgyud 'grel): du yi ge hUM las cho ga gsum gyi rim pas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bskyed la spyan drang ba la sogs pa gong ma bzhin du bya'o/ /rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar mtshams su bzhag la 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ khyed kyis dkyil 'khor 'di ma rdzogs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar du bgegs ma rungs pa rnams bsrung du gsol zhes bya'o/ /de ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /de nas slob ma sta gon gnas pa ni/ phyi rol tu song ste dgyes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du gnas la/ de nas lus bsrung ba dang/ khrus dag pa dang/ gos gtsang
42b3(rgyud 'grel): ma bgos la/ me tog gi phreng ba rdo rje slob dpon la gtor te/ slob dpon la phyag byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /dag la chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal
42b4(rgyud 'grel): lo/ byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum po ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ zhes lan gsum brjod la/ de nas slob dpon gyis mtshan nyid
42b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i slob ma la bos te 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu 'dir shog cig theg chen gyi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la legs par bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang ngag
42b6(rgyud 'grel): ma byon pa/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyis/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba nyes med de/ /
42b7(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen ngag kyang de yis bcom/ de nas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces brjod do/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa phyed du gzhug ste/ bdag gi sdig pa ci bgyes
43a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bgyid du stsal dang yi rang ba/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis/ /bsgom dang bzlas brjod bsod nams tshogs/ /de la
43a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni yi rang ngo/ /sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs spyod dang/ /deng nas bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems
43a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de nyid du ni sems bskyed do/ /mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dus 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas par/ /bla med bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i
43a4(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog
43a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs
43a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan
43a7(rgyud 'grel): par gzung bar bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrubs nas/ /sems can 'khor pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub nyid du bsgral bar bgyi/ zhes zhus pa dang/ slob dpon gyis slob ma la
43b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba bya ste/ khro bo'i sngags kyis so shing la bzlas par bya'o/ /so shing gi cho ga ni u dum+ba ra 'am/ e shwat+tha'i shing gi rtse mo las sor bcu gnyis pa'i shing gi tshad du bya/ mi g.yo ba ma gas pa 'bus ma zos pa'i so shing gi rtse mor me tog gi phreng ba bcing
43b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ dri zhim pos byugs la/ tshems shing stong par bsgom/ de las hUM mthing nag 'od 'bar ba gcig tu gyur/ de las so shing 'od can cig byung bar bsam/ de nas so shing gi me tog gi phreng ba bgrang zhing bzlas la byin gyis brlag de nas ba'i lci ba sa la ma
43b3(rgyud 'grel): lhung ba dang/ dri zhim po dang/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas maN+Dal gru bzhi khru gang pa zhig nub phyogs su byas la/ de'i steng du slob ma bzhag /rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri chu blangs te/ oM brjod la spyi bor thig le bya/ A(rgyud 'grel): brjod
43b4(rgyud 'grel): la mgrin bar thig le bya/ hUM brjod la snying gar thig le bya/ thig le gdan du bsam/ oM A:hUM gsum mkha' spyod ma la sogs par bsams la/ me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya ste/ spyi bor me tog dbul/ mdun du spos me dbul/ mar me dang/
43b5(rgyud 'grel): dri snying gar dbul/ lha bshos lag par dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te/ mi smra ba ru so shing bca' / bca' ba zin nas so brud cing mi gas pas phan tshun ma dor bar mdun drang por rtsa ba'i dkyil du dor ro/ /yang na khru gang gru bzhi par
43b6(rgyud 'grel): dor ro/ /de tshe bdag la lta ba dang/ /rtse mo gyen du 'greng 'gyur na/ /de ni dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin gzhan du kha bltas na/ /de ni dngos grub 'bring du bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub thob/ /so shing bor ba brgya zhig
43b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ gal te mthur du kha bltas na/ /de ni nges par sa 'og gi /dngos grub de la the tshom med/ /de nas dri chu yis lag pa bkrus te/ 'thong 'thung gis kha bshal la dbo/ /de nas oM h+ri bi shu d+ha d+harmA pA paM niShtsa a se sho d+ha sarba bi kalpa na/ a pa nA ya hUM zhes bya ba mngon
44a1(rgyud 'grel): par bzlas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug go /de'i 'og tu slob ma rnams sems dpa' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bshad bar bya'o/ /de'i dgos pa ni/ dag gi nyes pa dag par bya ba dang/ dngos grub rab 'bring gi bltas blta ba'o/ /de
44a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ku sha la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas la ku sha stong par bsgom/ de nas hUM du gyur/ hUM las ku sha byung bar bsam/ mgo bo'i phyogs su zhog ces bsgo par bya'o/ /yang ku sha hUM las bskyed la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa de steng du yang
44a3(rgyud 'grel): gding bar bya'o/ /de'i dgos ba ni yid kyis nyes pa dag par bya ba dang/ rmi lam rno bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshon sna rnam pa lnga'i skud pa la dri dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chus gtor la stong par bsgom/ stong pa las hUM du gyur/ hUM las rdo rje'i skud par bsam/ bdud
44a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags lan drug bzlas shing mdud pa drug byas pa'i skud pa dpung pa g.yon par gdags/ yi ge brgya bas kyang brtan par bya/ de nas bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig /sang gi nyin par khyed rnams kyis/ /thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin
44a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi grong khyer rnams mthong bar 'gyur gyi/ de nas snga ma bzhin du slob ma la mchod pa rnam pa lnga byas nas phyi rol tu phyogs skyong gi gtor ma btang ste/ nang du zhugs nas lha sta gon la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod de/ gnas de nyid du ku sha'i
44a6(rgyud 'grel): stan la slob ma mchog /dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du seng ge'i nyal thabs kyis nyal la rmi lam gyi mtshan ma blta ba'i phyir/ mi smra bar yi dam gyi lha bsgom zhing bzlas pa byed cing nyal lo/ /de nas nang par mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dang gang
44a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dri bar bya'o/ /dri ba thos nas rmi lam bzang ngan 'dzem pa med par bzlas par bya'o/ /rmi lam bzang po mthong na slob ma la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum bstan bar bya'o/ /ngan pa mthong na ba'i rnam pa lnga 'am
44b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas la 'thung du gzhug cing bsrung ba yang bya/ grub na drag po'i sbyin sreg bya zhing rtog pa bsal bar bya'o/ /de ni slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'i rim pa'o// //las la 'jug pa la yang gnyis
44b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang dbang bskur bI cho ga'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang bcu gsum ste/ thig gdab pa dang/ tshon dgye ba dang/ phyag rgya dgod pa dang/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la gnyis
44b3(rgyud 'grel): su med par bya ba dang/ de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi dang/ tshogs dang/ gtor ma'i mchod pa bya ba dang/ sbyin sreg gi mchod pa dang/ ye shes kyi lha mchod la gshegs su gsol ba dang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'o//
44b4(rgyud 'grel): de la thig gdab pa'i rim pa ni/ sta gon gyi lha la mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi'i cho ga byas la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dz+nyA na maN+Da la mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la gshegs su gsol lo/ /hUM zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dbang du bsdus la/
