44b5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du hUM mthing nag cig bsam/ de las 'od phyogs bcur spros par bsam/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje'i ra pa la sogs ba bsam/ de nas thig gdab par bya ste/ ras kyi sras bu sngon po dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang
44b6(rgyud 'grel): gu dang/ de kun gser ram/ dngul gyi snod dris bsgos pa'i nang du bzhag la/ hUM sngon po/ oM dkar po/ traM ser po h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ khaM ljang gu rim pa bzhin du bsam/ de nas slob dpon bdag dbus su gnas la dgyes pa'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin du bsgom la/
44b7(rgyud 'grel): mig g.yas su ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor g.yon du Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ oM tipta driSh+Ti aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bzlas pas lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od zer sprin byung nas dgyes ba rdo rje la sogs pa rigs lnga mdun gyi nam mkha' la bskul 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ de la 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /kye bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i rdo rje srad bu stsal du gsol zhes brjod do/ de nas ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ dgyes pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas
45a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyus bskul ba'i tshul du ye shes kyi skud pa lnga byung ste/ dam tshig skud pa la so sor thim par bsam mo/ /de nas phan tshun rjes su rdzogs pa kun/ /phan tshun rjes su chos thams cad/ /yang dag dgug pa'i chos thams cad/ /chos shes dang po dran
45a3(rgyud 'grel): nas bsgril/ zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o/ de nas tsan dan bzang po la sogs pas skud pa gser gyi snod la sogs pa'i nang du legs par bzhag la/ slob dpon dbus su 'dug la/ me tog la sogs pas thig la mchod de/ rdo rje'i mig byas la bdag
45a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid nub phyogs su gnas te/ dgyes pa rdo rje rnal 'byor bya'o/ /oM he dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ci nus brjod nas/ bdag gi snying ga nas grogs po gau rI'i tshul du sprul nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas mdun du 'dug par bsams la/ skud
45a5(rgyud 'grel): pa lag pa g.yon pas bzung la/ bdag nyid kyis oM dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba gsum brjod do/ /bdag gi lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ grogs po'i lag par gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas grogs pos rkang pa mdun du bsnur nas/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dza:
45a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod nas blangs te slob dpon gyi mdun du 'dug go /de nas thig gi sgras sems can gyi don la bde gshegs bskul ba dang/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gnam thig gdab bo/ /de la slob dpon nub tu 'dug la kha shar du bltas la/ oM
45a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya sU tram ti kra ma hUM zhes brjod cing thig gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du slob dpon lhor 'dug la byang du kha bltas te/ thig gdab par bya'o/ /de ni gnam thig go /de nas mtshon sna lnga'i srang bu gnyis pa blangs te/ snga ma bzhin du sa thig gdab par bya'o/ /slob
45b1(rgyud 'grel): dpon dang slob ma gnyis bskor phyogs ni g.yas su bskor bar bya'o/ de ni sa thig go /de nas gsher thig blangs la mtshan ma'i thig gdab par bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni/ tshangs thag gnyis gdab pa ni gnam thig dang mthun te/ de nas mer gnas la byang du bltas te
45b2(rgyud 'grel): shar du gdab po/ de nas rlung du gnas la lhor bltas te nub tu gdab bo/ de kar 'dug la shar du bltas te byang du gdab bo/ /yang mer 'dug la nub tu bltas te lhor gdab po de kar 'dug la rlung du bltas te/ mtshams dang po gdab po/ /yang bden bral
45b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'dug la dbang ldan du bltas la mtshams gnyis pa gdab par bya'o/ /de ltar btab pa la drug gi chang ni bgos par bya /dang po drug pa nang gnyis dor/ /gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi bzhir bye/ /bzhi pa ma bgos par ni bzhag /lnga pa yi ni dbu ma dor/ /rta babs
45b4(rgyud 'grel): man chad khol mas bya/ /rdo rje rab me ri gnyis/ /tshad dang mthun par bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi thig skud kyang snga ma bzhin du mchod nas oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ zhes bya ba ni
45b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag la shes par bya'o/ de ni thig gdab pa'o/ /de la tshod dgye ba'i rim pa ni/ rin po che sna lnga 'am/ 'bras sA lu btags pa'i phye ma kha dog lngar bsgyur ba 'am/ /yang na 'byung khungs rnam pa lnga'i sa bon las/ ye shes kyi skud pa la yig
45b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru ji ltar bkod pa bzhin dus tshon la yang bya'o/ ye shes kyi skud pa bkug nas bstims pa bzhin du kho na la yang de bzhin bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa lnga phul nas/ oM badzra ti tra sa ma ya hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags tshon la lan bdun bzlas shing
45b7(rgyud 'grel): tshon rtsi la 'bar ba'i mig gis blta bar bya'o/ /'bar ba'i mig ni myur bar g.yo ba'i mig go /de nas yi ge nyi zlos shing/ rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshon nas bya'o/ /de nas tshon bzang por bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod do/ /bden pa gang
46a1(rgyud 'grel): gis sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas rnams sems can du dpag pas/ chags par mdzad pa'i bden pa des/ tshon rtsi 'bar bar gyur cig ces bya'o/ /de nas 'di skad brjod la/ tshon dgye bar bya ste/ chos dbyings rang bzhin dag pa ste/
46a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can khams ni sbyong bar byed/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i bdag ces brjod la/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas g.yon bskor du bri bar bya'o/ /de yang nang du nag po'o/ /de nas dkar po de nas ser po/ /de nas dmar po/ de nas ljang
46a3(rgyud 'grel): gu mtho gang tsam du bri bar bya'o/ /de yang oM badzra tsi tA pra sar hUM zhes brjod cing bri'o/ /de nas gser gzhong la sogs pa bkab la/ me tog gis mdza' ma bskor la bzhag go /de nas pra bzang na/ e ma'o zhes brjod/ dan na rdul tshon la bgegs bstims la phur
46a4(rgyud 'grel): bus gdab/ de nas slob ma mkhas pas ji ltar bde bar bri bar bya'o/ /de yang shar du dkar po/ lhor ser po/ nub du dmar po/ byang du ljang gu/ dbus su nag po'o/ /sboms na nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan du blta bar bya'o/ /de ni tshon
46a5(rgyud 'grel): dgye ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /lha so so'i snying po brjod cing dbus nas rim bzhin du phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /der g.yas brkyang la sogs stang stabs bya'o/ /de ni phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/ snying po brjod cing
46a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dgod pa'i dus su lha re re krongs krongs 'grub par bsam mo/ /yang na mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas/ bdag gtso bo yab yum du bsgoms la/ de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): la phab la/ /de nas gtso la sogs pa lha so so'i yig 'brur gyur/ de las lha mo brgyad kyi skur gyur/ de nas g+haM tsi la sogs pa so so'i snying po brjod la mkha' las bton te so so'i gnas su dgod par bya'o/ /de ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o/ /ye shes kyi
46b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bya ba ni/ gau rI dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas/ gau rI lcags kyu can gyis dgug /tsau rI hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ tsau rI zhags pa can gyis gzhug /pra mo ha baM zhes brjod pas/ pra mo ha lcags sgrog can gyis bcings/ bet+tA lI ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes
46b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas/ de d+ha lI dril bu can gyis dbang du byas so/ /de skye mtshad byin gyis brlab ba dang/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sau'i rigs kyis bdag mos dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de ni gnyis su med par bstim pa'o/ de la phyi nang gsang ba'i
46b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa bye ba no/ de nas shar sgor rma bya'i stan bcing la las kyi phyag rgya ma dang gnyis su med par sbyor ba byas pa'i byang chub sems dung chos su blangs la/ ga bur dang gur gum bsres la bdud rtsir bsams la/ oM a mri ta swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha zhes bya ba
46b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing srin mtheb kyi phyag rgyas gtor zhing dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gsang gtor bya'o/ /de nas phyi'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul de nas nang gi mchod pa ge rI la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas sprul la dbul gsang bA mchod pa byang chub sems
46b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sha lnga dbul/ de ni phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul/ de nas bstod pa nyi shu pa'i bstod/ de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa bya ba ni/ chang phud kyi nang du bdud rtsi blugs tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): gu ru i daM a mri taM mahA satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing/ srin ma thob kyi phyag rgyas
46b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor zhing/ rdo rje slob dpon la mchod do/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): haM badzra i daM a mri taM satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing/ dgyes pa'i rdo re la dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): gau rI i daM a mri taM satwA A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes brjod cing gau rI la dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): tsau rI i daM a mri taM sa tA ya hUM zhes brjod cing
46b7(rgyud 'grel): tsau rI la dbul/ aM A(rgyud 'grel): pra mo ha i daM a mri taM satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing pra mo ha la dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): bet+tA lI i daM a mri taM satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing bet+tA lI la dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka si i daM a mri taM satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing puk+ka sil dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): sa ba rI i
47a1(rgyud 'grel): daM a mri taM satwA ya zhes brjod cings ba rI la dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da li i daM a mri taM satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing tsaN lI la dbul/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): Dom+bi ni i daM a mri taM satwA ya hUM zhes brjod cing Dom+bi la dbul/ de nas mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu la yang dbul
47a2(rgyud 'grel): lo/ de ni bdud rtsi'i mchod pa'o/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa ni/ tshogs kyi zhal zas la las thams cad pa'i sngag bzlas la/ dri dang bdud rtsi'i chus gtor zhing bsang/ de nas tshogs tshul bzhin du bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab/ de nas phung bkros la pad+ma'i phyag rgyas
47a3(rgyud 'grel): pud blangs la oM A(rgyud 'grel): he badzra i daM ba liM khA hi zhes brjod cing gtor chen gyi nang du dbul lo/ /de bzhin du lha kun la dbul lo/ /de nas gtor chen gyi sngags rings bzlas la dbul/ de nas bstod pa nyi shu pas bstod do/ /de nas de'i lhag ma pad+ma'i phyag rgyas
47a4(rgyud 'grel): blangs la lhag ma'i sngags brjod cing lhag ma'i gtor ma dbul lo/ /rnal 'byor pas yi dam gyi lha so sor bsgoms la lce rdo rjer byin kyis brlabs la/ rin po che'i phyag rgyas blangs la so sor rol pas/ phung po khams dang skye mched kyi lha rnams tshim par
47a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas rol pa'i lhag ma la/ u ts+tshiSh+Ta'i sngags bzlas la/ yi dags lhag ma za ba rnams tshim par bsam mo/ /mgo zug nas ma thor gyi ba du nyin lan gsum du phyogs skyong gi gtor ma btang/ mtshan mo lan gsum du mkha' 'gro ma'i
47a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma btang ngo/ /de ni tshogs mchod pa'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi mchod pas mchod pa ni/ sa bzung ba'i dus su sbyin sreg gi mchod pa zhi ba'i bya/ mchod pa'i dus su rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ thon kar slob ma'i bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma
47a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon phyogs su bzhag la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ni sbyin sreg gi mchod pa'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la gnyis te/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba'i thabs so/ /dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la gnyis te/ slob dpon 'jug pa
47b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ slob ma gzhug pa'o/ /slob dpon 'jug pa ni/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dang gnyis su med par 'jug go /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /'dod chags chen po kun 'byung bas/ /'khor lo de ni gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /slob ma'i don
47b2(rgyud 'grel): du grong khyer bcas/ /de kho na nyid bde bar brjod ces bya'o/ /de nas slob ma rnams yol ba'i phyi rol tu bzhag ste/ sta gon la gnas pa'i skabs bzhin du dom pa blangs te/ gos dmar po bgos/ mig dang gdong g.yogs te/ las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas
47b3(rgyud 'grel): shing/ chus bsang gtor byas la/ dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dri bar bya'o/ /slob ma dga' ba skal chen bdag yin no/ /zhes lan gdab par bya'o/ /de na shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta he badzra pU dzo pas tha nas/ At+ma ni nIrya tA ya mi
47b4(rgyud 'grel): te he badzra ad+hi tiShpa mAM zhes brjod pas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ oM sarba yo ga tsita utpa dA ya mi/ su ra te sa ma yastwaM/ ma hA sid+d+ha badzra ya thA su khaM zhes brjod do/ /de nas mig dgab /ras la me tog phreng ba bcings la/ na mo
47b5(rgyud 'grel): ratna tra yA la/ he badzra pa ri bA ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ sarba ye bya zhes brjod pas slob ma srung ngo/ /de nas de la khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis/ khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
47b6(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing/ dad pa med pa rnams la ni ma yin no/ /de nas shar sgor dkyil 'khor khru gang ba la 'dab brgyad dmar po gcig byas la/ dbus su rdo rje mthing nag/ shar gyi 'dab ma la 'khor lo dkar po/ lhor rin chen ser po/ nub tu
47b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dmar po/ byang du ral gri ljang gu /me'i mtshams su rin po che'i shing/ srin po'i mtshams su se 'bru/ rlung gi mtshams su rgyal mtshan/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ka pA la/ shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu/ lhor rdo rje zhags pa/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog /byang du
48a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu/ der seng ge'i khri bcas pa/ slob ma rdo rje rtse mo la 'jur bcug la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing dza(rgyud 'grel): yis bkug ste/ a khaM bI ra hUM zhes brjod pas bcug ste stegs bur bzhag la/ sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs
48a2(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams
48a3(rgyud 'grel): la ma smra cig /khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje snying gar gzung la/ de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /khyod kyi snying la rab tu gnas/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /snying 'gas byas nas dral nas gshegs/ /oM badzra
48a4(rgyud 'grel): satwa hUM zhes brjod do/ /de nas dung chos sam nyi phyas la sogs par chu blugs la/ de'i nang na gur gum dang/ tsan dan dang/ sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa blugs/ bdud rtsi lnga yang blugs la hUM gis sbyangs/ A(rgyud 'grel): sa rtogs par bya/ oM gyis 'bar byas/ de nas
48a5(rgyud 'grel): badzrad ka mahA badzra/ ku raM bi shwa na/ lan bdun bzlas la/ lag pa g.yas su sbyin par bya/ de nas 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu /dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob/ /'thung zhig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /oM badzra u
48a6(rgyud 'grel): da ka Tha Tha Tha/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig brtan par gyur nas/ slob ma la 'di skad ces bsgo ste/ de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ /ngas 'di byos shig byas pa gang yin pa ni bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed
48a7(rgyud 'grel): cig /yang ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas/ dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob mas 'di skad smra bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab du gsol zhes zhu
48b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dgyes pa rdo rjer bsgoms la/ dbang snod snang ba mdza' yas su bsgoms la/ de'i rkang mthil 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gaM rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan par bsgoms/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum
48b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de'i steng du dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM kha dog dmar po zhig bsam/ de nas snying gar lam ser po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po zhig bsam/ de'i steng du hUM mthing nag gcig bsgom/ mgrin par paM dkar po las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po zhig
48b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /de'i spyi bor yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gaM sngon po zhig bsam/ de'i steng du ha dkar po cig bsam/ de nas snying gnas 'od 'phros pa las phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha spyan drangs la/ gnas su bstim mo/ /de nas spos la oM a be sha/
48b4(rgyud 'grel): tur te saM he badzra g+ha ma/ ma nu ta raM/ zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la me la spos bor te slob ma la bskor te lag tu gtad la/ me tog gi phreng ba yang lag pa g.yas par byin la /oM a be sha a be sha/ to ba ya/ ra ra ra/ tsa le ha tsa le ya hUM a ha
48b5(rgyud 'grel): dzuM swAhA zhes brjod la/ rkang mthil gyi rlung g.yos rlung gi me sbar/ me yis dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM spar/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi 'od zer rkang mthil nas snying gar zhugs pas mi dge ba la sogs pa shes/ mgrin par zhugs pas smra/ spyi bor zhugs pas lus mi brtan zhing 'phar ro//
48b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes brjod nas 'phar pa gzung bas brtan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lce la A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsams la gsungs shig rdo rje dge mi dge zhes brjod pas legs nyes kun smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mig gdab pa'i ras kyi phreng ba lam me
48b7(rgyud 'grel): tog phyung ste/ slob ma'i lag tu gtang/ la pra tIts+tsha badzra ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor du dor ro/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis blangs nas/ stobs po che 'di long zhig byas la slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas kye bu/ dri med yid 'ong ldan
49a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong/ /dkar po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /ser po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dmar po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /dbang
49a2(rgyud 'grel): gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /nag po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /drag po'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis khyod/ /de ring nan tan mig phye'o/ /zhes brjod la/ oM he badzra swa ya na ti de/ tsa kru ga ta na/ tatpa ra na/ u ha ya te/
49a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba ya ga gro /badzra tsa kru/ ra bud+d+ha raM/ zhes brjod la gdong g.yogs dkrol lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus nas byang gi sgo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du lha ngo bstan bar bya'o/ /de nas slob mas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byed du bcug la/ rdo rje slob
49a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon la phyag lan gsum byed du gzhug /dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dngos thob par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab/ de nas bdag bu dang chung ma la sogs pa dang/ rta dang ma he la sogs pa'i rkang bzhi pa dang/
49a5(rgyud 'grel): gser dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che dang/ zhing dang grong la sogs pa rten dang/ dar dang men la sogs pa'i bgo ba dang/ sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang/ rgun chang dang 'bras chang la sogs pa'i btung ba dang/ cil dgyes pa
49a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yid dang 'thad pa 'bul bar bya'o/ /de ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o// //dbang bskur ba'i thabs la yang gnyis te/ phyi dang nang ngo/ /phyi la yang bcu gcig ste/ grangs su bgrang ngo/ /de nas slob
49a7(rgyud 'grel): mas zhu bar bya ste/ ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ldan/ /yon tan ldan pas rtser dgongs nas/ /rig pa'i dbang rnams bdag la stsol/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa la sogs pa bum pa rnams nas
49b1(rgyud 'grel): chu bsdus la/ dung por nang du blugs te mi bskyod pa 'ba' zhig tu mos pa byas te/ de la mchod bstod byas nas 'od du zhu bar bsam mo/ /de nas dgyes pa rdo rje'i gnas gsum nas 'od zer las sprul pa nam mkha' khyab pa byung bar bsams/ sprul pa'i
49b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rin po che'i bum pa thogs nas/ byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing/ bdag gis kyang dung phor gyi chu blangs la/ oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjod chu'i dbang bskur ro/ /spyi gtsug tu mi bskyod pa
49b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan la las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chus gtor la dbu rgyan stong par bsgoms/ de las traM ser por gyur/ de las rin chen 'byung ldan zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur te/ de las dbu rgyan byung bar bsam/
49b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ma ku Ta a b+hi Shi ny+tsa mi zhes brjod pas/ dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur bas/ rna ltag g.yas par rin chen 'byung ldan 'byung bar bsam/ de nas rdo rje la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la/ rdo rje stong par bsgom/ de las dzriM dmar por gyur/ de las
49b5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mdza' yas zhal gsum phyag drug pa gcig tu gyur/ de las rdo rje byung bar bsams la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /rdo rje yis kyang dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas/ /'di da? sangs rgyas
49b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub phyir ni rdo rje zung/ zhes brjod la/ slob ma'i snying gar lan gsum gtugs la lag pa g.yas par byin la/ oM hUM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bas/ ltag par snang ba mdza' yas 'byung bar bsam mo/
49b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas dril bu la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la stong par bsam/ de las khaM ljang gur gyur/ de las don yod grub pa zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur par bsams la 'di skad brjod de/ /gnyis med dngos po shes rab thabs/ /chos kyi dbyings
50a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag nyid can/ /lag pa g.yon par 'di thung cing/ /'khyung nas kun nas spyar nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i dngos por 'dug /ces brjod la/ oM badzra a d+hi pa ti swarya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi na ya ka /zhes brjod cing lag pa g.yon par dril
50a2(rgyud 'grel): bu byin nas dbang bskur bas/ rna ltag g.yas par don yod grub pa byung bar bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu la/ las thams cad pa'i chus gtor zhing stong par bsam/ de las yi ge hUM dkar por gyur/ de las rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum
50a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug par gyur/ de las rdo rje dril bur byung bar bsams la/ slob ma'i mtshogs mar gzung la/ oM sh+rI nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi zhes brjod pas/ me tog gang la phog pa'i rigs kyi lha'i ming gdags so/ /ming btags pas mtshogs mar rnam
50a4(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad byung bar bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la stong par bsam/ de las hUM mthing nag tu gyur/ de las rdo rje 'od 'bar ba zhig tu gyur par bsams te/ slob dpon gyi lag par rdo rje blangs la 'di skad
50a5(rgyud 'grel): do/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ zhes brjod la/ rdo rje rtse mo slob mas gzung/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM
50a6(rgyud 'grel): d+ha rA ya mi swAhA/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes brjod la/ rdo rje lag tu byin la 'di skad brjod do/ /thog ma tha ma med sems dpa' i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po bdag po'i gtso/ zhes brjod la lag tu gtad
50a7(rgyud 'grel): do/ de nas dril bu la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la stong bar bsam/ /de las A(rgyud 'grel): ra gyur/ A las dril bur gyur par bsams la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni mchog gi dngos po yin/ /shes rab sgyu mar gyur pa'o/ /rtag tu khyod kyis gzung
50b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /thog ma byang chub rgyal bas gzung/ /rdo rje mchog gi ye shes ni/ /mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu'i gzugs/ /zhes brjod la slob ma'i lag pa g.yon par sbyin/ /de nas rdo rje thugs kar gzung/ /dril bu dkar bsten la/ rdo rje
50b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i sku gsal bar bsgom/ /de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang rtsol cing/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni las rnams stsol/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid/ /ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
50b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang/ /lha yi de kho na nyid dang/ slob dpon gyi las bshad pas/ de'i don slob mas rtogs nas/ 'khor ba las mi bzlos par bsam mo/ /de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ngo/ /de nas lag par 'khor lo
50b4(rgyud 'grel): byin la/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir/ /ji ltar ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin du rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang rgya gram rnams lag tu byin zhing gong ma'i
50b5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad brjod do/ /de ni bka' stsal ba'i dbang ngo/ /de nas mdun na gnas pa'i slob ma/ sna bug g.yas pa nas nang du bcug nas/ /thig le'i 'od zer rlung gi 'od zer gyis sgrib pa dag par bsams nas/ sna bug g.yon pa nas phyir phyung la mdun du
50b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste lung bstan par bya'o/ /bdag shAkya thub par bsgoms la/ khu tshur g.yon pa snying gar chos gos mdza' nas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mchod sbyin gyi tshul du byas te/ 'di skad brjod do/ /khyod ni bdag gis lung bstan bya/ /de bzhin
50b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rdor sems yin/ /sems can thar pa grub don du/ /ngan 'gro rnams ni drang bar bgyis/ /yang dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod/ /khams gsum gyi ni thub pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu
51a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa ni yang dag pa'i/ /byang chub tu ni khyod lung bstan/ /phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu rab/ /'di gsum pa ni khyod kyis rnyed/ ces brjod do/ /de ni lung bstan pa'i dbang ngo/ /de nas dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ ji ltar zhugs pa'i slob
51a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrib pa 'byang/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su ni/ /khyed rnams skye bar the tshom med/ /sdig pa thams cad med pa ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /phyi nas shi 'pho yong med de/ /srid pa
51a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dngos grub yin/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das por ro/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das khyod yin/ /de ni dbugs 'byung ba'i dbang ngo/ /rdo rjer rab gnas rdo rje nyid/ /che dang dril bu chen po gzung/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur/ /slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis/ zhes dgyes pa rdo
51a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rgyud las 'byung ngo/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /gnod par byed la byams pa bskyed/ /rdo rje spun la bsnyen bkur bya/ /dang pa
51a5(rgyud 'grel): can la smad mi bya/ slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /rang bdag yongs su bor nas ni/ /dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bya'o/ /ji ltar bde ba bde gzung nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'ongs 'byung zhes bsgrags so/ /de ni phyi'i dbang gi dam tshig go /de nas gos dang bza' 
51a6(rgyud 'grel): ba sna tshogs dang/ btung ba sna tshogs rnams/ slob ma'i mdun du gzhag la/ gos lha'i na bza' pany+tsa li ka la sogs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ bza' ba dang btung ba bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la/ slob ma bkra shis par 'dod pa'i phyir/ bla mas bkra shis
51a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi glu blang bar bya'o/ /de ni phyi'i dbang ngo/ /nang gi dbang la yang gsum ste/ gsang dbang dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su/ gsang ba'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa zhig byas la/
51b1(rgyud 'grel): rak+ta'i chag chag dang/ rak+ta'i thig le bya'o/ /gru bzhir mda' bzhi btsugs la ras kyi yol ba bya'o/ /de'i steng du phying dkar dang ras dkar po bting ngo/ /de'i steng du phyi nang gi me tog dgram mo/ /de nas zhu ba byas te/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod pa ji ltar phul

51b3(rgyud 'grel): lon pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang/ gur gum dang/ ga bur la sogs pa'i chus bkrus la/ dar la sogs pa dri ma med pa dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag la/ bdag med mar byin gyis brlabs la/ mig la sogs
51b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs par byin gyis brlab bo/ /lus ngag yid gsum mkha' spyod ma la sogs par byin gyis brlab/ /yan lag lnga rigs lngar byin gyis brlab/ mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/ rigs kyi bdag pos dbu rgyan par bsams la/ de la
51b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod/ /bstod pas bstod la/ gnyis su med par 'khyud par bya'o/ /de nas a nu ra gA'i sngags brjod/ bskyod tsam na hUM gi glu blang/ bde ba babs tsam na pU dza'i sngags brjod/ de nas byang chub kyi sems glang po che'i lag pas
51b6(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga nas brus la/ dud chos su blugs la/ srin mtheb kyi phyag rgyas blangs la/ slob ma'i khar gdab po/ /slob mas/ ma? ho su bde'o/ /zhes brjod la/ rtog pa med par btung ngo/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba/ /bdag gi
51b7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro/ zhes dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las byung ngo/ /de ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su shes rab ye shes kyi dbang maN+Dal gru bzhi pa bzhig la mdom gang ba cig byas tsandan la
52a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang/ dri chen gyis byug /de'i steng du phyir dkar ram dar dkar gding/ phyi nang gi me tog dgram/ shes rab ma byin gyis brlab pa dang/ mchod pa la sogs snga ma dang mthun/ de nas zhu ba bya ste/ ye shes bde ba'i gnas bzhugs
52a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rgyal 'gyur rgyal 'gyur mgon po khyod/ /A li kA li gnyis bdag can/ /legs dgyes bde mtsho rgyal gyur cig /mchog dang chad pa'i dbus su ni/ /rol mdzad khyod ni rgyal gyur cig /mchog gi dbang phyug khyed kyis ni/ /shes rab ye shes dbang
52a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag stsol/ zhes bskul lo/ /de nas slob dpon gyis shes rab ma'i lag pa g.yas pa slob ma'i lag pa g.yon bar byin la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni khyod gzung bzang ba yis/ /rjes su mthun par sangs rgyas gsung/ /ye shes gsum gyi rim pa yis
52a4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bde ba myong byed cing/ /sangs rgyas rin chen snod kyi ni/ /g.yon ngos nas ni rtsa yi gnas/ de ni kha ga mu kha dngos/ /rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma nyid yin/ /thabs gzhan dag gis byang chub ni/ /nam yang rnyed par yong mi 'gyur/ /de bas lhan cig mi gnas
52a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /dus 'di thams cad ma byed cig /de nas shes rab mas 'di skad brjod/ /dri chen dri chu za ba 'di/ /kye bu khyod kyis nus sam ci/ /rak+ta shukra sha chen dang/ /bud med brtul zhugs de bzhin no/ /b+ha ga'i pad+ma 'jig nus sam/ /kye bu smros dang ji lta bu/
52a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ /slob mas smras pa/ lha mo bdag gis ci mi nus/ /rak+ta shukra sogs za nus/ /rtag tu bud med brtul zhugs bgyid/ /b+ha ga yang ni 'jib bar bya'o/ /de nas shes rab mas smras pa/ /bde ba thams cad 'dug sa ni/ /bdag gi pad rgyas e
52a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /gang 'dir rab tu byed pa yang/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i don gyis shig /ces brjod do/ /de nas slob mas b+ha ga la 'o byas nas/ 'khyud de gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems phab nas/ man ngag gis gzung ste/ ye shes nyams su/
52b1(rgyud 'grel): myong ba de ni/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ /dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las kyang/ /lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma/ khyed cig khyer cig sems dpa' che/ /khyed la mchod pa dag par byin/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /de ni shes
52b2(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo// //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su/ bzhi pa'i dbang gi maN+Dal 'dom gang ba zhig byas la/ maN+Dal la sogs pa dang/ byang chub sems kyi chag chag btab la/ de'i steng du phying dkar la sogs pa dang/ shes
52b3(rgyud 'grel): rab ma bzhag la/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rgyan dang mchod bstod la sogs pa gong ma dang mthun par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas 'di skad zhu'o/ /reg bya nang bdag nyid phyag 'tshal/ /reg bya nang 'jam phyag 'tshal lo/ /reg bya nang grol phyag 'tshal lo/ /
52b4(rgyud 'grel): reg bya nang sbyin phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba'i dbang bskur mchog 'di ni/ /mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la stsol/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas gu rus 'di skad brjod do/ /khyod kyis srog chag bsad par gyis/ /khyod kyis brdzun du smra bar bya/ /ma byin par yang khyod kyis long
52b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi bud med spyad par gyis/ /de rnams byas na sdig med cing/ /bsod nams chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de rnams khyod kyis nus na ni/ /bzhi pa'i dbang ni sbyin par bya/ /slob mas smras pa/ khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin la/ /mgon po chen po bdag gis
52b6(rgyud 'grel): nus/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas gnyis su med bar 'khyud nas/ sbyor ba byas nas bde ba chen po rig pa'i pho brang du phab nas/ gyen la rtog med ma'i bar bzlog ste gzung nas/ mi rtog pa'i ye shes nyams su myong ba'i ni rten can gyi bzhi pa'o/ /rten med
52b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bzhi pa ni/ bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// //ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing/ /rdo rje nam mkha' i dkyil lta bur/ /rdul phral? mthar phyin zhi ba nyid/ /khyod rang yang ni nga yi pha/ zhes dgyes ba rdo rje'i rgyud las 'byung ngo/ /de dag ni dbang bskur
53a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thabs so// //bum pa'i lha gshegs su gsol ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /bum pa'i lha gshegs su gsol ba ni/ bum pa la mchod bstod byas la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dz+nyA na maN+Da la mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod
53a2(rgyud 'grel): la gshegs su gsol/ dkyil 'khor lha yang de dang mthun// //dkyil 'khor bsdu ba la yang gnyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha bsdu ba dang/ rdul tshon bsdu ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha bsdu ba ni/ thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros nas/ dkyil
53a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha 'od kyi tshul du bsdus nas/ thugs ka'i hUM las bsdus la bdag dang gnyis su med par bya'o/ /rdul tshon bsdu ba ni a kA ro'i sngags bzlas shing ra ri med par bya'o/ /bsdus la chu chen po la dor ro/ /bgegs bsrung ba la sogs pa yod na
53a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya'o/ /dngos grub mi yal bar bya ba'i phyir/ dri'i chus dkyil 'khor du maN+Dal byas la/ lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i me tog dgod do// //dbang bskur ba'i cho ga slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA sh+ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
53a5(rgyud 'grel): !/ (/kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he badzra maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes/
53a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad rdo rje'i bsnyen pa 'bum dang khri song bas/ gnas dben par rigs can smin par byas te/ der maN+Dal 'dab brgyad dmar po rdo rjes bskor ba 'khyams dang bcas pa byas nas me tog gi tshom bu dgu dgod do/ /bum pa gnyis la rdzas dang/ rgyan cha
53a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas/ dbus dang byang shar du bkod nas/ de la bla re dang yol ba la sogs pas brgyan no/ /da la'i phyogs bzhir mchod pa lnga tshan bzhi dang/ gtor ma lnga dang/ tshogs kyi yo byad kyis bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon khrus byas
53b1(rgyud 'grel): stan bde ba la bskyed rdzogs bsgoms nas/ skad cig gis bum pa stong ba'i ngang las b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang gi dbus su paM las pad+ma'i sdong po'i steng du/ pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad/ de'i lte ba la nyi ma dang bdud bzhi'i ro'i steng du cho ga lnga 'aM/
53b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum mam/ skad cig gis he ru ka zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa 'am/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yum dang bcas pa bskyed/ pad 'dab brgyad la a las bdag med ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa brgyad bskyed do/ /de nas rang gi hUM gi
53b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis ye shes pa spyan drangs la/ mchod bstod dang yab yum gyi sngags bzhi la bsnyen pa ci grub byas nas yang mchod de/ lha rnams bdud rtsir bzhu'o/ /las bum du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed nas/ bsnyen pa byas la des slob ma la khrus/
53b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gral la 'khod pa la skyabs 'gro sems bskyed/ gsol ba gdab pa/ gnang ba sbyin pa rtog pa bsdu ba/ yan lag lnga bya ba/ sdom pa gzung ba dang/ dam bsgrag pa rnams gzhung bzhin byas la/ ye shes dbab par bya'o//
53b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas bla ma la dbang bskur zhu ba'i gsol ba gdab pa ni/ he ru ka dpal dbang bskur ba/ /'gro skyob phyir na gzi brjid can/ /de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas rdzogs/ /de bzhin bdag la deng gsol cig /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod
53b6(rgyud 'grel): chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang skyob pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje deng bdag gsol/ /ces gsol ba btab pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang nam mkha' i lha tshogs kyi thugs ka nas lha mo bdud rtsi'i bum chu thogs pa rang/ gsang ba'i chu
53b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas/ lus kyi sdig sgrib dag par bsams nas/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum las/ /rab tu byung bas sbyin par bya/ /zhes brjod pas bum dbang
54a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par bsam/ /de bzhin mgrin par gsang dbang/ snying gar shes rab ye shes/ lte bas dbang bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan don 'ba' zhig gi dbang ngo/ /de nas rang gzhan rnams la rgyun tu dbang bzhi bskur ba bshad par bya ste/
54a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi spyi bor paM las gyur pa'i pad+ma'i sdong po'i steng du/ pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad kyi lte bar nyi ma dang/ ro'i steng du cho ga gsum mam/ skad cig la he badzra yum med cig bsam/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad la nyi ma dang ro'i steng du/ a las
54a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag med ma bde ba rgyas pa brgyad bsam mo/ /de nas gong bzhin gsol ba btab la/ spyi bo'i lha tshogs rnams la 'od zer dpag tu med pa byung nas/ rang gi lus phyi nang thams cad 'od kyis khyab pa las/ las dang nyon mongs
54a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrib pa thams cad sangs dag nas/ lus 'od kyi rang bzhin du bsam/ des bdag nyid he badzra yum med pa zhig tu gyur pa na bum pa'i dbang ngo/ /de nas yang gsol ba btab pas/ spyi bo'i lha mo bde ba rgyas nas 'od du 'dus te/ yab la
54a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud nas yab yum gnyis sbyor ba byas pas sbyor 'tshams nas byang sems dkar dmar gnyis bde phri li li byung nas lce thog tu babs pas/ bde ba skyes pa ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo/ /lha tshogs la yang gsol ba btab pas/ gtso bo'i
54a6(rgyud 'grel): yum las bdag med ma gcig chad nas byung ste/ rang he badzra la 'khyud nas bsrub pa'i sbyor ba byas pas lus la zag med kyi bde ba chen po skyes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ /de nas spyi bo'i lha tshogs la mchod pas lha gdan dang//
54a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa spyi bor thim nas/ lha sku mnga' bas gsal ba'i gsal stong 'dzin med bde ba chen po la mnyam par gzhag go /mdor na snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba
54b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyag rgya chen po 'ba' zhig la bzhag par bya'o/ /de ni dbang bzhi pa'o/ /de nas yaM raM kaM /a las byung ba'i nang du sna tshogs rdzas rnams sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar legs par sbyangs nas/ lha tshogs rnams
54b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing/ rnal 'byor pa rnams rol par bya'o/ /gtor ma lnga ni gong bzhin sbyangs la 'byung po thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bla ma dang/ dgyes mdzad dang/ chos skyong dang/ gzhi bdag dang/ gnod byed rnams tshim par byas nas/ rdo rje'i glu blang/
54b3(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs pa mchod bstod dang/ bshags pa byas nas/ bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyis/ bcom ldan dgyes mdzad rdo rje mnyes byas te/ /pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs byas nas/ /'gro kun rdo rje rgyal po thob par
54b4(rgyud 'grel): shog /ces pa bsngo ba bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang thams cad mgrin gcig tu smon lam gdab pa ni/ rigs su skye dang dam tshig can/ /mnyam med skye'i rdo rje ston/ /bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /lag pa rdo rje
54b5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang/ btsun mo'i zhu ba mnyam za zhing/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /ces brjod de/ de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya zhing bzod gsol bya/ bkra shis brjod/ ye shes pa gshegs/ dam tshig
54b6(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi bor bsdu/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis mnyes par bya'o/ /dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma ni gu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje ye shes mkha' 'gro ma de nyid
54b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lo tsa ba glan dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ he badzra Sho Da sa b+hu dzaM sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ brtse ba'i rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 
55a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig goms pa'i ro myong ba/ rtsam gyis dngos por 'dzin pa 'di/ /ring du spong zhing yon tan rnams/ /'od gyur he ru ka de 'dud/ /tho rangs mal nas langs la/ /snying gar raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil
55a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bltas la/ de'i 'od kyis bdag nyid dri ma med par byas nas/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ gnas dang/ bdag nyid dang/ rnal 'byor srung ba byas la/ bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs nas/ stan bde ba la
55a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug ste/ oM badzra re khe h+ri zhes bya bas maN+Dal byas la/ oM badzra mi di ni badzri b+ha ba badzra band+ha hUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil du/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba brjod nas me tog gzhag par bya'o/ /shar du ni gaM gau rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /lhor ni
55a4(rgyud 'grel): tsaM tsau rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /nub tu ni baM bet+tA lI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /byang du ni g+haM g+hasma rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /dbang ldan du ni paM puk+ka sI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /me'i mtshams su shaM sha ba rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /bden bral du ni tsaM tsaN+Da lI na ma:
55a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /rlung mtshams su ni DaM DoM bi na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod la/ bdag med ma la yang/ oM a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI/ e Ai o a'au aM swAhA/ zhes
55a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sngags kyis mchod do/ /yang bcom ldan 'das la/ oM aSh+Na? na nA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ping+ga urd+ha ke sha barta ma ne na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM tsa turbi sha ti ne trA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM Sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM kriSh+Na dzI mU ta wa pu She na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ka pA la mA lA a ne ka d+ha ri Na na ma:
55a7(rgyud 'grel): oM Ad+hma ta krU ra tsit+tA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): ard+hendu daMSh+Twi Ne ni na ma(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i tshig brgyad kyis mchod par bya ste/ oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gand+ha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai bi dye A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog la sogs pa
55b1(rgyud 'grel): phul la/ lan gsum gyi bar du skyabs gsum gyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod do/ /yang mchod pa byas nas phyag btsal la/ gtor ma byin nas badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sems can thams cad lha'i bde ba la dgod par 'dod
55b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byams pa dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad bsal bar 'dod pa'i snying rje dang/ lha'i bde ba rgyun mi 'chad par nges par 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang/ bla na med pa'i lam la nye bar dgod par 'dod pa'i btang snyoms bsgoms par bya'o/ /yang yid kyis chos
55b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la dmigs nas dpyad na stong pa 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor bltas la/ oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de ma thag tu raM las byung ba'i nyi ma la aM dang hUM bltas la/ de'i 'od kyis dpag tu med
55b4(rgyud 'grel): cing mdza' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas/ yi ge gnyis po de nyid du yang dag par bsdus nas zhugs par bsams pas/ yud tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs par bcom
55b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal brgyad pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ zhabs bzhis gshegs pa bdud bzhi'i snying gar skyil krung phyed pa gar gyis mnan pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba/ 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin
55b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i mdog gi lus can khro ba dang bcas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi mnga' ba/ phyag bcu drug na bsnams pa'i thod pa/ g.yas kyi rnams na glang po che dang/ rta dang/ bong bu dang/ glang dang/ rnga mo dang/ mi dang/
55b7(rgyud 'grel): sha ra ba dang/ byi la rnams gnas pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i brgyad na/ sa dang chu dang rlung dang/ me dang zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ gshin rje dang/ nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'phrog pa/ gri gug dang/
56a1(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bsnams pa'i bdag med mas 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid can bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes snying gar nyi ma la hUM bltas la/ bdag med ma'i snying gar yang zla ba la yi ge aM blta zhing spyi bor ni yi ge oM mo/ /mgrin par ni A'o/ /snying gar yi
56a2(rgyud 'grel): ge hUM bkod la/ mig la gti mug rdo rje ma/ rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ sna la ser sna rdo rje ma/ kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ yid la bdag med ma bkod la/ snying ga'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs nas/ oM a b+hi shiny+tsa tu
56a3(rgyud 'grel): mA sarba ta thA ga ta zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur bas/ me tog dang/ gur gum gyi char yang dbab par bsam/ lha mo rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid la bstod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /
56a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas dub par gyur na yang sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM de wa pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya'o/ /langs pa'i dus su lha mo rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi nang du bsgoms la/ lha'i gzugs kyis gnas par bya'o/ /bsgom pa'i dang por yang
56a5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du A las thod pa'o/ /de'i steng du go ku da ha na/ ma ra mu su bi/ zhes bya ba'i rdzas rnams oM gyis byin
56a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs la bsgoms nas/ steng du yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dkar po ste/ rdo rje dang pad+ma snyoms par zhugs pa las me 'bar bas tshos shing khu bar gyur pa de'i 'od kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs mthong ba las/ de
56a7(rgyud 'grel): dag gi thugs kyi sa bon gyi bdud rtsi bsdus nas/ der chud par byas nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /'di lta bu ni gtor ma la sogs pa'i rdzas dag par bya ba'i cho ga 'o/ /nam mkha' las chos 'byung gi nang du pad+ma 'dab
56b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa'i lte ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'am/ dpa' bo gcig pu 'am/ phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dbang po la sogs pa rang rang gi rig mas mgul nas 'khyud ba/ zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ kha dog nag po mi
56b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i cod pan can/ rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa bltas la/ de'i steng du tshangs pa de bzhin du kha dog dkar po/ rnam par snang mdzad cod pan du 'dzin par blta bar bya'o/ /'og tu sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu la sogs pa rnams la/ kha dog
56b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po snang ba mdza' yas kyi cod pan byas la blta bar bya'o/ /thams cad kyi lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma la hUM las rdo rje dkar por bsgoms la/ snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i gau ri la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i bdud rtsis
56b4(rgyud 'grel): dgang bar bya'o/ /de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ inda dza ma dza la dzagkha b+hU ta bah+ni ba yu rak+Sha tsanda sU dzdza mA ta bap+pa tA la pa tA le aTTha sap+pa swAhA/ i daM ba liM b+huM dza dziM g+ha phul+la d+hU pa mAM sa piM g+ha amha sarba kAdzdza sA d+ha khAn+ti khU Ni phe Da gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM
56b5(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmmA NAM Adya nutpan+na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ bsang gtor sbyin par bya ste/ oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+ha:d+harmA/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpA pa na ya hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis so/ /yid kyis mchod pa byas
56b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol lo/ /zas kyi dus su yang de bzhin du zas kyi rdzas rnams sbyar nas/ bdag nyid kyi lce la hUM las rdo rje dkar por byas la/ snying gar bcom ldan 'das bltas la de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa
56b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsdus nas/ ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon las byung ba'i mes/ kha zas kyi rdzas rnams sbyangs shing sbyin sreg byed do/ /chags pa'i dus su yang shes rab ma bdag med ma'i gzugs su mos pa byas nas/ de'i mgo bo la 
57a1(rgyud 'grel): oM snying gar hUM/ pad+ma'i lte ba la A(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas/ oM pad+ma su kha d+hA ra ma hA ra ga su khaM dat+ta tsa tu rA nanda b+ha ga bi shwa hUM hUM hUM karyaM ku ru Shwa me zhes bya ba 'dis pad+ma byin gyis brlabs la/ bdag nyid la yi ge gsum bkod la/ hUM las rdo rje
57a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas/ oM las de'i nor bu'o/ /oM badzra mahA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nanda da ya ka kha ga mu khe a ka rA so nA tha hUM hUM karyaM ku ru Shwa me/ zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas/ sIM sIM sIM/ ha ha ha/ zhes bya bas chags pa brtsam par bya'o/ /bla ma'i man ngag gis skad
57a3(rgyud 'grel): cig ma mtshon par byas nas/ rdzogs pa dang bdud rtsi de bdud rtsi len gyis blangs la bdag nyid tshim par bya'o/ /nyal ba'i dus su lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du sna tshogs 'dis mos par byas la gnyid log par bya'o/ /byis pa rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir
57a4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa mgon po zhal brgyad pa'i/ /bdag gi sgrub thabs byas pa des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /dpal dgyes pa rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ paN+Di ta Atsarya kriSh+Na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
57a5(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI he badzra ba li kra ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i rim pa/ dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /yi ge gnyis las yang dag byung/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso/ /he ru ka
57a6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal te/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ldan pa'i/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdud rtsi gtor ma dbul ba yi/ /cho ga'i thabs kyi rim pa bshad/ /de la gtor ma'i dgos pa ni/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sbyin sreg dang mchod
57a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sgrub pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas phan gdags pa dang/ tshar gcad pa dang/ rigs kyi bu dag tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang/ yams dang nad med par 'dod pa dang/ mu ge zhi bar 'dod pa dang/ gnod pa zhi bar 'dod pa dang/ dpal dang grags
57b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'phel bar 'dod pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang/ longs spyod dang 'byor pa 'dod pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pa mkhas pas
57b2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i las la brtson par bya'o/ /de yang gang zhig ce na gzhung las/ bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang lha rnams 'go bar bya ba dang/ dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma'i las 'di ci nus brtsam/ zhes 'byung ngo/ /yang kha cig las/

57b4(rgyud 'grel): dgra yi sde 'joms shing/ /dgar dang bsad dang dgug par byed pa dang/ /zhi zhing bde dang rgyas par byed pa yin/ zhes 'byung ngo/ /yang slob dpon kha cig gis/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ /dngos grub cho ga thams cad la/ /dpal ldan
57b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu bsngags/ /shes 'byung bas/ gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu phan yon che'o/ /de la 'dir ni sngags pas 'byung po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la gtor ma sbyin dgos te/ lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang
57b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /klu chen brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad/ 'khor du gtogs pa'i brgyad po rnams/ /rang rang 'khor dang bcas rnams la/ /rgyun tu 'am ni zla ba 'am/ de bzhin lo cig rgyun 'khor raM/ /zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bcu dang/ /mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu la//
57b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bzlas pa dang/ /de bzhin gnod byung dus dag gam/ /ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa dang/ /rang gi ji ltar rjes mthun par/ /ci 'byor pa yi yo byad kyis/ /nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin/ zhes 'byung ngo/ /de la gtor ma'i g.yos kyang ji
58a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar zhe na/ me tog bdug spos mar me byug pa dang/ spyan? rnams dang ni dri dang lha bshos dang/ /tshod ma dag dang la du khur ba dang/ /zan dron dang ni drug cu bar bcas dang/ /phye sogs byas pa bsres nas ni/ /'bras can 'bras  
58a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyi nang 'bru bdun dang/ /zho dang 'bru mar 'o thug sogs pa bsre/ /khrag dang sha dang sran ma nya sha sogs/ /sbyar chang 'bru chang sna tshogs chen la sogs/ /btsos dang rjen dang snying dang bcas pa rnams/ /ji bzhin bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres byas
58a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /de dag kun gyis snod rnams bkang nas su/ /bum pa chus bkang ba yi steng du bzhag /khur ba zan du mar me steng du gtam/ /mtshan mo'i dus su de dag la yang dbul/ zhes 'byung bas/ drag po la ni dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan steng du bzhag go /
58a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma kha dog las kyis bsgyur ro/ /de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni/ /de dang por bdag nyid lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por gsal bar bsgoms/ thog ma nam mkha' lta bu la/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor yi gis mtshan pa/ raM las
58a5(rgyud 'grel): me'i dkyil 'khor raM gyis mtshan pa/ de'i steng du a las thod pa/ de'i nang du nyi ma'i steng du hUM bruM aM dziM khaM dang go kun da ha na las/ lcags kyu lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lngar bskyed do/ /de'i steng gi du hUM las rdo rje a las zla ba la phyed nub pa'o/
58a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du oM gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs/ a(rgyud 'grel): sa gzi byin bskyed/ hUM gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang/ dam tshig gi bdud rtsi gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du gru gsum chos 'byung nang du pad+ma sum 
58a7(rgyud 'grel): rtseg bsam ste/ dang po pad+ma dkar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje dkar po las lha brgyad oM las bskyed pas bskor/ bar du pad+ma sngon po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje sngon po la hUM las bskyed pa'i phyogs skyong bcu sngon pos bskor//
58b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu pad+ma dmar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje dmar po la a las bskyed pa'i klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ro/ /mgron spyan drang ba'i phyir rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM e a ra li ho(rgyud 'grel): h+riM h+riM h+riM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA ka NA kI nI/ badzra dri sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya ho/
58b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ pheM gsum brjod pa dang bcas pa las/ snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM lha brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen brgyad/ /bka' bzhin 'khor du gtegs pa rnams/ /dam tshig dgongs te gnas 'dir
58b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ /gzhan yang gru gsum khongs gtogs pa'i/ /zhing skyong tshogs la 'di lta ste/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ /ri bo dang ni ri sul phug /grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang/ /gdol pa'i snod dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni
58b4(rgyud 'grel): mtsho la gnas/ /ma mo yi ni gnas rnams nas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha byin mnyam du bsten pa dang/ /nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug dang/ /dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byad mo dang drag mo dang/ /brjed byed ma dang u ma dang/ /rgyal dang
58b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba dang/ /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag mo sdang mo 'chang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me mo/ /sum cu ma dang dbang mo dang/ /'jigs byed grong
58b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng phreng chen kha TwAM ma/ /sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu chen me/ /de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso//
58b7(rgyud 'grel): las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig /oM kak+ka Dha
59a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ ba bba nd+ha na/ kha kh+kha dA na sarba duSh+Ta naM ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ he badzra maN+Dal sa pa ri wA re b+hyo A karSha ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas bkug la pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas mchod pas mchod de/ oM ku ru ku ru a d+hi pa ti tiSh+Tha
59a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi lha la thim pa'i rjes su/ lce pad+ma'i steng du hUM las rdo rjer byin gyi brlab po/ /de nas pad+ma'i lag pa kha phye ste/ gtor ma la gtad nas gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags brjod do/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): ho:
59a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra b+hai ra tA ya/ badzra b+hai bi ya/ dzau ga dzau gi ni/ sarba lo ki ka lo kaut+ta ra/ sarba DA ka DA ki nIShtsa b+hyo/ badzra gau rI/ badzra tsau rI/ badzra bet+tA lI/ badzra g+hAsma rI/ badzra puk+ka sI/ badzra sa pa rI/ badzra tsaN+Da lI/ badzra Dom+bi nI/ a ti kaM/ sa pa ri wA re b+hyo/ i daM ba liM/ gand+ha/
59a4(rgyud 'grel): puShpa/ d+hU pa/ dI pa/ ak+Sha taM/ da da ma hi te dza/ a kastya/ sa pa ri wA ro b+hyo/ i daM ba liM/ grih+Na na tu dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): saM trapta/ sarba sa twa ni shan+tiM ku ru/ puSh+Ti ku ru/ rak+Sha taM ku ru/ a ba na ku ru/ gubtiM ka ro du/ kurdandu hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ i daM ba liM kha kha khA hi khA hi
59a5(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo/ dza dza dza dza/ badzra b+ha ro adzrSha? pa ya ti swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ ma nu Sha a ma nu Sha/ a su ra/ gand+harb+ha/ g+huM b+hai ra g+hi d+ha ri/ ga ru De b+hu ta/ pre ta pi shA tsa/ a basma ra/ u man+ta/ sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta ra/ badzra TA ka rA ki ni
59a6(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri wA ri b+hyo/ i maM sarba pU dza gand+ha/ puShpa d+hu pa dI paM/ nai bi dyaM/ ak+Sha taM da da ma hi te tsa/ a gat+tyA sa pa rI bA re b+hya(rgyud 'grel): i daM ba liM grih+Nandu/ kha daon+tu/ pi ban+tu dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): ma ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma m sid+d+himme pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya the baM/ ya teSh+Tha b+hu ? ho/ ma taM kra ma tha/
59a7(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sarba karta ya satshu khaM/ bi shud+d+ha/ ye sa ha ka ye ka/ b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT/ badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ oM inda dza ma dza la dzak+Sha b+hu ta bah+ni ba u rak+Sha/ tsanda sU dzdza ma ta la bap+pa ta la pA tA la/ aTTha sap+pa sAd+ha/ i daM ba li b+huny+dza dzi g+haM/ puShpa/ d+hU pa/ dI paM mAM sa am+ba
59b1(rgyud 'grel): kats+tsha swA b+hA? ban+ti? khu Ni phaT gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbba d+harmA NI Adya nutpan+na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis yang bsngo ba ni oM lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'khor bcas dang/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang/
59b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /srin po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /yi dags tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /sha za'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /smyo byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /brjed byed
59b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang/ /de la sogs pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs/ /ma lus tshogs bcas ji snyed rnams/ /'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di snoms la/ /
59b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la/ /nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang/ /dpal dang grags dang skal pa bzang/ /longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing/ /zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi/ /las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /dam tshig can gyis bdag la bsrung/ /dngos
59b5(rgyud 'grel): grub kun gyi gtong grogs mdzod/ /dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang/ /gdon dang bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /byang byed ngan pa zhi bar mdzod/ /'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang/ /'bru rnams rgyas shing 'phel
59b6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod/ /bde legs thams cad grub pa dang/ /yid la 'dod pa 'grub par shog /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun/ /de la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs/ /drag cing gtum pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs/ /ma rung sems can ming 'di long/ /dag
59b7(rgyud 'grel): cing snying rje med pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo dang/ /mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin sha za dang/ /lto 'phye dang ni srin po dang/ /gzhan yang sha za khrag 'thung ba'i/ /khyi dang khra dang ki ka dang/ /'ol pa bya rgod la sogs pa'i/ /gzugs can thams cad 'dir
60a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs shig /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la/ /gnod par byed pa 'di zhes pa/ /chung ma nor dang srog dang ni/ /'dod pa rnams ni 'phrog par mdzod/ /rang gi yul nas 'byung ba dang/ /dgar ba dang ni bskrad par gyis/ /bdag gi dpung ni
60a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs med la/ /dgra ni stobs ldan kho na ste/ /'di nyid khyod kyis bza' ba'i phyir/ /sha dang khrag dang zhag dang rkang/ /bza' ba skom dang bcas pa mdzod/ /dgra lus gsol ba dgra mdangs phrogs/ /rang gi rnal 'byor ci rigs par/ /long la
60a3(rgyud 'grel): za ba nyid du gyis/ /thams cad tshim par bzhes su gsol/ /gang gis bdag la mi tshugs shing/ /dgra 'di thams cad choms par mdzod/ /bdag la las kyi dngos grub ni/ /rgya chen yongs su stsal nas kyang/ /nyid kyi gnas dang yul du gshegs/
60a4(rgyud 'grel): ci nus 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la/ /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /pus mo lha nga sa la btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyod la gsol ba ni/ /btsun mo dang ni sras dang g.yog tu bcas/ /gsan cing 'dir gshegs
60a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bka' drin skyabs/ /bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang/ /gsang sngags rig sngags mthu dag dang/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyi mthus/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags pas/ /don rnams
60a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bsam pa kun/ /sems can khams ni ma lus bar/ /de dag thams cad ci rigs par/ /thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig /sngags pa gang zhig dgra bgegs tshar bcad par 'dod pa des/ /gzugs gtor ma'i steng du bzhag la/ /gnod sbyin
60a7(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa mi gdug pa'i gzugs can/ pho nya grangs med pas zos 'thungs par bsam zhing/ /gtor ma bstabs cing 'di skad las btsol lo/ /oM ma lus zhing na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dang/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung khro rgyal 'jigs byed
60b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /dam can rgya mtsho ma lus dgongs su gsol/ /thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing/ /gdul dka' drag po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ sgyu ma lta bur cir yang ston mdzad pa/ /gtum
60b2(rgyud 'grel): chen rab rngam tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan bstan pa 'jig dus 'dis/ /bdud dang mu stegs log par lta ba rnams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas/ /tshaM rngaM drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar
60b3(rgyud 'grel): khas blangs shing/ /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po dang/ /lha yi dbang po 'dod pa'i lha/ /khyab 'jug tshogs kyi bdag po dang
60b4(rgyud 'grel): b+h+riM gi ri ti'i gzhon nu dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug 'dod lha dang/ /nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dang/ /smin drug la sogs khyung gi mgo /mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas/ /rdo rje sku yi dam tshig can/ /dkar po rtag pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /
60b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te/ /'khor lo dang ni dril bu 'brel/ /rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor/ /'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan/ /dus mdza' i me chen klong dkyil na/ /hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs
60b6(rgyud 'grel): par sgrogs/ /steng gi lha tshogs bcas pa yi/ /nam mkha' i ro zhon khyod kyis ni/ /dam tshig phrin las dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+d+ra ru ti rak+ta dang/ ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang/ /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag
60b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang/ /rdo rje spun dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing/ slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las
61a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus pa gsol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang
61a2(rgyud 'grel): grol drongs/ /sngon gyi dam pas ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing/ /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu bdug pa 'dul
61a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i/ /brgya byin gshin rje chu bdag dang/ /gnod sbyin dbang dag me yi lha/ /srin po rlung lha la sogs pa/ /srin po'i mgo can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas/ /rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig can//
61a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bus brel/ /rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor/ /'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang brkum gnas/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan/ /dus mdza' i me
61a5(rgyud 'grel): chen klong dkyil na/ /hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs/ /bar gyi mi tshogs bcas pa yi/ /bar snang ro zhon khyod kyis ni/ /dam tshig phrin las dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+t+ra ru ti rak+ta dang/ /ye shes dam
61a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig bdud rtsi dang/ /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang/ /rdo rje spun dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing/ /
61a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spod dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir lug la/ /rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /sngon
61b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus pa rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs/ /sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing/ /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal
61b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /stobs rgyu dung skyong mdza' yas dang/ /nor rgyas bu dang 'jog po dang/ /rigs ldan pad+ma chen po dang/ /pad+ma la sogs chu srin mgo /mgyogs/
61b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gshogs pas gdengs ka byas/ /rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig can/ /dmar po gar dbang dbu rgyan ldan/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te/ /pad+ma dang ni dril bus brel/ /rig ma dang ni mnyam du spyod/ /'jigs pa'i tshul gyis
61b4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang brkum gnas/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan/ /dus mdza' i me chen slong dkyil na/ /hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs/ /'og gi klu tshogs bcas pa yi/ /sa 'og ro zhon khyod kyis ni/ /dam tshig thugs dam dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka
61b5(rgyud 'grel): yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+ta ru ti rak+ta dang/ /ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang/ /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob mar bcas/ /rdo rje spun dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs
61b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sngags brgyad ye shes sun 'byin cing/ /slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /rdul dang/
61b7(rgyud 'grel): thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus pa rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs/ /sngon gyi ngam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnam 'grub par mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing/ /bstan pa/
62a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad ma/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pa na/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor tshogs/ /zhing skyong drag po ro langs dang/
62a2(rgyud 'grel): ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs tshogs/ /sha za brjed byed srul po dang/ /nam gru log 'dren la sogs pa/ /gnod sbyin sa bdag gdug pa'i 'dre/ /la la srin po'i zhal can la/ /mi yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /la la N stag gi mgo can la/ mi yi lus can rngam pa'i gzugs/ /la la seng ge'i mgo can la/ /srin po'i gzugs can shin tu khro/ /la la mkha' lding mgo can la/ /klu yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /de bzhin bya yi
62a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo can dang/ /gcan zan lus can sna tshogs rnams/ /la la khro zhing la la rngam/ /la la zhi zhing la la gtum/ /la la 'gying zhing la la lding/ /la la sha za khrag 'thung brtson/ /la la khro gtum 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /la la rab brtson khro
62a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyer can/ /la la bzhad gang ha ha sgrogs/ /la la 'brug skad bzhin tu ldir/ /la la rngam skad pheM pheM sgrogs/ /la la mkha' stong gar gyis 'gengs/ /la la rtsub cing la la gnag /la la dkar zhing rnam par gsal/ /la la dmar zhing
62a5(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i mdog /la la sngo zhing sdang ba'i tshul/ /la la ser po dbyibs mdog rgyas/ /la la khro gnyer smin bu rtsub/ /la la smin bu gyen du 'khyil/ /skra 'khyil nam mkha' i dbyibs su khyab/ /zhal gdangs mche gtsigs khrag 'thung ba'i/ /ljags
62a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dril mche ba dmar pos tsigs/ /spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can/ /rus pa'i gtsar phreng sbrul gyis brgyan/ /khrag zhag tshil gyis tshom bus brgyan/ /glang chen ko rlon rnam par bshal/ /stag gi pags pas sham thabs byas/ /na bza' mi yi
62b1(rgyud 'grel): pags blag gsol/ /la la rdo rje gtun shing dang/ /ral gri chu gri la sogs pa'i/ /lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /la la gar gyis phyag rgyas sbyor/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dir/ /phyi rol 'byung po'i tshogs bcas rnams/ /sa stengs ro zhon
62b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig phrin las dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+ta ru ti rak+ta dang/ /ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang/ /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang/ /rdo rje spun
62b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing/ /slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug pa'i sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /
62b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus la rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs/ /sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub pad
62b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /de nas gsang ba'i las bzhi bya/ /de nas rdo rje'i glu brjod/ /de nas chos bshad de/ oM chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /rgyu dang las la kun tu 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid la nges par skyes/ /bden
62b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dis ni dkyil 'khor du/ /kun gyi dri ma med mthong shog /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba der/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog /de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ /oM shI la tsaN+Da na le pe taM a gad+d+hya ni pra b+ha ra Na/
62b7(rgyud 'grel): po taM ka ku su mi kI ra NaM bi ha ra taM/ bud+d+ha bi sha ya/ pu na rA ga ma na ya mu(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho bo b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi mme pra yats+tsha/ sarba rka rma suts+tsha
63a1(rgyud 'grel): me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzri b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): de nas bkra shis brjod/ /oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos
63a2(rgyud 'grel): grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ ces pas rang bzhin gyi mgron gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gi 'gron yi ge gsum du byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bsdu'o/ /
63a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa yi ser sna dang/ /dbul ba'i dri ma sbyang ba dang/ /dngos grub myur du thob pa dang/ /'gro rnams bkod par 'phel phyir byas/ /dge bas 'gro kun byang chub mchog /rin chen gling du myur 'gro shog /dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i
63a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon chen po a la la badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta kas+tha pa ga thA ga ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ba liM
63a5(rgyud 'grel): karma kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum po dang/ /de yi chos skyong srungs ma la/ /bzod gsol don du 'dud pa dang/ /rgyu yi phyir kyang phyag
63a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba dang/ /snga ma'i lan chags bral ba dang/ /'phral gyis bar chad nyer zhi'i phyir/ /gtor ma rgyun tu btang bar bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po dang/ /phrin las rnam bzhi rtsom pa dang/ /dbang
63a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur chen po byed pa'i tshe/ /gtor ma'i rim pa 'di ltar bya/ /yo byad dang ni bca' thabs dang/ /dgong rim dang yang byin rlabs dang/ /dbul dang dbang bskur dbye ba bdun/ /las kyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa'o/ /sha dang bdud rtsi zas lnga dang/ /
63b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang bza' btung sna tshogs te/ /gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun la/ /mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bya/ /mdor na sna tshogs pa yi rdzas/ /sdig pa med cing gnod pa med/ /yo byad dam par 'di bshad do/ /gzhan yang gtor ma chen po
63b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /shin tu che ba'i snod dag tu/ /mchod pa'i bye brag kha zas kyis/ /khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu/ /a shwadtha yi shing dag la/ /gru gsum phyag rgya byas te bzhag /gru gsum rtse la mar me gsum/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu btang par bya/ /
63b3(rgyud 'grel): de ru 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang/ /gdugs dang phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag /de'i dbus su zan kham gsum/ /steng du band+ha mtshan bzangs dag /khrag chen dag gis gang bar bzhag /gzhan yang mdzes pa'i snod dag tu/ /khengs par bkang
63b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng dag tu/ /'phan dang rgyal mtshan gdugs rnams gzugs/ /mar me gcig kyang rtag tu gtang/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang phyogs skyong ni/ /mdzes pa'i snod du rdzas rnams kyis/ /legs par bkang ste bzhag par bya/ /tshogs dang
63b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi rol pa yin/ /lhag ma dag la lhag ma bya/ /kun kyang gcan zan rjes bzhin nam/ /las kyi dbyibs dang sbyar bar bya/ /chang dang khrag dang chu yis sbyang/ /gtor chen rtsa ba'i dbus su bzhag /yang na byang shar mtshams
63b6(rgyud 'grel): su bzhag /lhag ma lho yi phyogs su'o/ /phyogs skyong shar ta mkha' 'gro nub/ /shin tu lhag ma mdun nam byang/ /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /a las snod kyi nang dag tu/ /aM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de yi dbus
63b7(rgyud 'grel): dang phyogs mtshams su/ /hUM bruM aM dzriM khaM/ na go ku da ha/ dri chu dri chen khrag dang ga pur shel/ /mi dang ba lang khyi glang rta/ /de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam/ /de las rigs lnga yab yum bsam/ /de steng oM las zla ba ste/ /de steng hUM las rdo
64a1(rgyud 'grel): rje bsam/ /phaT kyi 'bud cing 'bar ba dang/ /bsros te dros pas yab yum rol/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu dag na gnas pa yi/ /bde gshegs ye shes byang chub sems/ /sems can rnams kyi
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bkrag gzi mdangs/ /rtsi shing nags tshal bcud bsdus te/ /slar yang ji bzhin dgug par bya/ /thim nas thams cad 'od du zhu/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis byin gyis brlabs/ /las kyi skabs la bab pa dang/ /gtor chen band+ha'i nang du ni/ /sgrub thabs
64a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin bsgoms nas su/ /de yi phyir rims par khyams la/ /lha brgyad 'khor bcas mos pas bsgom/ /gnyis pa la ni phyogs skyong dang/ /de bzhin gsum par klu chen brgyad/ /'khor dang bcas pa mos pas so/ /tshogs kyi rdzas
64a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams grangs pa la/ /bsang gtor byas te byin gyis brlab/ /phud bkrod pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blang/ /sngags 'di brjod cing dbul bar bya/ /oM e hye badzra i daM ba liM khA hi/ lha rnams kun la de bzhin dbul/ /bsrung ba'i dbang
64a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags brjod cing dbul/ /bstod cing rdo rje glu yang blang/ /de nas lhag ma'i phud bkros te/ /gru gsum zla ba'i steng dag tu/ /bdag nyid kyi yi rdo rjer bsgom/ /de yi khyams la mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor dang bcas pa mos pas bsam
64a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa la ni dbang phyug ma/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba rig drug dang/ /dmigs kyis yul gyi lha 'dre rnams/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas su/ /oM e hye hi/ sarba yo gi ni/ sarba DA kI ni/ brahma Ni ru tra ni/ mahe shwa ri/ peSh+Na pe/ bA rA hi/ na ya sid+ga
64a7(rgyud 'grel): a ya te/ agna ye/ ba ru Na ye ba ya be ku ma ri ko be ra/ ga ru Ni/ pasna ki /b+hi na ya ki /b+he pa sa tri b+he pra ma ni/ b+heska ri tsa muN+Da/ sarba de ba/ sarba a su ra/ sarba ma nu Sha/ sarba tir ya ga /sarba pre ta ga /sarba nA ra ga /sarba d+hU ha/ pI shA tsa/ uSh+manda a basma
64b1(rgyud 'grel): ra ta ya/ mos pa'i tshul du spyan drang mchod/ pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blangs la dbul/ /puShpa d+hU pa dI pa gand+ha/ nai bi tye/ pany+tsa a mri te/ ma tha/ dwartsa?/ ba ta ga te/ tsa tra tsa ma ra/ sa yo tha ma tsa ma sa/ mahA rak+ta/ na na khA hi/ saM pu ra naM/ i daM ba li b+huM tsha tha/ grih+Na
64b2(rgyud 'grel): tha sa ma ya rak+Sha tha ma ma sarba a the/ ha sa yaM/ ku ro tha/ a tra/ sA d+ha ni/ yi sh+ra tra shTa shaM/ rak+Sha sarbaM/ arthaM/ ya the baM/ ya the shTaM/ b+huM dza tha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ pi ba tha/ ma ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba sa pa ri/ sat+su khaM bi sho d+ha na ye swAhA/
64b3(rgyud 'grel): ya ka b+ha bAn+tu/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rol mo'i sgra dang rdo rje glu blangs te/ lhag ma'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid dgyes rdor rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos 'byung nang du 'dab brgyad gsum/ /rim par dkar nag dmar po'o//
64b4(rgyud 'grel): de yang yig 'bru gsum las bsgom/ /lha dang phyogs skyong klu chen brgyad/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM las pad mdog bzhin/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdor dril 'chang/ /rang gi yum yang de bzhin te/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis kun kyang gnas//
64b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las ni 'od zer spro/ /gzugs dang gzugs med lha brgyad la/ /'dod khams lha mi phyogs skyong ste/ /ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin/ /klu chen brgyad la bstim par bya/ /bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis
64b6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs/ /rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang ste/ /phyi nang gsang bas mchod bya ste/ /lha dang phyogs skyong klu brgyad la/ /rnam snang mi bskyod mdza' yas kyis/ /rim pa ji bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /de la sngags 'dis rab tu dbul/ 
64b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blangs nas su/ /oM inda ya ma dza la/ yak+Sha dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): b+hu ta bih+na/ bA yu/ rak+Sha/ tsanda/ sudzdza mA ta bap+pa ta la/ pA tA la/ aTTha sap+pa swAhA/ i daM baM li b+hu dza/ dzi g+ha maM sa d+hu paM puShpe dI paM gand+he/ paM g+ha aM ba kats+tsha khandi 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): khu Ni phe Ta ga da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harmA NAM/ Adya nutpan+na twAt/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ /rdo rje glu dang rol mo'i sgra/ /mchod de nyin mo lan gsum btang/ /yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod pa'i rdzas la bsang gtor
65a2(rgyud 'grel): brlab/ /'dab brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la/ /mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas dmigs byas te/ badzra DA ki ni/ si gi ni/ byA gi ni/ dza bu gi ni/ lu gi ni/ DA ki ni/ dI pi ni/ tsu pi ni/ kaM bo dzi ni/ brjod pa tsam gyis dmigs byas te/ /'dab brgyad
65a3(rgyud 'grel): la ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /gru chad la ni khams gsum gyi/ /gtso bo thams cad bsam par bya/ /khyams la 'khor rnams thams cad do/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ kun kyang sku gsung thugs dang ldan/ /b+ha ga'i phyag rgya mgo steng bca' / /oM A kA ro mu
65a4(rgyud 'grel): khaM sarba d+harmA NaM/ Adya nutpan+na twAt/ spyan drangs bstim la bar chod bgegs/ /'ong ba srung phyir 'di skad do/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra ni/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ mahA daMSh+Totka Ta/ b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu shU la parshu pA sha ha sta ya/ oM a mri
65a5(rgyud 'grel): ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ ma tha ma tha/ gardza gardza/ spho Ta ya spho Ta ya/ bi spho Ta ya bi spho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nA bi nA ya nAM/ mahA ka bi de/ pi bi tan+ta ka rA ya/ sarba go ri u pa tha ba sa ma naM/ ku ru ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT
65a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT swAhA/ de ltar bdud rtsis mtshams bcad nas/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma dbul/ /ba liM ga tha/ oM A ra li ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA ki na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ dri sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba b+hA ta/ pre ta rAk+Sha sa/ pi shA tsa
65a7(rgyud 'grel): uSh+manda a pasma ra/ /DA ki n+ye/ da ya/ i daM ba liM grih+Nandu/ sarba si d+d+himme pra yats+tshan+tu/ sa ma ya rakshan+tu/ a the baM/ ya theSh+TeM/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi ba tha/ ma ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba pa ri pu ra ka/ ta ta su ka bi sho d+ha ye swAhA/ oM a kra bi kra/ sma sha ne pa/
65b1(rgyud 'grel): parpa de/ kand+ha re/ b+hu he gra me/ parpa de/ parbye/ pa the/ khe dra/ sor+Nam ga ra/ bi se sa ta pa dza ne/ thaM la ga te bu mo/ ma taM ga ti/ bi se swAhA/ kriSh+Na ru tra/ ma hA ru tra/ de ba twat+tra/ sa ma sret+ta/ kre na karla pi pa dzi/ nan+ta ti ta/ bi na ya ka/ tsa muN+Di/ go ra pi
65b2(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa/ u ma de pi tu/ sta pa dza yaShtsa/ bi dza ya/ ci bu ba/ a tsi ta/ a pa ra tsi ta/ dzi ka li/ kA ya b+ha bAndu oM A(rgyud 'grel): maM hUM phaT swAhA/ de ltar phul te gsol ba dang/ /se gol brdab cing gshegs su gsol/ /oM kre to sarba sa tA ra tha/ si ti du ta ya
65b3(rgyud 'grel): thA nu ga ga dza ta/ pu taM bi sa ye/ pu na ra ga na ma ya du/ rang rang gnas su yud tsam gyis/ /phyin te rnal 'byor bsgo ba nyan/ /de ltar mtshan mo lan gsum gtang/ /yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lce la rdo rje bsgom byas te/ /lha 'am chos nyid rol
65b4(rgyud 'grel): bsams na/ /dngos grub rim par 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rol pa'i lhag ma la/ /shin tu lhag ma'i gtor ma bya/ /lte bar bdag nyid yi dam bsgom/ /pre ta brjod cing zur drug la/ /yi dags thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /oM u tsi Ta a d+hi
65b5(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha b+huM dza di bi tha hUM hUM phaT/ sdug bsngal bral zhing tshim par bsam/ /sgrub pa'i zhag grangs thon pa dang/ /slob ma'i mgo steng gtor ma bzhag /rtag tu srung zhing skyob pa dang/ /phrin las bzhi yi dbang thob bsam/ /sum mdo 'am lam ka'i
65b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mdo 'am/ /dur khrod yang na chu 'gram du/ /nam phyed na ni gtor ma gtang/ /byang shar mtshams su gtor chen bskyal/ /mdor na gnas pa'i go rims kyis/ /skyel ba'i sa ru phyin pa dang/ /phyogs phyogs gdon rnams zil mnan phyir/ /phyogs
65b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dag tu kha bltas te/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol/ /lag pa g.yon nas g.yas su bsgyur/ /rkang pa g.yon nas g.yas su brdab/ /lag pa brkyang ste 'phyong zhing 'bur/ /long mo gshibs te 'gying bdag gis/ /'gyur zhing g.yon du dgrad cing blta
