66a1(rgyud 'grel): rang sngags gdon cing dgyes par bya'o/ /rdo rje glu yang drag tu blang/ /rol mo'i sgra yang drag tu brdung/ /'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi gzhung/ /rgyud rnams ngang ni 'gal ba med/ /gdams ngag rim pa 'di bris pas/ /lhag
66a2(rgyud 'grel): chad nor pa ci mchis ba/ /dkon mchog bla ma chos skyong dang/ /mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol/ /rmongs pa rnams la mig phye bas/ /las kyi gzhung srongs dge rtsa gang/ /bdag dang rnal 'byor thams cad dang/ /sems can kun gyi
66a3(rgyud 'grel): don du bsngo/ /slob dpon chen po kha che rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba b+hu ta ba liM bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i chog zhes bya ba/ dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag
66a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /e baM rnam par nges bzhugs pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag bya ste/ /rnam 'tshe log 'dren la sogs dang/ /sems can bsrung phyir gtor ma brtsam/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom bya ba/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du ni/ /pad+ma 'dab
66a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gsum brtsegs la/ /dkar nag dmar po'i oM hUM A:/ rig par lha chen brgyad dang ni/ /phyogs bsrung brgyad dang klu chen brgyad/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar bskyed bya ste/ /mdun du dbang phyug chen po bskyed/ /g.yas su lha yi dbang po
66a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa bskyed bya ste/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su khyab 'jug go /me ru 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bskyed/ /srin por tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ /b+h+ri giM ri ti rlung mtshams su/ /dbang ldan mtshams su gri ti ka/ mdun gyi 'dab mar brgya byin
66a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /g.yas su mthar byed dgod par bya'o/ /chu lha rgyab kyi 'dab ma la'o/ /de ltar g.yon du nor sbyin dgong/ /me yi mtshams su ni me lha che/ /bden bral du ni srin po'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rlung lha'o/ /dbang ldan mtshams su 'byung po'i bdag /stobs
66b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyu dang dung sbyong dang/ /mdza' yas nor rgyas de bzhin te/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang/ /pad chen shin tu pad chen po/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang/ /rang 'od rig mas yang dag 'khyud/ /gdan
66b2(rgyud 'grel): la g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs/ /rang rang thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od zer lcags kyu ltar 'phros pas/ /lha chen brgyad la gzugs khams dang/ /gzugs med gnas pa'i lha bsdu'o/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi/ /phyogs bsrung
66b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la rab tu bsdu/ /ngan 'gro gsum dang lha ma yin/ /klu chen brgyad la bsdu bar bya/ /rang bzhin gnas la bzhugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang phyir/ /gau rI yis ni dgug byas la/ /tsau rI yis ni zhags pas bcings/ /bet+tA li yis
66b4(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog bsdam/ /dril bus mnyes byed g+hasma rI/ /rnal 'byor pa yi thugs ka nas/ /'od zer lcags kyu lta 'phros nas/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba sras bcas kun/ /de la phyi nang gsang mchod du/ /de rnams kyis ni dbang bskur mthar/ /rang rang bdag
66b5(rgyud 'grel): pos dbu la brgyan/ /lha chen brgyad la rtag pa yis/ /rdo rje yis ni phyogs skyong brgyad/ /gar dbang gis ni klu chen brgyad/ /de la tshogs gtor ma sgrub/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor las/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i pad snod bsam/ /der ni bruM AM dzrIM khaM hUM /
66b6(rgyud 'grel): go ku da ha na las/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang sems can lnga/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bar du bsam/ /'bar ba dang ni spros pa yis/ /'chi med rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /cha yi rang bzhin 'di bsgoms nas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis byin gyis brlabs la dbul/ /de nas gtor
66b7(rgyud 'grel): ma gtang ba'i sngags/ /oM inda dza ma dza la/ dzak+kha b+hU ta bah+ni ba u rak+kha tsanda sUdzdza mA ma bap+pe te pa pA tA le A g+ha swAhA/ de ni gtor ma'i mgron no/ /i daM ba liM/ puny+dza ? b+ha phul+la d+hU pa mAM sa bi g+haM/ /de ni gsol bar zhu ba'o/ /amha sarba kAdzdza sA d+ha khin+ta
67a1(rgyud 'grel): khunNi/ phe Ta ga da de ni don zhu ba'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM A dya nutpan+na twA ta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ de ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /de nas dgyes par byas nas gshegs su gsol/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod
67a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ gtor ma 'di sbyin zhing rab tu mchod par byed na/ rnal 'byor pa las 'byung po thams cad kyis legs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de tshe de la bde ba rnyog pa med pa nyid dang/ lha mnyes pa dang/ 'khor dge bar 'gyur ro/ /gal
67a3(rgyud 'grel): te 'byung po'i tshogs de la gtor ma byin na/ dbang dang mngon spyod dang dgra'i sde gzhig pa dang/ bskrad pa dang dgug pa dang zhi ba dang bde ba dang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon nag po
67a4(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //
67a5(rgyud 'grel): (kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ he badzra sA d+ha no pi ka /bod skad du/ kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes gnyis med rgyu dang bral/ de bzhin tshogs bral gang mi gnas/ /
67a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag 'tshal te/ /de bsten cho ga bstan par bya/ /gsang ba'i don ldan sgrub pa po/ /yang dag don ldan dam tshig dang/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i sdom pa shes/ /slob dpon gsang dang shes rab dang/ /de bzhin bzhi pa'i
67a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan pas/ /sgom pa'i mchog ni bsgrub par 'gyur/ //shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod du/ /bsgom pa dag ni dge bar gsungs/ /yang na dben zhing dgon pa dang/ /ma mo'i gnas la sogs de bzhin/ /yang na bde zhing
67b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' bar/ /rang gi 'dod pa bsgrub par bya/ /der ni bde zhing rgya che pa'i/ /stan la rnam par 'dug nas ni/ /me tog la sogs bye brag dang/ /bdud rtsi yi ni gsang gtor bya/ /rdo rjes mkha' snying dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
67b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya/ /de la hUM yig 'bar ba yis/ /mtshon cha mchog ni spro bar bya/ /mkha' dbyings til gang bzhin rgyas pa'i/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog bkug ste/ /rang snying sa bon mchog skyes pa'i/ /lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /gau rI zla
67b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshan ma dang/ /tsau rI nyi ma'i snod 'dzin te/ /bait+tA lI yi lag na chu'o/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin te/ /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'o/ /sa pa rI ni de bzhin bcud/ /tsaN+Da lI ni rde chung 'khrol/ /Dom+bi chags chen rjes chags pas/ /snying gar yongs su 'khyud pa
67b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /de rjes bsod nams yan lag go /gsum gyi skyabs 'gro sogs bya ste/ /'di ltar phyag 'tshal skyabs 'gro dang/ /sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang//
67b5(rgyud 'grel): dam bca' bdag lus 'bul bar bya/ /de nas dang por byams pa ste/ /de rjes snying rje rnam par bsgom/ /gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms so/ /de nas ye shes blta ba'i phyir/ /phyi dang nang gi dngos 'di kun/
67b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag stong par rnam dpyad de/ /sprin med nam mkha' ltar bsams nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sems brtan byed pa'i gsang sngags 'dis/ /stong pa nyid las sems kyi dngos/ /a haM o dang
67b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ni/ /oM dbus haM gis 'brel ba las/ /ra la nyi ma bdun bsams te/ /de la hUM las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje des kyang ra ba dang/ /dra ba 'ching ba'ang bsgom par bya/ /de dbus mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyis/ /shes
68a1(rgyud 'grel): rab e gzugs bsgom par bya/ /de steng sa dang chu dang ni/ /me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang/ /du ba'i mdog tu bsam par bya/ /gru bzhi zlum po gru gsum dang/ /zla kham dbyibs su
68a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam/ /de steng oM ldan a haM ni/ /bdag nyid ngo bo gnas bsams te/ /e gzugs nas ni a haM bar/ /thams cad 'dres 'gyur 'khor lor 'gyur/ /gru bzhi pa la bsgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed
68a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs brgyan pa'o/ /de stengs chos dbyings bdag nyid kyi/ /ro ni mkhas pas rab bsgoms te/ /de la A li kA li las/ /'byung ba nyi ma zla ba bsam/ /de dag rab tu sa bon ni/ /a dang hUM las gyur pa yi//
68a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gri gug bsgom par bya/ /de la rang sems bdag nyid kyi/ /a hi yongs su zhugs pa ni/ /dam pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi/ /sems dpar 'di de brjod pa'o/ /de rnams gcig tu 'dres pa las/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/ /he ru ka
68a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par bsgom/ /zla la me long ye shes te/ /de bzhin nyi ma mnyam pa nyid/ /sa bon las byung mtshan ma ni/ /so sor rtog par gsungs pa'o/ /dbyer med 'dres pa nan tan te/ /sngar? gyur chos dbyings ye shes yin/ /sku mdog sngo rar
68a6(rgyud 'grel): shar ba'i 'od/ /bin du dmar po 'dra ba'i spyan/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen du 'khyil/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo snyan cha phyag gdub dang/ /mgur chu dang ni ske rags rnams/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni ngag pa yis/ /'di rnams
68a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags/ /lo grangs bcu drug lta bu la/ /rab tu khros pa'i lta stangs can/ /g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang/ /gnyis pa yum gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /kha TwAM ga yang 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje nag po ste/ /hUM gi sgra 'byin bdag nyid can
68b1(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /gal te phyag rgya byed 'dod na/ /g.yon gyi dang po ka pA la/ /lha dang lha min khrag gis bkang/ /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ /lhag pa'i phyag gnyis ji lta bar/ /rang dang 'dra ba'i phag mo 'khyud/ /gzhan
68b2(rgyud 'grel): yang sngon nyid ji lta ba'o/ /gzhan yang zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni skya reng 'dra/ /g.yon pa dmar po gcer bu ste/ /g.yon gyi dang po tri shUl la/ /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis pa dril
68b3(rgyud 'grel): bu dang/ /g.yas pa gnyis pa ga ta ri/ /lhag mas rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /gri dang thod pa bsnams mas 'khyud/ /gzhan ni sngo bzhin yum de bzhin/ /gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba ni/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par
68b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam par mnan/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan cing/ /nyi ma la bzhugs gar gyis stabs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'chang/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed/ /rang
68b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas ni hUM 'phro zhing/ /sku la thal bas rnam par byugs/ /bdag med ma dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ dga' ba'i sbyor ba snyoms par 'jug /rnam par mi rtog bde ba yi/ /mi rtog rang bzhin bde bar gnas/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas
68b6(rgyud 'grel): pa me tog kun da 'dra/ /dpa' bo g.yon pa dmar ba che/ /steng gi zhal ni rnam par gtsigs/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan dang ldan/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bud pa 'dra/ /g.yas kyi 'bar ba'i phyag brgyad na/ /pad+ma banda brgyad nang du/ /glang po rta dang bong bu dang/
68b7(rgyud 'grel): ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang/ /byi la dang ni seng ge rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang me/ /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin mang/ /gshin rje dang ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /g.yon gyi band+ha brgyad du 'o/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang mi sdug dang/ /
69a1(rgyud 'grel): rgod dang khro dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje ngo mtshar zhi la sogs/ /'bar ba'i gar dgu nyams dang ldan/ /zhabs kyis sa la brdabs mdzad cing/ /lha min lha la bsdigs mdzad pa'i/ /rang gi snying gar ra yig las/ byung ba'i
69a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de nas thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /ngo bo nyid kyi hUM yig go /rdo rje yi ge hUM las byung ba/ kha dog nag po drag po che/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /de nyid hUM du bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang hUM yig yongs gyur
69a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje las byung nag po che/ /'dam skyes sngon po rab 'dra ba'i/ /yang na sngo rangs shar ba 'dra/ /dad pas nges par bsgom par bya/ /de nas gzhal yas yid 'ong ba'i/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo
69a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya ste/ /yab yum gnyis su med pa yi/ /yid 'ong sbyor pa'i dgyes pa las/ /byung ba'i gau rI dbang po'i phyogs/ /shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las/ /byung ba'i tsau rI yang spros te/ /lho phyogs
69a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo skyong tsau rI gnas/ /'jam po 'jug pa sbyor ba las/ /bet+tA li yang dbyung bar bya/ /spros nas bdud 'joms nub sgor ro/ /snyoms 'jug sbyor ba chen po las/ /g+hasma rI yang dbyung bar bya/ /spros nas byang gi sgo ru ni/ /khro bo gzugs su rnam par
69a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /gnyis sprad pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /puk+ka sI yang dbyung bar bya/ /spros nas dbang ldan grwa ru ni/ /'khrug pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas/ /gzhan yang gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /sha ba rI ni me yi grwa/ tsaN+Da lI ni srin po'i phyogs/ /Dom+bi rlung
69a7(rgyud 'grel): gi grwa ru'o/ /gau rI g.yas na gri gug ste/ /g.yon pa na ni de bzhin nya/ /tsau rI g.yas na rde chung ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa'o/ /bet+tA lI g.yas ru sbal te/ /g.yon na pad+ma ban d+ha'o/ /g+hasma rI ni g.yas na sprul/ /g.yon pa na ni rnal 'byor snod/
69b1(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste/ /g.yon na de bzhin dgra sta'o/ /sa ba rI g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon na de bzhin bseg shang ngo/ /tsaN+Da lI g.yas 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon pa na ni de bzhin gshol/ /Dom+bi g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /g.yon na de bzhin sdigs
69b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub bo/ /gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis gsungs/ /skyil krung phyed ma gar gyi stabs/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du brdzes/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gau rI sku mdog nag por 'gyur/ /tsau rI btsod dang 'dra ba ste/ /bait+tA lI ni gser btso ma/
69b3(rgyud 'grel): g+hasma markata lta bu ste/ /puk+ka in+d+ra ni lA 'dra/ /zla 'od lta bu sa ba rI/ /tsaN+Da lI ni nam mkha' i mdog /Dom+bi sna tshogs dag du bshad// //tshangs dang dbang po nye dbang po/ /drag po gshin rje gnod sbyin dang/ /bden bral na ni thags 
69b4(rgyud 'grel): bzangs ris/ /gau rI la sogs lha mo yi/ /rim bzhin gdan du shes par bya/ /de rnams sa bon 'di yin no/ /gaM tsaM baM g+haM paM saM laM DaM/ /bdag pos sa bon 'di dag las/ /de rnams gdon pa nyid du bya/ /de nas rang gi rig ma dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin
69b5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dod chags ches/ /'od du zhu bar gyur pa las/ /mtshams kyi lha mo bshes gnyen mos/ /sna tshogs glu yis mchod de bskul/ /kye yi rdo rje thugs rjes gzigs te puk+ka bdag la skyobs/ /bde ba chen po dang sbyar ba bdag 'dod stong pa'i rang
69b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsal te bzhengs su gsol/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin gsal nas sa yi dngos grub dgos don du/ /gal te gson par mchis bzhed kye yi rdo rje bzhengs su gsol/ /tsaN+Da bdag gis khyod med phyogs ma mthong nas gsol 'debs na/ /lha
69b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i 'jig rten bsgrub par dam bcas ci slad bzhugs/ /bdag ni Dom+bi'i mtshan ma med pa khyod kyi sems ni shes pa ste/ /thugs rje med pa de mi rung bas sgyu 'phrul lta bur bzhengs su gsol/ /de dag gsan nas sngon bzhin du/ /A(rgyud 'grel): hUM
70a1(rgyud 'grel): dag las rdo rje 'dzin/ /chen po 'od du zhu las bzhengs/ /de nas zhe sdang bdag nyid kyi/ /rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'bar ba nag po lcags kyu yi/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /spyan drangs ma
70a2(rgyud 'grel): mo brgyad rnams kyis/ /sngon bzhin mchod de gsol ba gdab/ /bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /bcom ldan rnams kyis dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la dbang bskur rab tu stsol/ /oM a
70a3(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa tu ma sarba badzra ta thA ga ta a tiSh+Tha na/ de skad gsol ba btab pa yis/ /bde gshegs de dag thams cad kun/ /he ru ka yi skur 'gyur te/ /bde gshegs lnga yis bdag nyid kyi/ /bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur te/ /de tshe me tog
70a4(rgyud 'grel): gur gum char/ /'bab dang rnga yi sgra grag cing/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs dang/ /spyan sogs rdo rje dbyangs rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur rab tu byas pa yis/ /thugs kyi dbang phyug sogs sangs rgyas/ /dbu rgyan du ni gyur par bya/ /
70a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod rtag dang rin chen dbang/ /mdza' yas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /puk+ka sI sogs mtshams gnas pa/ /rim pa bzhin du rgya yis gdab/ /zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang/ /'dod chags rdo rje ma yis ni/ /sgo gnas
70a6(rgyud 'grel): ke ri la sogs pa/ /rim bzhin du ni gdab par bya/ /rgya yis gdab cing mtshan pas na/ /des 'dir rgyas zhes bya ba yin/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhugs byas te/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ de dag
70a7(rgyud 'grel): tshim pa nyid du bya/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zla gam gru gsum kha dog gnyis/ /yi ge yaM dang raM gyis mtshan/ /ba dan dang ni rdo rjes mdzes/ /de steng band+ha a las byung/ /der ni ye shes bdud rtsis bkang/ /yi ge hUM las rab bskyed pa'i/ /rdo rje
70b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung oM gyis mtshan/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /bdud rtsi lha yi sbyor bas bzang/ /mchod dang bstod pa nyid du bya/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin shes par bya/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang/ /'du byed rnam shes phung por ni/ /
70b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma dang gau rI dang/ /chu yi lha mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /bdag med rnal 'byor mar dag go /sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi/ /puk+ka sI la sogs pa'i dngos/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /gau rI tsau rI bet+tA lI/ g+hasma sa spyod mkha' spyod do/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang
70b3(rgyud 'grel): lce/ /lus dang yid kyi dbang po ni/ /gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang/ /'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje dang/ /bdag med rnal 'byor mar shes bya/ /'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu dang/ /phyag gdub ska rags phyag rgya lnga/ /mi bskyod mdza' yas rin chen dbang
70b4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad don grub bdag nyid do/ /phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab ste/ /phyag bzhi bdud bzhi rnam par dag /phyag drug pha rol phyin drug go /bcu drug phyag tu gsungs pa ni/ /stong pa bcu drug bdag nyid do/ /zhal gcig stong pa nyid kyi
70b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo/ /zhal gsum rnam par thar pa gsum/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /zhabs bzhi 'am bdud bzhi dag pa nyid/ /spyan ni dag pa'i rdo rje gsum/ dbang po drug dang phung po lnga/ /skye mched drug dang 'byung ba rnams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis
70b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pas/ /sna tshogs dag cing rnam par grol/ /gzugs yul la sogs gang gi yang/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mig yor tshul/ /thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/ /sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs so/ /rnam par dag pa byas nas ni/ /rnal
70b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor sdom pa'i bdag nyid dang/ /phyi nang bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /de la 'di ni sdom pa ste/ /eM baM mA ya'i bdag nyid kyi/ /'khor lo bzhi ni lus la gnas/ /'di ltar sprul pa'i chos dang ni/ longs spyod bde chen 'khor lo rnams/ /lte ba
71a1(rgyud 'grel): snying ga mgul pa dang/ /spyi bor rim bzhin shes par bya/ /'khor lo rnams kyi pad+ma ni/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad/ bcu drug sum cu gnyis su shes/ /sa bon aM dang hUM dang ni/ /oM dang haM ste rim bzhin no/ A li
71a2(rgyud 'grel): kA li sprul pa la/ /yongs su bskor bar shes par bya/ /bde gshegs yab yum sa bon gyis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin bskor/ /yi ge i e 'dren bcas pas/ /longs spyod 'khor lo bskor ba yin/ /sprul pa'i sku dang chos kyi sku/ /
71a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ /sku gsum yongs su shes pa rnams/ /'khor lo bzhi ru 'dod pa yin/ /'khor lo 'di rnams rang bzhin ni/ /lha mo bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi/ /yi ge 'bru bzhir 'dod pa ste/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma
71a4(rgyud 'grel): kI/ dkar ma sgrol ma de bzhin du/ las dang chos dang dam tshig dang/ /phyag rgya chen por brjod pa'o/ /yi ge e dang baM dag dang/ /mA dang ya yang 'di yi dngos/ /de bzhin sku gsung thugs rnams dang/ /A li kA li 'ang 'di nyid yin/ /
71a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes skad cig bzhir grags pa/ /sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang/ /rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral/ /'khyud dang myong dang spyod pa dang/ /ci yang ma yin pa yi sems/ /'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa yin/ /sdug bsngal kun
71a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung 'gog pa lam/ /phung po nyon mongs bzhi 'byin pa/ /bden pa bzhi yang 'di nyid do/ /bdag dang sngags dang lha dang ni/ /ye shes rnams kyi da nyid rnams/ /rang rang yang dag gang yin pa 'am/ /'khor lo bzhi yi ngo bo'o/ /dga' 
71a7(rgyud 'grel): dang dam pa'i dga' ba dang/ /bral dang rang bzhin dga' ba rnams/ /bde ba'i ye shes cha bzhi ste/ /drod thob pa dang 'phel ba dang/ /chags bral bde dang mi gnyis bde/ /de yang 'khor lo bzhi la gnas/ /gnas brtan thams cad yod
71b1(rgyud 'grel): par smra/ /de bzhin mang pos bkur ba dang/ /dge 'dun phal chen sde zhes pa/ /sde pa bzhi yang de nyid yin/ /rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa dang/ /ye shes sdom pa'ang bstan par bya/ /sme sha lte bar 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs
71b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga bsregs pa dang/ /spyan la sogs pa bsregs pa dang/ /haM bsregs zla ba 'bab pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa yis/ /bsreg pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /bsreg pa me dang rlung yin te/ /ye
71b3(rgyud 'grel): shes me yi snang ba gang/ /las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yin/ /las kyang bcom ldan shes rab ma'i/ /rlung gi de nyid 'di yin te/ /lte ba'i dbus las 'phro zhing phra/ /chos dang longs spyod bde chen bzhi/ /brtan dang g.yo ba kun gyi bdag/
71b4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge aM gi bdag nyid ni/ /las kyi rlung gi gzhi yin te/ /'di las kun tu 'byung ba yin/ /'di dag rgyu ba'i rim pa ni/ /nyi ma gcig la thun bzhi ste/ /de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis/ /rim pa bcu drug de bzhin du/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha
71b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/ /A li kA li ngo bo ni/ /sna bug g.yas dang g.yon du rgyu/ /de yang sa dang chu dang ni/ /me dang rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /'byung ba bzhi yi ngo bor 'dod/ /'di rnams dus su rgyu ba ste/ /nam mkha' i rang bzhin
71b6(rgyud 'grel): dus ma yin/ /lci zhing mkhreng ba sa yi khams/ /thur du rgyu ba dang por 'dod/ /grang zhing rtsub pa chu yi khams/ /mdun du rgyu ba gnyis pa yin/ /dro zhing 'jam pa me yi khams/ /'di ni phyir la nye bar rgyu/ /yang zhing stobs can
71b7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi khams/ /gyen du rgyu bar shes par bya/ /de bzhin chu tshod rim pa dang/ /thun zhes bya bar grags pa yang/ /'dir ni 'di nyid gzung bya ste/ /g.yas su ji bzhin g.yon de bzhin/ /de nas kyang ni g.yas yin te/ /bar chad yod
72a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin no/ /dus min rgyu ba gang zhe na/ gang zhig 'chi ba'i dus nyid dang/ /byang chub sems rgyun 'bab pa dang/ /nad chen 'byung ba'i snga ltas la/ /de dag dus gcig 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni nam mkha' i khams su
72a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /rlung dang ye shes rnam shes dang/ /dug rnams lhan cig rgyu ba ste/ /nams kyang 'bral ba ma yin no/ /reg pa'i rlung zhes bya ba ni/ /lus las nam yang mi 'da' ste/ /gal te 'das na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid shes pa yis
72a3(rgyud 'grel): me yi de nyid bskul bar bya/ /dbugs dang drod kyi khams dag kyang/ /tha dad 'jug pa ma yin no/ /de la me yi de nyid ni/ /dbang po gtsubs pa'i sbyor ba las/ /ye shes me ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /ji ltar phyi rol me bzhin no/ /de yang dbang
72a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i lam nas ni/ /lte ba'i rtsa ru rab tu 'bar/ /'od chen du ba bcas pa yis/ /tsaN+Da lI ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ye shes me yi snang ba de/ /shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa dang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i/ /bde gshegs snga? dang de
72a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /lha mor bcas pa tshig par gyur/ /longs spyod 'khor lo byung nas ni/ /g.yas nas bskor ba lan gsum byas/ /smin ni phrag mdzod spur byung nas kyang/ /de nas rna ba g.yas su byung/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bskul byas nas
72a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo'i gtsug tu zhugs par gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo la babs te/ /shin tu tshig par gyur pa 'di/ /sngags kyi sdom par 'dod pa yin/ /ye shes sdom pa'i bye brag ni/ /snying gar sangs rgyas bka' bgros nas/ /rnam dag bdud rtsi
72a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus byas te/ /sngon gyi lam nas byung nas kyang/ /phyogs bcu bdud rtsi bsdu byas te/ /sngon bzhin haM la zhugs gyur pas/ /sems kyi zla ba zhu nas ni/ /so yi spu gu nas byung nas/ /longs spyod 'khor lor babs par gyur/ /der ni cung zad
72b1(rgyud 'grel): ? so nas/ /sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lor babs par gyur/ /bde bar gshegs rnams gang bar byas/ /sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni/ /sprul ba'i 'khor lor babs par gyur/ /de bzhin kun tu 'gro bar byed/
72b2(rgyud 'grel): skra yi rtse mo 'bum gyi cha/ /ye shes snang ba'i bye brag dag /mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /'di ni sdom par brjod pa'o/ /nang gi bzlas pa bstan pa ni/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /gru gsum gnas ni de bzhin me/ /lto ba chu yi dkyil
72b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor te/ /de steng dbang chen ri rab bcas/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rtag pa'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste/ /de la mi gnyis bdag nyid kyi/ /yi ge a yi sdom pa bzung/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di/ /lus dang ngag yid gang yang
72b4(rgyud 'grel): min/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug min/ /kha dog dbyibs sogs ma yin zhing/ /khro zhi la sogs rnam par spangs/ /mtshan ma kun dang bral ba yi/ /dbu ma chen po sgom par bya/ /gzhan ni sdom pa ji lta ba'o/ /'di ni ci yang ma yin phyir/ /
72b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ning bzlas pa zhes 'dod de/ /bzlas pa'i mchog tu gyur ba yin/ /gal te skyo bar gyur na ni/ /phyi rol bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyi/ /ye shes sems dpa' i gnas nyid dang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams nas/ /
72b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dod pa spro bar bya/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ he badzra'i snying po'o/ /oM twai lokyA k+She pa huM huM huM phaT swAhA/ phyag gnyis pa'o/ /oM dzwa la dzwa la b+hyo huM huM huM phaT swAhA/ phyag bzhi pa'i 'o/ /oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag drug
72b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i'o/ /oM ASh+TA na nA ye/ ping+gord+ha ke sha barta ma ne/ tsa turbaM sha ti ne tA ya Sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya kriSh+Na dzwa mU ta wa pu She ka pA lA mA la a ne kaM d+ha ri Ne A d+hU ta krU ra tsit+tA ya/ ard+he ndu daMSh+Tri Ne mE ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gardza ya gardza ya/ tardza ya tardza ya/
73a1(rgyud 'grel): sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sapta sA ga rA na/ band+ha band+ha/ nA gASh+Ta kAn/ grih+Na grih+Na/ sha trUM ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haM ha(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ phyag bcu drug pa'i 'o/ /bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil byas te/ /mchod dang
73a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod dang smon lam dag /legs par btab ste phyag rgya dgrol/ /dbyings su bsdu dang gshegs gsol pa/ /ji lta ji bzhin bya ba yin/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /spyod lam kun tu lha nyid kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin las nyams mi bya/ /'di
73a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar nyal ba'i tshe na yang/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen ting 'dzin gyi/ /chags chen rjes su chags byas te/ /ye shes me yis lus zhu nas/ /chos sku sems su gyur par nyal /gang tshe sdang ba'i tshe na yang/ /tshad med bzhi yis bskul ba yis/ /sngon gyi smon
73a4(rgyud 'grel): lam rjes dran nas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor bayis/ /ting 'dzin rim par ldang bar bya/ /gang zhig za ba tshe na yang/ /sdom pa'i dngos po ji lta ba'i/ /lus ni lha yi dkyil 'khor te/ /zas te bdud rtsi byin brlab bya/ /zos pa dbyer med tshim par bya/ /yang na
73a5(rgyud 'grel): spyin sreg mchod pa bya/ /ra sa nA ni me yi khams/ /g.yas su 'bar zhing 'phro ba ste/ /A li'i ngo bor shes par bya/ /la la nA ni rlung gi khams/ /g.yon du gtsubs shing g.yo ba ste/ /kA li'i ngo bor shes par bya/ /de dbus lus kyi bdag nyid la/ /bza' 
73a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya/ /gal te 'go 'chag byed pa ni/ /rigs lnga rnams la bslang ba dang/ /phyag rgya rgyal sogs rgyan rnams dang/ /rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa dag /ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin bya/ /'dis ni byang chub rnyed mi dka' / /gal te gtor ma
73a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor 'dod na/ /he ru ka yi sbyor ba yis/ /'byung po la ni mngon dmigs te/ /zas rnams bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas/ /sngags 'di yis ni tshim par bya/ /oM inda dza ma/ dza la/ dza kA /b+hU ta/ ba u/ rak?/ tsnda/ sudzdza mA da/ bap+pa/ pa tA le/
73b1(rgyud 'grel): abba hwA hA/ aM daM/ ba liM/ b+hUM dza/ dziM g+ha/ phul+la/ d+hA p+pa/ mA sa/ biM g+ha/ amha kadzdza/ sA d+ha/ khAn+ti khu Ni/ phe Ta/ gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA N+NaM A dya nutpa n+na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ gang zhig rtag tu 'du byed pa/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang
73b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dga' pa nas ni/ /de la dngos grub myur bar 'gyur/ /las rnams dag gi mjug tu yang/ /mchod dang bstod cing smon lam gdab/ /de la smon lam 'di yin te/ /rigs ldan skye zhing blo gros rjes su ldan/ /dam tshig ldan zhing
73b3(rgyud 'grel): kye yi rdo rje ston/ /snying rje ldan zhing bla ma rnams la gus/ /skye ba kun tu 'di ltar skye gyur cig /rdo rje dril bu lag gis 'khrol byed cing/ /zab mo'i dam chos rab tu klog pa dang/ /dam tshig btsun mo'i khu ba za byed par/ /skye ba kun tu 'di ltar skye
73b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /de nas sprul pa rang la bsdu/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor slar gshegs gsol/ /spyod lam la sogs sngon bzhin du'o/ /slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ /he badzra sgrub thabs he ru ka mnyes par bya ba'i tshe
73b5(rgyud 'grel): ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu sh+ri dz+nyA na dang/ rong zo ma d+harmA b+ha dras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he badzra nA ma sA d+ha no pi ka /bod skad du/ dpal kye'i
73b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /'jam dpal gzhal nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab thabs dag bdag nyi can/ /kye rdor bag med la la'ang/ /bla mar bcas la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rim pa gsum pa'i sgrub thabs brtsam/ /mi nyid rnyed
73b7(rgyud 'grel): dka' bde bas kyang/ /bla ma dga' ston nyer par dka' / /bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul/ /'gro phan lam la rtan par gyis/ /yon tan ldan zhing brtson par ldan/ /bla ma gus shing dang ldan pa/ rgyal ba'i chos la the tshom med/ /dbang dang dbye ba
74a1(rgyud 'grel): nges tshig las/ /snod yin phyir na drin sbyin bya/ /chu sogs bum pa'i dbang bskur dang/ /rim bzhin gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur la/ /de srid bla ma'i man ngag mdza' / /yid du 'ong ba'i
74a2(rgyud 'grel): sa phyogs su/ /ri dang nags tshal dang ni phug /chu 'gram bzhi mdo mtsho dang ni/ /shing gcig dben pa dur khrod rnams/ /bsam gtan khang pa byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi sogs kyis byug par bya/ /bris sku sogs mchod dgram byas la/ /nang
74a3(rgyud 'grel): par sngar langs sems bdag nyid/ /phyi rol khrus sogs kun byas la/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /sbyong byed dag pa la sogs kyis/ /'dod pa'i lha ni bsgrub par bya/ /bla ma rdo rje can bsams nas/ /sems kyi rin chen las
74a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni spros byas la/ /de nas rim bzhin dbul bar bya/ /de nas lha mo brgyad kyis mchod/ /gau rI byang chub sems kyis mchod/ /tsau rI rang byung me tog gis/ /mi bskyod 'dzin pa bendA lI/ /snang mdzad kyis mchod
74a5(rgyud 'grel): g+hasma rI/ /puk+ka sI yis lcags kyus mchod/ /sA ba rI ni ro 'dzin te/ /tsaN+Da lI ni dzo chung 'dzin/ /Dom+bis gnyis med sbyor ba byed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /kyai rdor shes rab bdag
74a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid can/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang byas pa/ /bdag gzhan don du ma lus par/ /so sor bshags shing slar yang ni/ /mi bgyid pa yi sdom pa snod/ /bde gshegs kun gyi bsod nams dang/ /byang chub
74a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams la/ /yang dag nyid du yi rang ngo/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /bdag gis de la bskul ba ni/ /sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
74b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bskul/ /sems can sangs rgyas thob bar du/ /rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs nas ni/ /nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsol bar 'tshal/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la/ /byang chub lam ni ston pa po/ /bsod nams kun
74b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'byung gnas che/ /byang chub rnams kyang de bzhin bskyed/ /lus ngag yid kyi bsod nams ni/ /bgyis sam bgyid du stsal ba dang/ /rjes su yi rang ci yang rung/ /des na 'jig rten kun mkhyen shog /snying rje rlan gyi brlan sems
74b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ni/ /dang po byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis pa snying rje ram par bsgom/ /gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi mdza' nas btang snyoms so/ /dngos rnams bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /bdag
74b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang ye shes sems dpa' o/ /ye she sems dpa' nA da'i bar/ /de nyid smig rgyu sgyu mar mtshungs/ /oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM A ni mi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma kohaM/ oM A pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas skye ba med pa'i
74b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin las/ /skye ba nyid du mas par bya'o/ /raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje sa bon dang ldan pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bdud rnams btul nas/ /dra ba dang ra ba dang/ sa gzhir gyur par sam par
74b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa dkar po bsams la/ de'i steng du paM las sna tshogs pad+ma/ /kha las sna tshogs rdo rje/ de'i steng du lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ljang khu/ der baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar
74b7(rgyud 'grel): bo/ de las raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po/ /der yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba nag po/ /de la thig le dang ldan par bsams nas/ de rnams gcig tu gyur pas/ gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs
75a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang ka ba brgyad dang/ dra ba dang dra ba byed pa dang/ rin po che dang 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pas sprad pa/ de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der srog song ba dang bcas pas sems las grub par bsam
75a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de'i lte bar A li las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes/ der kA li las mnyam pa nyid ye shes/ de'i dbus su hUM dang aM las rdo rje dang gri gug sa bon gyis mtshan pa so sor kun tu rtogs pa'i ye shes/ thams cad gcig tu gyur
75a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes/ sku rdzogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pas shes rab ma las 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa spyan gsum pa dbu la thod
75a4(rgyud 'grel): pa lngas brgyan cing/ sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa dbu skra khams pa gyen du brdzes pa/ thod ba rlon pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhis do shal byas pa/ gcer bu g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /bdag med ma ni gri gug dang thod pa
75a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams shing sku la 'khyud pa/ skyes pa'i thod pas do shal byas shing g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya ste/ gzhan ni thab dang 'dra/ nang du yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje/ rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje/ sna
75a6(rgyud 'grel): la ser sna rdo rje/ lce la 'dod chags rdo rje/ lus la phrag dog rdo rje/ yid la bdag med ma bsam par bya'o/ /de na rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer nag po/ lcags kyu'i dbyibs can spros te/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes sems
75a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod yon la sogs pas mchod nas/ dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bcug te gnyis su med par bsam par bya'o/ /yang 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad he ru'i gzugs kyis spyan drangs nas/ de la mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/
75b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur bas/ mi bskyod pas dbu rgyan par bsam par bya ste/ ji srid du mi skyo'i bar du rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /skyo na bzlas pa bya ste/ rig ma'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su gri gug sa bon dang
75b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bsams la/ de la sngags kyi phreng ba kun da 'dra ba 'od zer dang ldan pa byung nas/ rang gi zhal du zhugs te/ gsang ba'i rdo rje byung nas/ lha mo'i pad+mar babs te/ lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de
75b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du yang nas yang du bsam par bya'o/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis gsang ba'i rdo rje dang pad+mar bzlas pa phya'o/ /brtag pa bcu drug pa las/ /ma phugs pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur/ /phug
75b4(rgyud 'grel): pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o/ /de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yis/ /yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid ces gsungs so/ /de nas yang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste/ lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po'i dbus su rang rig
75b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang na gna par bsam mo/ /snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa thig le dang ldan pa/ mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o//
75b6(rgyud 'grel): mgo bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po de'i dbus su lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od dang ldan par bsam par byas nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo las 'od zer 'phros nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dang longs spyod kyi
75b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo nas yar song ste/ bde ba chen po las lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ mdzod spu nas byung ste sems can thams cad sbyangs nas bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas/ tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs te
76a1(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin dang bral nas/ za ma tog tu babs par bsam par bya ste/ de la rtse gcig tu bya'o/ /mi gsal na yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na bdag med ma rang gi snying gar bsdu/ rang yang hUM la bsdu/ de yang thig le
76a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang ldan par bsam par bya ste/ gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni/ /rang yid 'od dang ldan par yongs su bsgom/ /dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems ngo bo/ /ldang ba na yang bdag dang gzhan 'khor lo 'am/ tsaN+Da lIr mos
76a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ mchod pa la sogs pa yang mi bya'o/ /de yang phyag rgya bcing ba rnam par spang/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing/ /rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi 'tshal/ /dkyil 'khor sogs lus kyi las/ /rmi lam du yang mi bya'o/ /zhes gur
76a4(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs so/ /mchod rten brtsig par mi bya ste/ /de bzhin mchod sogs mi bya'o/ /gtsug lag dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi dgos pa rnyed par dka' zhes gdan bzhi pa las gsungs so/ /de nas yang lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par
76a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gang tshe ye shes rlung gis ni/ /rang rig dag ni bskyed nas su/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs pa yis/ /dga' ba la sogs rim bzhin skye/ /ci 'dra ba ni skye zhe na/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba/ /lkugs pa'i dga' ba ji lta
76a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /thog ma tha ma dbus med cing/ /'khor yin mya ngan 'das ma yin/ /bdag nyid gzhan nyid yod ma yin/ /'di ni mchog tu bde ba yin/ /bdag med ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan nges
76a7(rgyud 'grel): par rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam skyen bral lhan cig skyes/ /thams cad lus la rang bzhin gnas/ /dga' ba dang po 'khor ba'i gzugs/ /de bzhin mchog dga' 'khor ba nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'khor bdag nyid/ /
76b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med/ /dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba la sogs pa/ /gsum pa spangs par gyur na ni/ /bzhi pa gang las skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas gsum po thabs byas te/ /bzhi pa bsgom par bya ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i
76b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ni gsum du skyes?/ /de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa yin/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum gyis spangs/ /yang na rang gis gsum pa yin/ /dga' ba'i bye brag tu shes bya/ /'khor lo rnams kyi rim pa'o/ /zhes rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so /
76b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /mchog gi dga' ba gsang ba'i dbang/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang/ /bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mnyam par ma bzhag dus su yang/ /bya ba gang la 'jug pa na/ /lhan cig skyes
76b4(rgyud 'grel): las ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyi sems kyis mi gnas so/ /de yang brtag pa bcu drug pa las/ bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser/ /bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar/ /bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo/ /bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun/ /bde ba thabs
76b5(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab ste/ /de bzhin mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ /bde ba dngos po dngos med bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas brjod pa'i rim pa la gnas pas/ /bar chad thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
76b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma ni/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs par byas nas/ de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung nas bsams la de'i steng du paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la/ de'i steng du oM las
76b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sa bon dang ldan pa la 'od zer 'phros pas/ gzugs med pa dang gzugs can dang/ 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad 'od zer des sku rdo rjer byas nas/ /der bsdus te gcig tu gyur pa las/ /sku rdo rje zhal cig pa phyag gnyis
77a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bus shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /shes rab ma yang thabs dang 'dra/ /bar du hUM las rdo rje/ de las phyogs skyong thams
77a2(rgyud 'grel): cad der bsdus nas gcig tu gyur pa las/ thugs rdo rje sngon por bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu a las pad+ma des lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad rdo rje sku mdog dmar por bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan sku rdo rje dang 'dra'o/ /de nas ye shes
77a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa la sogs pa byas te gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa spyan drangs nas/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur nas/ sku rdo rje la rnam par snang mdzad kyis/
77a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rdo rje la mi bskyod pas/ gsung rdo rje la snang ba mdza' yas kyis dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor/ der a las thod pa
77a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i nang du/ bruM aM dzaM khaM hUM/ de nas bdud rtsir bsams la/ de nyid kyis mtshan par bsam par bya ste/ de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su hUM las rdo rje sa bon gyis mtshan par bsams la/ de'i stobs kyis bskol la/
77a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du a des ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs la/ gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de kho na'i snying po gsum gyi byin gyis brlab pa byas nas/ 'dis dbul bar bya'o/ /oM kA ya pAk+tsit ta i daM ba liM b+haM dza dziM g+ha phul+la d+hU pa mAM sa bi g+ha amha
77a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba gadzdza sarba d+ha khAn+ti khu Ni phe Ta gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM/ AdyA nutpan+na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ /'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs
77b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /mu(rgyud 'grel): kha zas la yang de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la mchod par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni dub gyur na/ /de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ /rigs su skye dang dam tshig can/ /skyo
77b2(rgyud 'grel): med dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ /bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan/ /skye shing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /lag na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo chos ni klog pa dang/ /btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /'dis ni bdag la
77b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran/ /snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la/ /yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs/ /phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab yin/ /zhal gcig gnyis med ye shes yin/ /zhabs gnyis bden pa gnyis su dran/ /phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /gdug  
77b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gdul phyir khro bo yin/ /sngags pas de ltar mos byas nas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor pas rgyu bar bya'o/ /rtag tu brtags par sngags bzlas dang/ /bsam gtan nyid dang bral mi bya/ /rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing/ /rtag tu bshad par bya ba yin/ /sems
77b5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams ni rtag pa skyang zhing/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod bya/ /dzam b+ha la la chu sbyin dang/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu spyad/ /mchod rten las ni bye ma'i las/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// //sgrub thabs rtsom dang mi ldan
77b6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /bla ma du ma'i man ngag bzhin/ /sgrub thabs byas las 'gal ba gang/ /de nyid mkhyen pas bzod pa mdzod/ /tha ma 'bring dang rab don tu/ /rim pa gsum ldan byas pa las/ /dge ba dri med thob pa des/ /de nyid rin chen rab gsal shog /
77b7(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa'i rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po sh+rI A nanda badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin sreg gi las kyi rim pa la/ dbang bskur ba'i sngon rol tu
78a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i las byas te/ dpangs khru gang la khru phyed thur du brko'o/ /sor bzhi phyir bgyed/ /kha khyer sor bzhis bskor/ zheng dang spangs sor bzhi bya/ de'i phyi rol gyi sor bzhi por la/ pad+ma'i phreng ba btang/ dbus kyi kha khyer la
78a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ra ba btang/ spyir gru bzhi la zheng phyi rol gyi rgya khru gsum btang/ thab khung nang du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bzhag pa ni 'jim pa la sogs pa la zheng sor brgyad dpangs sor gcig btang/ dbus su rin po che/ shar rdo rje/ lhor 'khor lo/ /
78a3(rgyud 'grel): nub tu pad+ma/ byang du ral gri /kha dog ser por byug go /rgyas pa'i las la kha shar du blta'o/ /zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po/ khru gang du byas/ khru phyed zabs su brko/ kha khyer rgyas pa la sogs pa dang mthun par bya'o/ /dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje
78a4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba btang/ de'i phyi rol tu pad+ma btang/ thab khung du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bzhag pa ni dbus su rdo rje/ shar du 'khor lo/ /lhor rin po che/ nub tu pad+ma/ byang du ral gri /zheng sor brgyad pa bya'o/ /kha dog dkar po byug /bla ma kha byang du
78a5(rgyud 'grel): blta/ dbang gi las la thab khung zla gam ste/ zla gam gshul la bzhi bcu btang/ kha khyer la sor bzhi bcu tham pa/ zabs su sor bcu brko bar bya/ kha khyer sbyar mthun/ kha khyer rdo rje'i ra ba btang/ /phyi rim du me ri btang/ kha dog dmar
78a6(rgyud 'grel): por byug /tsandan smug pos byug /dbus su gtso bo'i phyag mtshan btang ba/ /pad+ma phyi ma spyir mthun dbang dang bskrad pa la kha nub tu blta/ /drag po'i las kyi rim pa la/ thab khung zur gsum la/ sor nyi shu nyi shu bya'o/ /la? khyer sor gsum  
78a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir dgyed/ kha khyer sor gsum bskor/ zheng sor gsum btang/ de'i phyi rol tu sor gsum btang/ kha khyer la rdo rje rtse gsum pa btab/ de'i phyi rim du thod pa dang/ mnga' gzhu dang/ mdud rtse gsum pa la sogs pa drag po'i phyag mtshan
78b1(rgyud 'grel): btang/ gtso bo'i phyag mtshan dbus su ral gri /phyi ma las kyi mtshan nyid dang/ bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o/ /kha dog nag pos byug /kha lhor blta'o/ /rgyas pa nang par bya'o/ /zhi ba nyi ma phyed na bya'o/ /dbang nyi ma nub na bya'o/ /drag po nam
78b2(rgyud 'grel): phyed na bya'o/ /me thab kyi rim pa'o/ /mtshed rdzas dang sreg rdzas kyi rim pa la/ sngags mkhan gyi g.yon du dri dang me tog gi bkang ba'i dud por bzhag /yon chab kyi snod gser la sogs pa las kyi bye brag dang mthun pa chab kyis bkang la
78b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /ma 'byor nas la byas ba yang rung ngo/ /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar dang mar mdun du bzhag g.yas su zangs gzhong gi nang du dris bkang la ku sha bcug la prok+Sha Na'i snod bzhag go /las kyi bum pa gcig kyang bzhag go /til la sogs
78b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sreg rdzas kyang bzhag go /de la rdzas kyi rim pa rgyas pa la zho/ /zhi ba la til/ dbang la utpal dmar po/ /drag po la tsher ma can gyi shing/ phye ma rim pa bzhin no/ /kun gyi sngon du mar/ tha mar yang mar ro/ /rdzas dgram pa'i rim
78b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ gzhong pa kun gyi steng du rdo rje bzhag la/ de nyid gsum gyi sngags brjod pas/ 'jig rten kun gyi rtog pa kun bsal nas/ rdzas de nyid bzang por bsam mo/ /yam shing gi rim pa la/ zhi ba'i yam shing
78b6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'o ma can gyi shing dang rlon pa rtse mo dang/ bcas pa byung ba/ srid du mdzub gang ba sboms su chang pa gang yod pa sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang/ tsandan dkar po'i chus spangs pa/ rtse gcig tu zhi ba'i las la dbul lo/ /rgyas pa'i yam shing ni/
78b7(rgyud 'grel): srid du khru gang pa sboms su zhi ba dang mthun no/ /yal ga dang dbus kyi cha las byung ba/ zho dang mar dang ser po'i dri las sbangs pa/ rtse gcig tu rgyas pa'i las la dbul lo/ /dbang gi yam shing la/ srid du ser lnga pa 'dab ma dang bcas pa sboms
79a1(rgyud 'grel): su chag gang ba yungs mar dang bdud rtsi la sogs kyis spangs la/ dbang gi las la dbul lo/ /drag po'i yam shing ni/ srid du sor bzhi pa/ rtse mo can gyi shing las byung ba/ gsod pa'i las la rab tu shis pa/ mi rus
79a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang/ thal chen lan tsha kha ba dang/ tsha ba'i rdzas rnams chu la spangs la/ rab tu bsgrims la mngon spyod kyi las la dbul bar bya'o/ /yam shing gi rim pa'o/ /bdud shing gi rim pa la/ pa la sha dang n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa
79a3(rgyud 'grel): la bya'o/ /de med na'o ma can gyi shing skam po la byas la las kyis rjes su mthun par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa dang/ ku shas prok+Sha na bya'o/ /any+tsa mAM naM arg+ha bi d+hi dang/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba dang/
79a4(rgyud 'grel): nang gi phyag rgya'i mchod pa bya phyag btsal/ de nas ku shas thams cad la prok+Sha NaM bya'o/ /de nas lcags la sogs pa'i snod sar par shing brtsigs la/ gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i me blangs la/ rlung yab gyis g.yabs la me sbar ro/ /de la spar
79a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags ni/ oM dzwa la dzwa la hUM phaT ces so/ /de nas du ba med cing legs par 'bar ba dang/ thab khung gi shing brtsigs pa la blug go /me sbar ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas ku sha 'bring gnyis shar phyogs su kha bstan la bzhag lho dang nub dang byang
79a6(rgyud 'grel): du yang de bzhin bstan/ ku sha dgram ba'i sngags oM badzra satwa A yu She swAhA/ ku sha dgram pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon yi dam bsgom pa dang ldan pas thabs kyi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa zhig bsams la/ de'i dbus su mngon
79a7(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub pa lnga dang ldan pas kye'i rdo rje yab yum bsgom mo/ 'dod chags chen po skyes pa'i stobs kyis zhu nas dngul chu bzhin du gnas pa las/ de nyid yi ge hUM dang dzaM gnyis su gyur/ yi ge gnyis yongs su gyur pa las me lha yab yum du
79b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de/ me lha zhal gsum phyag drug pa gsus pa ldir ba ral pa'i thor cog can/ mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas kyi bar ma nu gun d+he'o/ /tha ma na mchod sbyin g.yon par na ze 'bru/ tha ma na bgrang phreng
79b2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog las kyi bye brag dang mthun pa'o/ /de ltar bsam pa'i thugs kar sna tshogs padmo/ de'i steng du gru gsum me/ de'i steng du bruM bsams/ dzaM bsam/ lce la raM bsam/ me lha dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /de la yang prok+Sha NaM la sogs
79b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yan chad bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ slob dpon gar dang ldan pas/ dza(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' las kyang bkug la thab kyi khar bzhag /de nas prok+Sha NaM dang any+tsa ma naM la sogs
79b4(rgyud 'grel): ba phyag bya ba yan chad bya/ /de nas yang prok+Sha Na la sogs pa gsum bya'o/ /gar dang ldan pas zhags pas gnyis su med par bstim/ lcags sgrog gis bcing/ dril bus mnyes bar bya/ de nas yang prok+Sha NaM la sogs pa gsum bya'o/ /de nas gzar
79b5(rgyud 'grel): bu gnyis kyi nang du yi dam gyi lha'i snying po'i yi ge hUM re re bsam mo/ /de nas gru mo gnyis sprad la/ mar gzar bu bdun dbul/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+ha naM/ agna ye swAhA/ puSh+Ni ti ti man tra/ oM agna ye puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ de nas blug gzar gyis dbul
79b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ dgang gzar bzhag /oM sarba saM ba de swAhA/ zho dang zen gyi'o/ /oM sarba pA baM da ha na badzrA ya a mu ka sarbA pA pa da ha swAhA til gyi'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ durba'i 'o/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ chag pa med pa'i 'bras kyi'o/ /oM a pra ti
79b7(rgyud 'grel): ha ta badzrA ya swAhA/ ku sha'i sngags so/ /oM badzra bI dzA ya swAhA/ 'bras kyi lag pa na gyi'o/ /oM mahA bE gA ya swAhA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM mahA ba lA ya swAhA/ oM badzra g+hasma ri ye swAhA/ gro'i 'o/ yam shing gi la/ oM badzra adz+nyE ya swAhA/ u dum+ba ra'i 'o//
80a1(rgyud 'grel): oM bo d+hi prok+Sha ya swAhA/ byang chub shing gi'o/ /oM badzra rta tA ya swAhA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM badzra sa hA ka rA ya swAhA/ a mra'i'o/ /de nas yang mar dgang gzar khyengs pa stong man chod dbul lo/ /de nas yang prok+Sha NaM la sogs pa bya/ de
80a2(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs pa dang/ rdo rje dkur bstan dril bu gsil la/ srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i tshigs bcang brjod do/ /de nas me lha la bstod pa bya/ /phyag bya/ de nas las kyi bum pa'i chus thab khung du lan gsum ku shas gtor la bsang bar bya'o//
80a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo bsams la/ me lha'i kha hoM khung du bsams/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' gar dang ldan par dza(rgyud 'grel): sa spyan drangs mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol/ prok+Sha NaM la sogs pa kun rdzogs
80a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ yang phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ dgyes pa bskyed nas gnyis su med par bstims la/ de nas yang prok+Sha NaM la sogs pa phyag bya ba yan chad bya'o/ /de nas mar gzar bu nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad dbul lo/ /de
80a5(rgyud 'grel): nas zho la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi rim pa lha la dbul lo/ /yang mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad man chad dbul lo/ /yang prok+Sha Na la sogs pa bya/ /rdo rje dkur bstan dril bu gsil/ /srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i tshigs bcad brjod
80a6(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa bya/ de nas gar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag bya'o/ /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): yis gshegs su gsol/ bzod par gsol/ de nas rdzas lhag ma ci yod pas me lha la mchod pa dbul lo/ /oM badzra agne swAhA/ zhes rdzas kun zad par
80a7(rgyud 'grel): blugs gzar gyis dbul lo/ /de nas slob ma kun me tog lag tu thogs la rjes su yi rang ba bgyi ste/ slob dpon gyis dgang gzar mar gyis bkang ba'i nang du slob ma kun gyis me tog blugs te/ slob dpon gyis kyang badzra agne swAhA/ zhes brjod
80b1(rgyud 'grel): cing dbul lo/ /slob mas kyang rgyas par gyur cig gam/ zhi bar gyur cig pa'i rjes su yi rang ba bya'o/ /zhi ba yin na ru ru spu ru'i sngags kyis mar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ /rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa la/ prok+Sha Nas ni spyir bsang bar
80b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /any+tsa mA nas ni me tog mtheb mdzub kyis blangs la/ zhal dang thugs dang phyag du dbul bar bya'o/ /arg+ha ni dud phor nas skyor mos lan gsum mdun du dbul lo/ /pA dyaM ni dud phor nas mthab mdzub gnyis kyis me tog blangs la smad de thabs kyi zhabs la
80b3(rgyud 'grel): phog bar byas la lan gsum zhal bsil dbul lo/ /las kyi bum pa ni bsang ba'o/ /sla'i rdzas ni zhal du dbul lo/ /shing bu 'od la dbul/ 'bras la sogs pa rnams ni phyag du dbul/ dri snying gar dbul/ me tog dbu la dbul bdug spos shangs
80b4(rgyud 'grel): la dbul/ dri chabs zhabs la dbul/ arg+ha dang mar me mdun du dbul/ /ma'i de kho na nyid ni bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang/ /sngags rnams gzi byin skye ba dang/ /sdig pa rnams ni bsreg pa'i phyir//
80b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bas kyang sbyin sreg shis/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal gyis zhabs kyis bshad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shI he badzra sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
80b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po dngos med gnyis las byung/ /rmad byung chen po sku che ba/ /sku las 'das pa bde ba che/ /'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po khro ba che/ /bdud kun rnam par 'joms mdzad pa/ /bdag
80b7(rgyud 'grel): med ma yi yid 'ong zhing/ /lha mo'i tshogs kyis rnam par sad/ /rnam dag dga' ba bskyang mdzad cing/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /zhal brgyad 'khor ni brgyad ldan zhing/ /brgyad gnyis gyur pa'i phyag dang ldan/ /rnam par skrag 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): byed ma lus nang/ /gsol bar mngon du phyogs pa'i zhal/ /hUM ni spro dang sdud mdzad pa'i/ /mi bzad rnam par 'dren pa po/ /dus mdza' i chu 'dzin 'brug sgra yis/ /nyon mongs nye bar 'joms pa po/ /glog 'gyu thugs
81a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rlan gyis brlan/ /dam chos char gyi rgyun 'bebs mdzad/ /ma rig gnyid kyis non pa yi/ /khams gsum pa dag rnam sad mdzad/ /thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa'i/ /'jig rten rnams la snang ba stsol/ /log par lhung pa'i 'gro kun
81a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyag mang po rnams rab rkyong zhing/ /lha yi spyan ni rab 'jug pas/ /rmongs pa'i rab rib sel bar mdzad/ /rab tu gsal ba'i gsang chen po/ /don kun skad cig gi bsgrub pa/ /gsang sngags mi las rnam par grol/ /sems can
81a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la rjes brtse ba/ /rdo rje snying po byang chub pa'i/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /char sprin sngon po dang 'dra ba/ /dur khrod gnas su gar thabs bzhugs/ /bdud bzhi po yi khrag chen gyis/ /lha mo'i zhal dang bcas par myos/ /
81a5(rgyud 'grel): zla tshes rtse 'dra'i mche ba mchog /mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor longs spyod pa/ /thod chen rgyu ma las brgyus pa'i/ /phreng bas sku ni rnam par brgyan/ /rol par mdzad pa'i bzhad chen gyis/ /'jigs byed rnams ni 'byer par mdzad/ /yang
81a6(rgyud 'grel): dag dran pas 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /yid la 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /yid bzhin nor bu las lhag pa'i/ /mang zhing rgya che'i bstod mchog gis/ /ngag gis dbang phyug chen pos bstod/ /sgra yi yul las ngas 'das shing/ /rtog
81a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs/ /gti mug chen po yongs 'joms shing/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams dang/ /dpe byad yan lag thams cad ldan/ /mthong bas dga' ba 'phel bar mdzad/ /mchog tu grub pa'i rgyud rnams ni/ /yang dag
81b1(rgyud 'grel): tshim mdzad zla 'od bzang/ /thog ma bar dang mdza' med pa/ /dus gsum rdzogs sangs rgyas nyi ma/ /nyon mongs bud shing nges bsregs pa'i/ /me chen sdig pa pham mdzad pa'i/ /nyi zla me yi 'od zer gyi/ /zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa/ /spyan
81b2(rgyud 'grel): ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i tshogs/ /rmongs pa'i dbye ba rnam gsum 'joms/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /chags pa chen pos rab grol mdzad/ /rang rig grub pa mchog ldan pa'i/ /bde ba'i thabs ni nye bar ston/ /srid dang mya
81b3(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das las brgal/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das nang bzhugs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i mchu myang zhing/ /phyag rgya lngas legs rgyas btab la/ /shin tu 'khyud pa'i longs spyod kyi/ /rab bsgrub dga' bas rol par mdzad/ /ro yi thal bas
81b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag byugs/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mtshan mo'i dus su rol pa che/ /dpal ldan he ru ka la 'dud/ /gang zhig gtso bo spangs nas ni/ /skad cig tsam yang rol mi mdzad/ /skal bzang yid 'ong skal ba
81b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma la 'dud/ /dbang po phyogs su tshangs pa ni/ /zhabs brdubs gnon pas yang dag bzhugs/ /yid 'ong sku mdog sngon por ldan/ /gau rI la ni spyi bos 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyogs su dbang po ni/ /
81b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par nyed pas steng bzhugs shing/ /cang te'u sgra sgrogs yan lag kun/ /btsod mdog tsau rI de la 'dud/ /nub kyi phyogs su nye dbang gis/ /steng du gar gyis bzhugs mdzad pa/ /btso ma'i gser mdog rnal 'byor ma/ /
81b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur bet+tA lI la 'dud/ /byang phyogs drag po'i steng bzhugs shing/ /'jigs pa'i sprul ni phyag na bsnams/ /rin chen margad mdog 'dra ba'i/ /drag gsol g+hasma ri la 'dud/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gshin rje yi/ /rgyal
82a1(rgyud 'grel): po yang dag gnon pas bzhugs/ /in+d+ra nI la 'bar 'dra ba'i/ /skal ldan puk+kA sI la 'dud/ /me yi phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi/ /steng du gang gyis bzhugs mdzad cing/ /ston zla ltar dkar dbang phyug ma/ /mchog gyur
82a2(rgyud 'grel): sha ba rI la 'dud/ /bden bral phyogs su bden bral lha/ /gnon cing phyag mchog 'khor los mtshan/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu yi/ /skur ldan tsa tA lI la 'dud/ /rlung phyogs thags bzangs ris steng du/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/
82a3(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong sna tshogs sku mdog ldan/ /Dom+bi ni la'ang gus pas 'dud/ /gang zhig mchog tu za ba 'di la/ /gang du bdag gi 'di 'dra'i tshig /gang zhig mgon mchog rgya chen la/ /gang du nyung sbyang 'di yis bstod/ /'on kyang gang phyir bdag gi
82a4(rgyud 'grel): bu/ gzhon nu so tha ra zhes pas/ /gsol ba btab pa de yi phyir/ /'di 'dra'i bstod pa byas pa yin/ /mgon po lha mo brgyad bcas la/ /bdag gis mdor bsdus bstod pa yis/ /dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa/ /de yis bdag kyang de 'drar
82a5(rgyud 'grel): shog /dpal rje btsun dgyes pa'i rdo rje la bstod pa rig pa'i gnas ma lus pa la mkhas pa sgrub pa'i slob dpon kha che yul du 'khrungs pa dpal rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
82a6(rgyud 'grel): ku mA ra ka la sha dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ nai rAtna mo gi ni sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ bdag med rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje sems dpa' la
82a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /Dom+bi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas/ kye yi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/ /de nyid thams cad yang dag bsdus pa yi/ /lha mo'i 'khor lo bsgom pa gsungs pa'o/ /nam mkha' rje btsun bla ma dang/ /mi bskyod pa'i yi sku lta bu'i/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje
82b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang dmigs te/ /blo dang ldan pas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /snying gar rang gi sa bon bsam/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni rab tu dbul/ /rtag tu lha mo brgyad rnams kyis/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba las/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga dkar mo stsogs/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni
82b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par brjod/ /sngon mo gtum mo Dom+bi ni/ /ro dang bcas te 'khyud par ldan/ /rtag tu sdig pa bshags pa dang/ /bsod nams nyid la rjes yi rang/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro /byang chub sems ni rnam par bzung/ /dang por
82b3(rgyud 'grel): byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis pa snying rje rnam par bsgom/ /gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi mdza' nas btang snyoms so/ /de rjes rgyal ba'i sngags brjod de/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang gzhan stong pa nyid
82b4(rgyud 'grel): du rnams bsgoms sngon gyi ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni smon lam rjes su dran par bya/ /dang por re pa las ni nyi ma rnam par bsgom/ /nyi ma der ni hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rnam par bsgom bya ba/ /rab dang ni gur yang rab tu
82b5(rgyud 'grel): bcing bar bya/ /shes rab e yi gzugs can ma/ /blo ldan nam mkha' i khams bsam bya/ /der ni sa gzhi gru bzhi pa/ /ljang gu rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor nang gnas par/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par
82b6(rgyud 'grel): me'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor lo/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nang gnas par/ /bdag kyang bsam par bya ba ste/ /e baM nyid du bdag dang ni/ /'dres par gyur pa 'khor lo yin/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba
82b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyud kyis nye bar brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo der ni srog song ba/ /bco lnga rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi phyogs mtshams las/ /gdan ni bco lnga nyid du brjod/ /gdan
83a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du zla ba yin/ /zla steng rnam 'byed blo ldan pas/ /de dag nang song sa bon ni/ /rtsa ba'i dbyangs yig la sogs bsam/ /me long mnyam nyid ye shes dag /zla ba nyi ma rab tu grags/ /a las byung ba'i gri gug ni/ /so sor
83a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa nyid du brjod/ /'di rnams gcig gyur nan tan te/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnams kyi lus/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid grags/ /nyi zla dag dang gri gug gis/ /ji ltar chu ni 'dres 'gyur pa/ /yang ni 'dres
83a3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur nas phyis/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma bskyed de/ /kha dog nag mo grags chen mo/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas na gri gug 'jigs chen ma/ /g.yon pa nyid ni pad+ma'i snod/ /g.yas min par ni kha TwAM ga /stag gi pags
83a4(rgyud 'grel): pas smad dkris so/ /a A i a'i u/ /bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams kyis brjod do/ /a'u ri rI li/ puk+ka sI la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /lI e i o/ /sa bon rnams ni dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyis brjod do/ /oM aM sa bon ngag
83a5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'og dang steng gi gnas pa ngag gir yang brjod do/ /sems dang phan pa rin chen bdag /tshe dpag med dang don grub kyis/ /bdag med la sogs phyag rgya gdab/ /shes rab 'phar mar rnam par gnas/ /sems dang phen pa'i rin chen bdag/
83a6(rgyud 'grel): tshe dpag med pa bde gshegs kyis/ /mtshams nas puk+ka sI la sogs/ /rim pa'i rjes la phyag rgyas gdab/ /rnal 'byor ma mi bzhi rnams kyis/ /rtag tu bsgoms gnas nyid la ni/ /zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang/ /'dod chags rdo rje phyag rgyas
83a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /'og dang steng dang sku gsung gi /phyag rgyas byed pas rdzogs pa'o/ /phyag rgyas gdab dang rtan pa 'dis/ /de nas phyag rgya nyi shu brjod/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin gau ri/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lus dan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /
83b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ /de bzhin 'tshed mer ri khrod ma/ /bden bral du ni gtum mo ste/ /rlung du Dom+bir brjod pa'o/ /yang ni shar sgor dkar mo ste/ /de bzhin lhor ni chom rkun ma/ /nub kyi sgo la ro langs
83b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /de bzhin byang du g+hasma rI/ /'og tu sa spyod mar bshad de/ /steng du mkha' spyod mar brjod do/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad dam par dga' ba'o/ /snying gar rang gi sa bon bsam/ /'od zer phyung ste de nas ni/ /sangs rgyas
83b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya/ /phyi nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /bcom ldan bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol/ /bum pa bdud rtsi lngas
83b4(rgyud 'grel): gang ba/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur nas ni/ /dbu rgyan la ni thugs bdag yin/ /dang por nag po bsgom par bya/ /gnyis pa dmar po bsgom par bya/ /gsum pa la ni ser por bsgom/ /de bzhin
83b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par ljang gu ste/ /lnga pa kha dog sngon po nyid/ /drug pa dkar po'i tshul can te/ /yan lag drug sgom rnal 'byor pas/ /phyi nas kha dog rnam par spangs/ /gzugs phung la ni rdo rje ma/ /tshor ba la ni dkar mo brjod/ /'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor
83b6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes phung po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma rnams so/ /dkyil 'khor bdag mo 'jigs gzugs gnas/ /'jigs pa 'ang ni 'jigs pa mdzad/ /sin puk+ka si ru bshad//
83b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin chu khams ri khrong ma/ /me ni gtum mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad/ /sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la g+hasma ri rab brjod/ /reg bya sa sbyong mar
84a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad de/ /chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /mig dag gti mug rdo rje yin/ /rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /sna la ser sna mar bshad de/ /kha la 'dod
84a2(rgyud 'grel): chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /go cha 'di rnams ches dag pas/ /dbang po rnams kyi rnam par sbyong/ /skyes pa'i thod pa'i phreng bas bskor/ /gri gug lta ni gcod pa ste/ /thod pa nyon mongs
84a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo yi/ /phreng ba'i steng du gnas pa'o/ /bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la/ /phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo gzung/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /smod tshig mi mnyan pa yi phyir/ /nyan pa dag tu rna cha 'dzin/ /sngags zlos phyir ni mgul de ste/ /
84a4(rgyud 'grel): lag gdub srog chags gsod pa spangs/ /phyag rgya bsten phyir ska rags te/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yis/ /rtag tu lus la gdab par bya/ /sngags ni/ oM a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI e i o aau aM swAhA/ phyag rgya'i rnam dag
84a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ba/ /'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa/ 'od dpag med pa rna cha'i bdag /mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag /lag pa la ni rnam snang brjod/ /ska rags la ni don yod gnas/ /'di rnams dag la phyag rgya lnga/ /skyon ni yongs
84a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms 'dzin pa ni/ /rnal 'byor mas ni rab tu gzung/ /nang gi rnal 'byor bshad par bya/ /mo gzugs 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /khro bo'i gzugs kyis sreg par byed/ A li kA li snyoms zhugs pas/ /phyi rol gyi ni gnyis gnyis bkab
84a7(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags ni/ /oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha swAhA/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags ni/ oM A ka rau mu khaM sarba d+harmA NA/ A dyA nutpan+na twat/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma'i/ /sdom pa'i dbye ba
84b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /lte bar phyag rgya chen por gnas/ /rtag tu bde ba chen por 'dzag /rno phyir me yi gzugs su ni/ /de yang ma mo rnams kyis brtags/ /dang por dbyangs yig rang bzhin te/ /glor ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /'jig rten
84b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum du khyab gnas kyang/ /so so'i skye bos mi shes so/ bdag med lus kyi nang na gnas/ /zhim med pa ni kha dog tu/ /rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems/ /sbyor bas brtags par 'dzin pa nyid/ /de phyir lus la rtsa gsum gnas/ /rkyang ma
84b3(rgyud 'grel): ro ma kun dar ma/ sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyi ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya nyid du bcas/ /rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin dang/ /ro ma thabs kyis yan lag gnas/ /a ba d+hU ti'i dbus gnas su/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa ste/ /bde chen byed
84b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs can ma/ /mi bskyod 'bab pa rkyang ma ste/ /ro ma khrag ni 'bab pa'o/ /kun dar mgon po dpag med kyi/ /rtag tu gnas kyi dngos po ma/ /las kyi phyag rgya bde ba can/ /rang gi lus la rtsa rnams gsum/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes
84b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'dzag pa ste/ /gcig pa'i dus ni rdo rje yi/ /rin chen 'dzin pa'i dbyings nyid do/ /dpag med mgon gyi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin brjod pa ste/ /mtshan mo'ang nyin par dag tu yang/ /rtag tu ye
84b6(rgyud 'grel): shes skyes pa nyid/ /lhan cig skyes pa mchog dga' ba/ /pha yi bde ba bzang po 'bab/ /dper na gang yang mtshan mo'i khyim nang du/ /zas za lus kyi yongs su byed 'dod pa/ /sbar ba mar me yis ni mun rum ltas/ /de bzhin mun pa'i bde ba yin/
84b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar shes bya srid pa'i mtsho dug chu/ /'dod chags la sogs sna 'thung khyab/ /bkres pas gdungs pa rlabs dang 'khril shing rnam 'khril mya ngan gcig pu 'gram chen po/ /gang phyir byang chub blo ldan skye bo skad cig kyang ni rang don gcig
85a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyer ba/ /gti mug zhags pa'i gos ni spangs nas pha rol mi 'gro bdag gis ngo mtshar che/ blo bzang dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed dang phan pa'i phyag rgya dang/ /sngags ni rnam dag gug kyed go cha thams cad
85a2(rgyud 'grel): nges pa dran pa bral mi bya/ /phyi nas blo bzang rang shing skad cig rgyun tu de nyid cig gis sems dang ldan/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa srid pa las byung lhan cig skyes pa rtag tu bsam// //ra d+ha longs spyod tshong 'dus sna tshogs
85a3(rgyud 'grel): brang ldan kang kha'i khab ces bya ming du/ /stag zhon sna tshogs sbrul mgo gdengs pas brgyan cing gang zhig bzod ldan spyod pa gang/ /de nas gzhan phan 'dod phyir 'jig rten don du gang bshad sgrub thabs dbang po 'di/ /gsang ba'i shes rab
85a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag 'du ba bdag gis gang bshad rgyal sras bzod par mdzod/ /bdud rtsi 'od kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //
85a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nai rAt+ma sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba bud med 'dul gzigs nas/ /bdag med rnal 'byor mar bsgyur gang/ /thub
85a6(rgyud 'grel): pas pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal/ /sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rnal 'byor dang po slob dus na/ /nges pa'i gnas bzang brtag byas te/ /gar gnas sngags pas sgrub pa yi/ /sems ni gcig pu mnyam bzhag pa'i/ /ri dang tshang tshing
85a7(rgyud 'grel): bya skyibs ni/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan pa'i/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bcas byas la/ /snying gar paM las pad+ma ste/ /de steng raM las nyid kyis 'khor/ /der ni bsal bar a bsams te/ /de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /rdo rje las
85b1(rgyud 'grel): byung thugs rje chen/ nam mkhar rje btsun dmigs byas la/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/ /lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya/ /gau rI ri bong can 'dzin cing/ /chom rkun ma ni nyi ma'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni lag na chu/ /za bod ma ni
85b2(rgyud 'grel): sman 'dzin cing/ /puk+ka sI lag rdo rje ste/ /de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/ /gtum mo cang te'u brdung byas te/ /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas/ /g.yung mos phrag nas 'khyung pa nyid/ /bla mas
85b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rab tu mchod/ /bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni/ /bdud po yongs su dag pa bya/ /sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang/ /byed pa yang ni sdom pa dang/ /bsod nams dag la rjes yi rang/ /de nas yongs su bsngo bar gyis/ /dkon
85b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /byang chub mchog sems bskyed pa dang/ /lam la gnas shing bdag kyang ni/ /gzhan gyi don du dbul ba dang/ /gnang nod yang ni tshangs pa yi/ /gnas bzhis sems ni dbugs phyung ste/ /dang
85b5(rgyud 'grel): po byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom/ /gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /thams cad tha ma btang snyoms so/ /phyis ni byang chub sems brtan bya/ /de nas bsrung ba'i dam tshig go dang po bden brdzun
85b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dpyad nas/ /rtog pa bya na bsgom mi nus/ /bskyed pa med par rab sbyor bas/ /bskyed pa 'di ni rab bshad do/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ stong par rab bskyed hUM sngon las/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya/ /'gro
85b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa/ /hUM las gsal bar spro bar bya/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes brjod do/ /'di las rdo rjes bskor ba'i gur/ /bla re yang ni bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /de yi dbus su bsgom pa ni/ /yaM byung rlung
86a1(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor ste/ /sngon po gzhu brdungs ba dan mtshan/ /raM byung me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje'i phreng bskor gru gsum dmar/ /baM las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum/ /dkar po bum pas bskor ba mchan/ /laM byu
86a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste/ /ser po rdo rje phreng ba bskor/ /b+h+rUM las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag /srid pa bar ma bsam byas nas/ /e baM nyid du rab tu 'dres/ /'dres gyur de las byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas pho brang thun mong yin/ /ngos bzhi
86a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang sgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan byas te/ /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni/ /kha sbyor gnyis dang skyon med pa/ /ze 'bru la ni gcig nyid te/ /
86a4(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum las ni gzhan du brjod/ /de yi dbus su ro bsams la/ /bco lnga'i gdan ni bdag nyid do/ /de'i steng du zla ba yin/ /zla ba'i steng du sa bon te/ /phyis ni nyi mas mnan pas so/ /gnyis su 'dus pa'i bde chen po/ /A
86a5(rgyud 'grel): li zla ba'i gzugs su gnas/ /kA li nyi ma'i gzugs gnas te/ /zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus las/ /gau rI la sogs sa bon ni/ /a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI e i o aau aM A li dang po bdag med ma/ /A li gnyis
86a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje ste/ /A li gsum pa gau ri ste/ /bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /drug pa puk+ka sI zhes brjod/ /ri khrod ma ni bdun pa ste/ /gtum mo brgyad par shes par bya/ /dgu pa dang ni g.yung mo nyid/ /yang ni gau rI lnga
86a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ /chom rkun ma ni bcu gcig ste/ /bcu gnyis rau langs ma zhes bya/ /bcu gsum pa ni za phod ma/ /bcu bzhi sa spyod ma zhes bya/ /bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sa bon no/ /zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ /
86b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid ldan pa rta bdun pa/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtog pa yin zhes brjod/ /thams cad gcig gyur nan tan te/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /'di dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin
86b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ zla ba nyi ma rab phye bas/ /A li shes rab kA li thabs/ /gau rI la sogs 'di las byung/ /dang po nang gi kha sbyar ba/ /nges par rnal 'byor ma lnga gnas/ /dbang po rdo rje gshin gau rI/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lus ngan rdo rje
86b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /phyi rol gyi ni kha sbyor la/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ /byin za'i grwar ni ri khrod ma/ /bden bral du ni gtum mo ste/ /rlung gi mtshams su g.yung mo nyid/ /'di dag mtshams kyi rnal
86b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma/ /shar gyi phyogs su gau rI ste/ /lho dang nub dang byang du ni/ /chom rkun ro langs za phong ma'o/ /'di dag phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma'o/ /steng zhal ma dang 'og zhal ma/ /lha mo sa spyod mkha' spyod ma'o/ /'khor lo'i bdag po bdag
86b5(rgyud 'grel): med ma/ /zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum dmar/ /phyag gnyis skra ser gyen du 'greng/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha TwAM ga /g.yas pa'i phyag gis gri gug 'dzin/ /'khor lo rna cha mgur chu dang/ /lag gdub dang ni ska rags 'dzin/ /skyil krung
86b6(rgyud 'grel): phyed pas ro mnan nas/ /stag gi pags pas smad bkris shing/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /'di dag thams cad mtshungs par bshad/ /rang snying pad snying sa bon bsam/ /ye shes snying gar ye shes bsgom/ /dgug pa byas
86b7(rgyud 'grel): ta yang dag mchod/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /gti mug rdo rje mig gnyis la/ /rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /sna la ser sna ma zhes brjod/ /la la 'dod
87a1(rgyud 'grel): chags rdo rje ma/ /reg la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid la rnal 'byor bdag med ma/ /sku gsung de bzhin thugs kyi ni/ /oM dang A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sngags 'di las/ /mkhas spyod ma dang sa spyod ma/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i bsam
87a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs su yang dag brjod/ /'di ltar rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer ni/ /lcags kyu'i rnam pas bde gshegs bkug /lha mo brgyad kyis mchod byas na/ /dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o/ /bcom
87a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol/ /de nas he ru ka yi gzugs/ /de nas bdag la dbang skur bsam/ /sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag /snang ba mdza' yas don grub rnams/ /bdag med shar gyi
87a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga rgya yes gdab/ /sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag /snang mdza' mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma/ /zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal che/ /'dod chags rdo rje phyogs gnas ma/ /rgyas gdab sku dang gsung nyid kyis/ /mkha' 
87a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ma dang sa spyod ma/ /dang po nag po bsgom par bya/ /gnyis pa dmar po bsgom pa ste/ /gsum pa ser po bsgom pa'o/ /de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu'o/ /lnga pa kha dog sngon po'o/ /drug pa dkar por rnam par bsgom/ /rnal 'byor yan lag
87a6(rgyud 'grel): drug bsgom bya/ /lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas/ /bsreg pas haM la ri bong 'dzag /bsam gtan gyis dub rnal 'byor gang/ /de ni dag pa rjes dran bya/ /gzugs
87a7(rgyud 'grel): phul rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba gsang ba gau rI ste/ /de bzhin chu lha 'du shes ma/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes phung po gzugs su ni/ /bdag med rdo rje ma gnas so/ /sa khams puk+ka sI ru brjod/ /chu khams ri khrod ma ru brjod/ /
87b1(rgyud 'grel): drod ni gtum mor rab tu brjod/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /gzugs la gau ri rab tu grags/ /sgra la chom rkun rab tu grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la de bzhin za phod ma/ /reg bya la ni sa sbyod de/ /chos kyi khams la mkha' 
87b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod ma/ /zhe sdang rdo rje mar bshad do/ /'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /ser sna gsang ba'i gau rI ma/ /de bzhin gti mug rdo rje ste/ /yid la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhe sdang la sogs dag pa'o/
87b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i bdud ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gri gug lha ni gcod pa'o/ /thod pa nyon mongs mgo bo yi/ /phung po'i bdud ni re ri brjod do/ /mi bskyod pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs/ /snang ba mdza' yas rna cha'i bdag /mgur chu la ni rin chen  
87b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag /lag gdub la ni rtag par brjod/ /ska rags la ni don yod gnas/ /phyag rgya lnga ni rnam par dag /bsam gtan gyis dub gsang sngags bzlas/ /A li mdza' yi a spangs pa/ /oM yig hUM phaT dang ldan pa'i/ /swAhA
87b5(rgyud 'grel): mthar bzhag gsang sngags so/ /oM a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI e i o aau aM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa dang/ /bshegs ni zad cing zhi ba'i phyir/ /'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /mi g.yo bas ni gtor ma sbyin/ /rlung
87b6(rgyud 'grel): me thong pa la gnas pa/ /'bar bar bsro ba la sogs pas/ /sha chen bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub po/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /oM inda dza ma dza la dzak+Sha b+hU ta ba h+ni ba u rak+Sha tsanda sUdzdza mA da bap+pa ta la pa tA li aSh+TA sap+pa swAhA/ i daM bi la b+huM ny+dza
87b7(rgyud 'grel): dziM g+ha/ pul+la d+hU ba puny+tsa? mAM sa bid+g+ha/ mamtsa? sap+pa kadzdza sA d+ha/ khan+ti khu Ni phe Da ga da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ AdyA nutpan+na twAt/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub pa'i zla bas mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs
88a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nai rAt+ma de bI pany+tsa da shas+to tra/ bod skad du/ bdag
88a2(rgyud 'grel): med ma lha mo bco lnga la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mos pa sna tshogs gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir/ /chos dbyings mi bskyod 'gag pa med pa las/ /thabs kyis sprul pa sna tshogs ston mdzad
88a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /ye shes thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid a las skyes/ /bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa 'jigs pa'i sku/ /mi bskyod dbu brgyan bde ba chen po'i dang/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
88a4(rgyud 'grel): A las skyes pa'i mdzes ma rdo rje ma/ /rtag tu dgyes pas kha TwAM ga la gzigs/ /gdug pa rnam skrag rnam snang cod pan thogs/ /dur khrod rgyan dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i las byung ba'i gsang ba'i gau rI ma/ /gzi brjid mi mtshungs
88a5(rgyud 'grel): gang ldan ro mchog myong/ /don dam thugs chud dbu rgyan rin chen tog /spyan gsum thod rlon can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /A li kA li'i snyoms 'jug rnal 'byor ma/ /bde la rtag dgyes byang chub sems kyi dang/ /'od dpag med kyis
