109b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gang rung ba zhig bya'o/ /de nas de kho na nyid gsum bzlas pa'i mchog tu gyur pas mchod par bsam zhing mar me chen po dang bdug spos kyis kyang rab tu bdugs bsgyings pa'i sngags kyis dril bu'i sgra dang ldan par dkrol zhing/
109b3(rgyud 'grel): oM lo le le hUM a zhes bsgyings pa'i sngags kyis ji srid ma phebs kyi bar du dbab bo/ /phebs pa dang rims kyis sam cig car du ba mos reg pa lta bu 'am ba spu ldang ba dang g.yo ba dang mchim 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na chang gi stobs kyis phog pa lta bu
109b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyel ba dang mchog gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ltar yang bde ba bskyed pa'o/ /de nas slang la sad par gyur pa dang slob mas maN+Dal byas la rnal 'byor dang mchod pa dang sngags dang cho ga rnams rim gyis bstan no/ /dang pa dang bral ba rnams la ni ma yin no/
109b5(rgyud 'grel): ngas kyang bla ma'i bka' lung me tog dri ma med pa lta bu mgo thog tu bkur te/ de nas gzung ste bcom ldan 'das ma dang bla ma dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la mnyam par gus pas bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de dag ni bdag med ma'i man ngag las slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i
109b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ste bco lnga pa'o// //bdag med man ngag byas pa yi/ /bdag gi bsod nams gang byung ba/ /des ni 'gro rnams myur pa ru/ /bdag med rgyal ba'i yum 'gyur shog /bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa/ /bdag med ma'i man ngag
109b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //'di yang dpal oDhuN? gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhal nas byung pa/ rnal 'byor ma kun gyi thugs mchog tu gsang ba'i gzugs can snying po las shin tu snying po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa
110a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni ma dad cing bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la ma bsnyen pa dag gis mi 'thob ste/ 'di'i yon tan mdza' yas pa'i gzhi dang bde bar yid ches par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa'i don grub pa/ chu 'i rgyun ltar bsten pas 'bras
110a2(rgyud 'grel): bu gter ba can/ nam mkha' ltar ro mnyam pa 'di rna ba gcig nas gcig tu byung bas na bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las/ brjed par dogs pas rang dran pa'i don du bdag gis bris pas de'i phyir dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par gsol zhing/ gzhan
110a3(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyid rig pa rnams la yang bzod par gsol lo zhes pa'o/ /'di mdzad pa'i slob dpon yang brtan pa'i 'khor lo dpal 'jam dpa' i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po/ dpal bzang po'i zhabs kyi pad+ma las skyes/ zhabs kyi rdul la
110a4(rgyud 'grel): brtse ba mchog tu gyur pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bka' drin las skyes pa paN+Di ta dpal ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhabs shes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de bA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dpyal ser rtsa bsod
110a5(rgyud 'grel): nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //mchog tu gsang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ /dman pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas/ /dri ma med pa'i blo yis ni/ /dam pa 'ga' yi don du bsgyur/ /bdag med ma'i man ngag rdzogs so// //
110a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nai rAt+ma maN+Dal tsakra swA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rtse mo la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis gus pas rab btud
110a7(rgyud 'grel): de/ 'bum lnga las btus lha mo'i 'khor lo ni/ /zab mo'i don la bag chags skyes phyir bri/ /'dir rten gyi gang zag ni so sor thar ba'i sdom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa dang ldan pas/ gnas nyin mo dur
110b1(rgyud 'grel): khrod/ mtshan mo rang gi khyim du bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang shis pa'i dus nam gyi brgyad cha la langs te/ khrus dang chu spyin byas nas/ maN+Dal phul te de nas mchod pa dang/ gtor ma la sogs pa bshams te/ 'bol ba'i stan la rdo rje skyil mo krung
110b2(rgyud 'grel): gis 'dug ste/ badzra ni ra At+ma zhes brjod pas rang nyid skad cig gis bdag med mar bsgoms te/ de yang sku mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas gri gug yu ba lcags la so zangs las byas pa/ g.yon pas thod pa phyi dkar
110b3(rgyud 'grel): ba la nang dmar pa khrag gis bkang pa kha TwAM ga dang bcas pa bsnams pa la/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan par bsams pa'i snying pad+ma brgyad kha phye ba'i nang du raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aM sngon po bsams la/ de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma rje btsun mi bskyod
110b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku lta bu rdo rje 'chang dang lha mo rnams gnyis su med pa tha mi dad par rang bzhin gyis bzhugs pa gsal ba 'am/ 'og min chos kyi pho brang nas spyan drangs te dmigs la/ de la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang
110b5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ lam bsten pa dang/ kun rdzob dang don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngos la/ tshogs brten pa blos
110b6(rgyud 'grel): btang la 'am/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de yang bla ma rdo rje can mchod cing/ bdun po yongs su dag par bya zhes gur las gsungs so/ /de'i rjes la/ dang por byams pa bsgom par bya/ gnyis pa snying rje rnam sgom zhing/
110b7(rgyud 'grel): /gsum pa med pa bsgom pa dang/ /kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so/ /de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas/ /snod bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nya' na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod pas stong pa nyid brtan
111a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas re bas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas/ /nyi der hUM 'byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang/ /gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid/ /de yi nang du bsam bya ni/ /b+h+ruM las 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa/
111a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya che khong stong mi g.yo ba/ /'khor ba'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /dbus su rnam par bsgom pa ni/ /'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon/ /ji ltar
111a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs par byin za dang/ /lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang/ /b+h+ruM las 'khor lo'i thig le ni/ /ji ltar bsgom pa 'byung ba las/ /chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid/ /'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa/ /ze 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te/ /gru gsum
111a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni phyi mar brjod/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka pa brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /dra pa dra ba phyed par ldan/ /dur khrod brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i thig gis rnam par sbras/ /de dbus shi ba bco lnga'i ro/ /gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par
111a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /a la badzra nga rgyal bya'o/ /ro steng lnga gsum zla steng du/ /A li lnga gsum zhu ba las/ /des mtshan zla ba lnga gsum bskyed/ /de rjes brjod pa gnyis bsnan ba'i/ /kA li lnga gsum zhu ba las/ /des mtshan snang byed lnga gsum bskyed/
111a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi nyi zla'i bar du ni/ nA da lhung bas a ru bsam/ de las a ni bcu bzhi ni/ /phyogs mtshams nyi zla'i bar du spro/ /A i a'i u 'phar ma'i shar la sogs par spro'o/ /a'u ri rI li phyi'i 'phar ma'i puk+ka sI la sogs pa'i mtshams
111a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi'o/ /lI e o o gau ri la sogs phyogs kyi'o/ /aau aM/ 'og dang steng gi sa bon no/ /de las spro zhing bsdu ba las/ /gri gug bco lnga sa bon bsam/ /de las spro bsdus gcig tu 'dres/ /de las lha mo bco lnga'i sku/ /kun kyang kha dog nag por
111b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /?? me long ye shes ldan/ /rta bdun pa ni mnyam pa nyid/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtog par -shes par bya/ /thams cad gcig gyur bya nan tan/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa yis/ /
111b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga ? bsgom pa nyid/ /de la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /kha dog nag mo drag chen mo/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas par gri gug rnam par bsnams/ /g.yon pa nyid ni pad+ma'i snod/ /g.yas min par ni kha TwAM ga /stag gi pags
111b3(rgyud 'grel): pas smad dkris bya'o/ /re zhig nang 'phar ma la/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa/ /phung po lnga yis rang bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkar/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lus ngan rdo
111b4(rgyud 'grel): rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad/ /dbang dkar gshin rje chom rkun ma/ /chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma/ /lus ngan por ni g+hasma rI/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ /mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma/ /bden
111b5(rgyud 'grel): bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing/ /rlung du g.yung mo rnam par bzhag /'og tu sa spyod mar bshad de/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes brjod/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas/ /lha mo
111b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kha dog gnag /drag tshon phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba rnams/ /lag par gri gug thod pas khyab/ 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang/ /lag par lag gdub ska rags ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /
111b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta phyag rgya dag pa yis/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad/ /lag pa gcig gi thod pas bral/ /g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pas kha TwAM ga nyid do/ /stag gi pags pas smad bkris shing/
112a1(rgyud 'grel): ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skra ser/ /nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams/ /gcod phyir gri gug rnam par bsnams/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi /mgo bo'i pad+ma'i snod du ni/ /bdud rnams rnam
112a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi yi khrag /dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya/ /stong pa'i rnam pas kha TwAM ga /thabs kyi ro ni rnam par brtag /'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de rjes go cha'i rnal 'byor bsgom/ /dang por nag po rab tu
112a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /gnyis pa dmar por rnam par bsgom/ gsum pa la ni ser por bsgom/ /bzhi pa ljang gu de bzhin no/ /lnga par kha dog sngon po dang/ /drug par dkar po'i lus can te/ /yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas/ /lhan cig skyed pa'i rang bzhin
112a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /de nas sngags gsum du byin gyis brlab pa dang/ ye shes sems dpa' i 'khor los byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /de nas dbang bskur bar byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i mthar a b+hi Shi ke'i ku la pa tis nga rgyal bya'o/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya bdag
112a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ /gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid/ /chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab/ /phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhe sdang phyag rgyas puk+ka sI/ /gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol
112a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o?/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid/ /yang na dkar mo zhe sdang rgyas/ /gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g+hasma rI/ /gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas
112a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod ma'o/ /de nas kha TwAM ga dang snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ drin pa tsam gyis rjes su chags pa'i mchod pa byas la/ a nu rA gas nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma ji lta ba bzhin du bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs te myangs la/ a mri ta badzra sa nga rgyal bya'o//
112b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa phyi dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyis mchod de pU dza badzras nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas mos pa sna tshogs gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa byas te/ stu ti badzras nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas rang byin gyis brlab pa ni/
112b2(rgyud 'grel): lam cig car pa 'am/ lam rim gyis pa 'am/ lam nye bar bsgrub pa gsum gang mos dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rgyas btab la gsum tshogs pa gcig tu bsgom ste bla ma las blang bar bya'o/ /de nas 'khor rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi ni
112b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gtso mo'i sa bon las bsdus te/ de nas nang gi rgyas gdab bsgom mo/ /des skyon rnam dag dran pa ni/ /gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba la yang dkar mo brjod/ /'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gre ma/ /rnam shes
112b4(rgyud 'grel): phung po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /bdag med rnal 'byor mar gnas so/ /gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad/ /sgra la tshom rkun mar rab grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la g+hasma rI rab grags/ /reg la sa sbyod ma zhes brjod/ /ches kyi dbyings
112b5(rgyud 'grel): la mkha' spyod ma/ /rtag tu 'di rnams rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje ma/ /rna bar zhe snang rdo rje ma/ /sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad/ /lce la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid
112b6(rgyud 'grel): la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /sa ni puk+ka sI zhes bshad/ /chu khams rngon pa mo zhes brjod/ /me ni gtum por shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje ma/ /'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /phrag dog
112b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid/ /gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad/ /zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyor ba/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las ni/ /'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya/ /bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la/ /phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /smod tshig mi mnyan pa yi phyir/ /rna ba bdag la rna cha 'dzin/ /sngags bzlas phyir ni mgul rgyan te/ /lag gdub srog chags gsod pa sdangs/ /phyag rgya bsten phyir ska regs nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga
113a2(rgyud 'grel): yi phyag rgya yis/ /rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab/ /phyag rgya'i rnam dag bshad par bya/ /'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa/ /rna cha 'od dpag med kyi bdag /mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag /lag gdub la ni rnam snang mdzad/ /ska rags la ni
113a3(rgyud 'grel): don yod gnas/ /'di rnams dag pa phyag rgya lnga/ /de nas dag gis bzlas pa ni/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): a A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lAM e i o a hUM swAhA/ zhes spyi dang bye brag gi mtshams su bzlas pa bya'o/ /dag gi brjod pa kyang skyon de nyid bzhi dang ldan
113a4(rgyud 'grel): pas gtor ma btang ngo/ /de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ /rigs su skye dang dam tshig dang la sogs pas bya'o/ /de nas spyod lam kyi rnal 'byor bya'o/ /thun dang po'i de bzhin du thun 'og ma rnams kyi bya ba la shes par bya'o/ /'di lta bu'i lha
113a5(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga las nyung par 'dod na steng 'og gi dor ba bcu gsum bsgom/ de yang mangs na nang gi bzhi bzhag la lha dgu bsgom mo/ /de yang mangs na phyi rol brgyad dor la lha lnga bsgom mo/ /de yang mangs na dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar gtso mi rgyang ba
113a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa ni bla ma na ro pa chen po'i zhal gyi lung ngo/ /lha mo 'khor lo bris pa'i dge bas ni/ /srid pa gsum gyi khongs su gtogs pa yi/ /sems can bdag med ma yi don rtogs nas/ /sdig bral mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro bar shog /bdag med
113a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tsakra'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI he badzra tan+ta me na swA tiSh+Tha na ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rim pa las/ bdag byin gyis brlab pa ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs
113b1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes rdor rgyud dang rjes 'brel ba'i/ /'jig rten gsum dbang bsdud mdzad ma/ /ku ru kul+le la btud de/ /de yi sgrub thabs gsal bar bshad/ /rgyud 'di sgom pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa'i sngags pas/ /snga dro mal nas langs te/ snying gar yi ge raM yongs su
113b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bltas la de'i 'od zer gyis 'og tu 'chad pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru kul+le mdun du dmigs la/ mchod pa lnga'i sprin phung gis yang dag par mchod de/ de'i mdun du/ dkon mchog
113b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum la bdag skyabs mchi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal pa'i sems can rnams yid kyis dmigs la/ sdug bsngal las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi snying
113b4(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas chos dang gang zag gi ngo bo gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis rang bzhin med par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi stong pa nyid bsgoms la/ de sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya twa dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes
113b5(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /de nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid kyis nam mkhar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bltas la/ de'i dbus su yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar por gyur pa las/ utpal dmar po'i lte bar nyi ma la sa bon de nyid do/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): de las spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas de nyid
113b6(rgyud 'grel): du rab tu bstims te/ de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid ku ru kul+ler blta ste/ pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su ro'i snying gar nyi ma'i dbus su skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas ma/ nyi ma'i 'od skor na/ phyogs dang mtshams
113b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams su dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor pa/ sku mdog dmar mo lo brgyad gnyis lon ma/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes ma/ /dbu la rgyal ba lnga'i rang bzhin gyi thong pa lnga 'dzin pa/ mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal can/ zhal mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'dril ba/ dmar
114a1(rgyud 'grel): la zlum pa'i spyan gsum g.yon du yo ba/ khro ba dang sgeg pa'i nyams can mi'i rus pa'i 'khor lo dang/ rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang/ gdu bu dang/ ska rags dang/ dpung rgyan dang zhabs gdub kyis brgyan ma/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis
114a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis rna ba'i drung du utpa la'i myu gu'i mda' dang bcas pa'i me tog dmar po'i gzhu 'gengs pa/ phyag lhag ma dag gis utpa la dmar po'i zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i spyi bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying gar oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bltas
114a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ da nas rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma la gnas pa'i utpa la dmar po'i lte ba'i nyi ma la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bltas la/ de'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs te/ gsol ba btab pas/ de dag gis rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yis
114a4(rgyud 'grel): gang ba rnams kyis dbang bskur bas/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan te rgyas gdab pa'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las lha mo brgyad spros la/ rang rang gis byang chub kyi sems la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ sa bon de nyid
114a5(rgyud 'grel): la bsdu par bya'o/ /ak+Sha ra man+ta badzra a o/ na u so bindu na tsita/ e so ba ra mahA su kha he o/ na u pho Ti a na u karti/ zhes bya ba 'dis bstod par bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lngar byas la/ yi ge hUM dkar po las
114a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i ljags rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgoms te/ yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ de lta bus bdag nyid ku ru kul+le'i ngo bo mnyes par bya'o/ /bsam gtan dang ma bral bas sngags bzla bar bya ste/ yi ge hI(rgyud 'grel): las bskor nas gnas pa'i
114a7(rgyud 'grel): oM ku ru kul+le h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad kyi sngags kyi phreng ba mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba ltar yid kyis mngon par bsam zhing/ myur ba dang bul ba la sogs pa'i skyon med par tsandan dmar po'i phreng bar bgrang bar bya'o/ /sa ya gcig bzlas pas rigs drug gi
114b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thun gzhan la ni bdag nyid ku ru kul+ler bsams la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ nyan bshad la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgyal gyis bya'o/ /de nas
114b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /'dir yang bla ma brgyud pa las byung ba'i man ngag bri bar bya ste/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'ba' zhig snying las langs te/ mgo'i g.yon nas bskor nas rna ba g.yas pa'i bu ga nas 'thon nas
114b3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas pa'i gzhu'i rgyud la gnas pa'i mda'i ltong gi bu ga nas/ utpa la'i me tog gi lte bar zhugs te/ de'i 'od zer gyis de rgyas par byas shing spros pas srid pa gsum gyi sems can gyi snying gar zhugs nas de'i pad+ma rnams bskul te/ bkug
114b4(rgyud 'grel): nas yang de nyid du gzhug par bya ste/ kha zum nas mnga' nas rna ba'i bu ga nas/ mgo bo'i g.yas su bskor nas dpral ba'i dbus su gnas pa a ba d+hU tI'i lam nas mgrin pa snying ga /lte ba'i mthar bde ba chen po'i gnas su man ngag bzhin du rab tu
114b5(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste/ de nas shes rab dang thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa las byung ba'i bde ba dam pas/ rang gi lus dang 'jig rten gsum gang bar bltas la/ de'i skad cig la tshigs su bcad pa dran par bya'o/ /gang la thog mdza' bar ma med/ /srid dang mya ngan
114b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa med/ /'di ni bde chen mchog gyur pa/ bdag med gzhan yang yod ma yin/ yang de ltar sems can dbang du gyur par bya ste/ de dag phyag rgya chen po la mngon sum nyid du dgod par nus kyi bar du'o/ /de bzhin du bsgrub bya 'am bsgrub bya mo
114b7(rgyud 'grel): ku ru kul+le'i rang bzhin du bsgoms nas/ sa bon de sngar bzhin sgrub pa po'i bzlas/ bsgrub bya'i lag par gnas pa'i me tog de'i 'od zer gyis rgyas par byas la rna ba'i bu ga g.yas par zhugs te/ de ltar song nas der gnas te/ de kho na bzhin du rab tu zhugs
115a1(rgyud 'grel): nas gnas der phyin la de bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /ku ru kul+le'i gzugs la yang yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ni mos par byed pa'i gdugs la bzhag pas bud med 'ju bar 'gyur/ lce la de nyid blo gros bskyed de de snying gi dbus su ni/ /sprul gyis zin pa
115a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni yongs su bsgoms pas chos kyi yi ges dug sbyong 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba gser ldan rnams kyis shes par bya/ de nas gdon mi za bar bsgrub bya bsgrub pa po'i dbang du gyur nas don rnams thams cad byed par
115a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /byas pa'i bsod nams gang yod des/ /skye bo thams cad byang chub la/ /dgod pa'i dbang du 'gyur bar shog /bdag byin gyis brlabs pa ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa
115a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //oM ku ru kul+le h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ nus pa na nyams pas khams gsum dbang du byed par grags/ /sngar gsungs pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ yi ge grangs kyi 'bum bzlas par bya ste me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ byug pa dang/ dri dang/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): phye ma dang/ gos la sogs pa gang la bsngags nas byin de dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /dri bzang po'i bdug spos kyis bdag la bdugs na/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi ming gis me tog dmar po la sogs pas sbyin sreg byas na
115a6(rgyud 'grel): de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bza ba dang btung ba la mngon par bsngags te byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu chen po dbang du byed pa na/ yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg byas nas/ de nas tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po la bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchod pa byas nas gur
115a7(rgyud 'grel): gum dang/ gi waM dang/ ga pur la sogs pas gos sam gro ga la utpa la'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa can gyi 'khor lo rtsi bas bcu drug pa byas te/ 'khor lo'i dbus su sngags dang bcas pa'i bsgrub bya 'am bsgrub bya mo'i ming bri zhing/ 'dab ma rnams la su
115b1(rgyud 'grel): ru kul+le zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhis bskor ba'i bsgrub bya 'ba' zhig gi ming bri bar bya'o/ /phyi rol tu oM yig gis lan gsum bskor ba'i 'khor lo skud pa dmar pos dkris la/ sbra tshil las byas pa'i ling ga'i snying gi dbus su bcug ste seng ldang
115b2(rgyud 'grel): gi mi la gdung bar byas na/ rkang pa 'gugs par byed do/ /skyes pa 'am bud med dbang du byed na/ zangs kyi khab kyis rkang pa gnyis sam/ skye gnas su phug ste gdung bar byas na dbang du 'gyur ba the tshom med do/ /dad pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das
115b3(rgyud 'grel): ma la mchod la/ sngags kyi rgyal po ? te/ de lta bu'i rim pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bla ma'i man ngag rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang/ lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o// //
115b4(rgyud 'grel): !/ /rgya gar skad du/ he badzro db+ha? ba ku ru kul+la sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/ lha mo ku ru kul+le la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags pas dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
115b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsams te/ de'i 'od kyis lha mos thog drangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' du ma mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la/ de dag la yid las byung ba'am dngos su 'byor pa'i mchod pas ci rigs su mchod nas skyabs su
115b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas yan lag bdun pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes la tshad med pa bzhi sems can thams cad la g.yog par bya ste/ de nas swa b+hA ba'i sngags kyis snod bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du rgyas btab ste/ de'i rjes su stong pa nyid kyi ngang las
115b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams pa'i steng du hUM sngon po bsgom par bya'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje/ de yang gyur pa las steng dang 'og dang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur gyis bcing
116a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas rang gi snying gar pad+ma dmar po'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ de'i steng du sa bon gyi yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsgom /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur
116a2(rgyud 'grel): pa las utpa la dmar po blta zhing/ de'i steng du zla ba kha dog dmar po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par bsgom/ de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid lha mo ku ru kul+le sku mdog dmar mer bskyed par bya'o/ /de yang zhal gcig phyag bzhi phyag rgya lnga dang ldan
116a3(rgyud 'grel): ma stag gi pags pa'i smad g.yogs can/ skyil krung phyed pa'i bzhugs stangs kyis gnas pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa can/ gzhu dang mda'autpa la'i zhags pa dang lcags kyu'i
116a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /de ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ste/ oM ku ru kul+le h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes mi grags pa'i tshul du bzlas par bya'o/ /zla ba phyed kyi rgyal po 'du/ /khri yis phal pa dbang du byed/ /bye bas
116a5(rgyud 'grel): phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs/ /lha min 'bum phrag bdun gyis so/ /dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la brten pa'i lha mo ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po lhan skyes sgeg pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dA na shI la nyid
116a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du/ he badzrodb+ha ba ku ru kul+le yA pany+tsa ma ho pa de sha:/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i man nag chen po lnga/ bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying gi dbus las
116a7(rgyud 'grel): srog rlung mchog gis bskul bas rtsa dbus mchog gi nang zhugs gyen song zhing/ /myur du spyi bo'i zla dbus las 'thon rim gyis gsal bar 'gro can mgo yi g.yon bskor te/ g.yas kyi sna bug las mthon myur du lag mda'i bu gar zhugs
116b1(rgyud 'grel): shing phyag rgya cher bsgoms nas/ rdo rje ra ba myur sa bon rgyal po bdag nyid 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba las ni bsgrub bya yi/ /lag mda'i rtse mo'i bu ga rgyas byed sngon du 'gro bas bu gar rab zhugs shing/ /mgo yi g.yas kyi sna bug gsal bar 'gro ba can gyis
116b2(rgyud 'grel): snying gi mtsho skyes dbus gnas pa'i/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sems myur du khyer nas rim bzhin rjes su lam de dang ni de nas 'thon nas ni/ /brtan par snying dbus la gnas khyod kyis sa yi 'khor lo dang bcas lha ni dbang du sdud/ gong bu dgug pa'o// //
116b3(rgyud 'grel): sngar bzhin mda' las mtshon nas bsgrub bya'i mtsho skyes g.yon gyi ngos zhugs shing/ /gyen du song ste spyi bo'i zla ba rim bzhin 'dzag byas sngar bzhin zhugs/ /mtsho skyes ze 'bru la gnas rnal 'byor pas ni brten par bsgoms pa yis/ /chags pas
116b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pa'i las kyis rgyal can ma yi skye bo myos par byed/ /rkang pa dgu pa'o// //sprul gyis bzung ba'i snying ga'i zla dbus gnas pa gsal bar mthong nas de'i/ /'od zer bdud rtsi mang po'i rgyun gyi khrus kyis sbrul gyis dug sel zhing//
116b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bug 'od zer gang ba las kyang dug 'joms 'od ldan zla dbus gnas/ de ltar sbrul gyis bzung ba la ni byams pas lha khyod dug ni 'joms/ /sbrul gyi dug sel ba'o// //mar me brtan pa'i rnam pa can/ /brtan por dmigs pa'i
116b6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis su/ /lce yi rtse mor bsam byas na/ /mi shes rab rib sel bar 'gyur/ /shes rab 'phel ba'o// //gsal bar rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas shing lcags kyus snying la bug /ske la zhags pas bcings shing skra grol gtsang
116b7(rgyud 'grel): pus g.yengs pa can/ /lha mo khyod ni rnal 'byor stobs kyis nor 'dzin bkug nas ni/ /bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing rtag tu khol po'i gnas skabs 'dzin/ /dmar po'i rnam can spros pa'i 'od kyi dra bas rnam par bcings/ /bdag gi rkang drung 'gyel zhing skra
117a1(rgyud 'grel): grol cho gas lag gi mnga' bsnun nas/ g.yon pa'i rlung gis bkug ste bcings shing mtsho skyes nang du bcug /lte ba'i mtsho skyes dbus su zhugs te mos shing thal mo sbyar/ sems dpa' pad+ma las 'dzag khrag gis spyi bor khrus byas
117a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ rnal 'byor pa des bsgoms na lha dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dbang du bsdu ba'o// //kye'i rdo rje las byung ba'i ku ru kul+le'i man ngag chen po lnga slob dpon zhi ba mtshos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dA na shI la nyid
117a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgyur ro// //oM ku ru kul+le h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM ku ru kul+le a mukyA(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di mA k+Sha ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ a mu kiM sA dyAM ArSha ya/ a mu kiM ba shI na ya/ a mu kaM ba sh+yaM ku ru/ a mu ka ba sh+ya ku ru/ ma ma a kriSh+TaM ku ru/
117a4(rgyud 'grel): me a kriSh+TiM ku ru/ At+ma ka ma kriSh+TiM ku ru/ na mo mAM rak+Sha/ na mo me rak+Sha ku ru na ma(rgyud 'grel): na mo me shAM tiM ku ru na ma(rgyud 'grel): bo Sho Ta me puSh+Ti ku ru bau ShaT/ ho de ba dat+ta taM me ba sh+yaM ku ru ho(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): de ba dat+taM me A ka rA ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): de ba dat+taM me Ak+Sha ya
117a5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): me DA ki ma ma DA ki At+ma kaM/ //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra ku ru kul+le sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma ku ru kul+le'i bstod pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs mo che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'gyur mnyam pa'i ngang las
117a6(rgyud 'grel): ma g.yos kyang/ /so sor rtogs pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma/ /dmar ba'i 'od 'phro nyi ma stong gi gzi/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /h+rI las byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' dang gzhu
117a7(rgyud 'grel): yi lag pa ma/ /lcags kyu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa'i me dpung ltar 'bar 'od/ /zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar/ /utpal 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyed krung bcas
117b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /gtum pa'i khro tshul 'gying bag can/ /thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /stag pags bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mche gtsigs dmar mo mi bzad sku/ /drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /brgya phreng phreng ba'i do shal
117b2(rgyud 'grel): can/ bdud 'joms ma la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /A li kA li snyoms 'jug las/ /bde ba rtag dgyes byang chub dang/ /'od dpag med kyi dbu la brgyan/ /gar gyis dgyes la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mda' dang gzhu yis bsdigs par mdzad/ /
117b3(rgyud 'grel): utpal yis dbang du byed/ /lcags kyus nyon mongs 'dam las 'dren/ /bdud dag phyag bzhi la phyag 'tshal/ /'phags ma sgrol ma lha mo ku ru kul+le'i bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru kas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
117b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /oM bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig dang po kho nar sems dpa' i skyil krung bcas la/ bgegs bsal bar bya'o/ /sngags
117b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di yin te/ oM a mri ta hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' i dkyil du dmigs la/ de ma thag tu skyabs su 'gro bar bya ste/ oM ratna tra yaM sma sha ra naM kre hwa/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA swA b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shu
117b6(rgyud 'grel): n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko haM/ de nas yi ge paM las pad+ma/ de'i steng du yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de las yi ge tAM re yongs su gyur pa las utpa la/ de'i rjes la drangs par bya ste/ oM b+ha ga ba ti sa ma ya shwa res rbod damti ta dza(rgyud 'grel): a d+heSh+Ta naM mi
117b7(rgyud 'grel): ku ru swAhA/ de las bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa yang rtsa ba'i zhal ni gnag pa dang ser ba dang dmar pa'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyi dang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'khor lo dkar pos mtshan pa'o/ /gnyis
118a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la mda'/ gsum pa la lcags kyu'o/ /phyag g.yon pa rnams kyi dang po la utpa la dmar po rin po che'i snye ma dang bcas pa'o/ /gnyis pa la bzhu/ gsum pa la zhags pa'o/ /sku mdog dmar po/ pad+ma dmar po'i gdan
118a2(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan tsam/ sku la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ shar gyi phyogs su gsal ba'i sgrol ma/ lho du rdzogs byed sgrol ma/ nub tu snang byed sgrol ma/ byang du kar na sgrol ma/ me'i mtshams su rin
118a3(rgyud 'grel): chen sgrol ma/ bden bral gyi mtshams su rgyal ba sgrol ma/ rlung gi mtshams su dpa' bo'i sgrol ma/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dpa' bo'i sgrol ma'o/ 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi pa mchog sbyin pa dang/ utpa la dang mnga' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o//
118a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar po pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can/ /sku la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de rnams kyi sngags ni/ oM ku ru kul+le hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM pra san+na tA ri hUM h+rIM(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM ne span+na tA ri hUM
118a5(rgyud 'grel): h+rIM swAhA/ oM di pa tA ri hUM h+rIM swAhA/ oM karna tA ri hUM h+riM swAhA/ oM ma ne tA ri hUM h+rIM swAhA/ oM dza ya tA ri hUM h+rI swAhA/ oM gau ri tA ri hUM h+rI swAhA/ oM wa ra tA ri hUM h+ri swAhA/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje ro langs ma/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ zhal rnam
118a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ba/ 'jigs su rung ba'i cha byed can/ phyag bzhi pa la/ mda' dang gzhu dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa pi bang bsnams pa mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can/ lho'i sgor ni rdo rje gri 'dzin ma/ zhal rnam par gtsigs pa/ dbu skra 'khyil pa/
118a7(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'phyang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cod pan can no/ /nub kyi sgo ru gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ sdigs
118b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa/ snang ba mdza' yas kyi dbu rgyan can/ byang gi sgor ni ral pa gcig ma/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ tho ba dang/ rdo rje dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa/ don
118b2(rgyud 'grel): yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum gyis gnas pas bzhugs pa/ sgo ma bzhi po rnams sku mdog dmar ba pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /'di rnams kyi sngags ni/ oM badzra wa ti li hUM phaT/ oM badzra gand+ha ri hUM phaT/ oM
118b3(rgyud 'grel): badzra a pA ri dza ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra i ka dza ta hUM phaT/ oM AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya bo d+hi satwa ya mahA satwA ya/ mahA ka ru Ni ka ya/ tadya thA/ oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti tA re AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra sat+tyaM na swAhA/ gu gul gyi spos la lan
118b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun yongs su bzlas nas spyan drang bar bya'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ tadya thA/ oM so ra so ra ba te he ra he ra swAhA/ arga'i sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ tadya thA/ oM ta ri ta ri ba ti sarba ru Tha sA d+he ne tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ yatka ryO
118b5(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hiM me ku ru swAhA/ me tog gi sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ tadya thA/ me g+ha me g+ha swA ra do ga swA ri ku ru ku ru b+ha ra b+ha ra swAhA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ tadya thA/ oM bok+ka bok+ka Dha ma ne dzwA la dzwA la dI pa
118b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ tadya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra ho ru ho ru gan d+ha ba sa ni swAhA/ dri'i sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ tadya thA/ oM swa b+hA ba di ha di ha ku ru ku ru de shaM ba liM hUM phaT swAhA/ gtor
118b7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sngags so/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ tadya thA/ he re he re ha ra ha ra sarba satwa ka ru Ne shI g+haM A gats+tsha de ba ta b+ha ga bAM AryA ba lo ki te shwa ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra na swAhA/ me tog gi thal mo sbyar la gtor mar gzhug par bya'o/ /gshegs su
119a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba'i sngags ni/ oM pra san+ne ne span pra ti pa kar+Na pa ne dza ya gu re sa wi re tar we ta le gand+ha re sa badzra ha sta/ a pa ra dze ta i ka dza TaM na ma me(rgyud 'grel): oM ta ra ta ra Ne hUM ha ra ha ra swAhA/ khyu mchog gi ra'i 'jim pa la lag
119a2(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pa nyid kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas/ btab na dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// //bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta bimpa dang/ lo tsa
119a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba/ /rgya gar skad du/ ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ myur mdzad ma'i sgrub thabs/ lha mo ku ru kul+le la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig bsgom par bya ba'i gnas phyogs dben zhing sems
119a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' bar dri rnam pa lngas byugs te/ stan 'jam zhing rgya che ba la brtul zhugs can gyis mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas snying gar yi ge raM las yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa rnam
119a5(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom ste/ de'i lte ba la yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po rnam par bsam mo/ /yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od zer gyi dra ba byung bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sems can gyi khams la phog ste/ dpal ku ru kul+le'i gzugs su mngon par byas nas/ 'od
119a6(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang yang de nyid du zhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la lha mo ku ru kul+le ma lo bcu drug pa lta bu 'bar ba'i dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ thod pa lngas dbu la brgyan pa/ ro'i steng du skyil mo
119a7(rgyud 'grel): krung phyed mar gar gyi stabs su bzhugs pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing lce lcib par mdzad pa/ 'khor lo dang/ snyan cha dang/ mgul chu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ phyag gdub dang/ ska rags dang/ zhabs gdub kyis brgyan pa/ stag
119b1(rgyud 'grel): gi sham thabs can spyan dmar po g.yo zhing 'dril ba/ mdza' yas mgon gyis dbu la brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi la gnyis kyis utpal dmar po kham bye ba'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' dang/ me tog dmar po'i gzhu'i mnga' gzhu 'gengs pa/ lhag ma'i phyag
119b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na me tog dmar po'i lcags kyu dang utpal bsnams pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ku ru kul+le mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i mchod pa'i me tog dang/
119b3(rgyud 'grel): bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang/ lha bshos rnam pa lngas mchod par bya'o/ /'di ni mchod pa'o/ /mchod pa byas nas dam pa'i snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ lus ngag yid gsum gyis gus pas btud de phyag bya'o/ /'di ni phyag btsal
119b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /phyag btsal nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ sdig pa gang bgyis bgyid du stsal pa dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yid rang ba la sogs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sngar mngon sum du bshags par bgyi'o/ /'di ni sdig pa bshags
119b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /brtul zhugs can gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams gang lags pa de dag la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo/ /de ni bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /de nas
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la gang du 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe bdag skyobs su mchi bar bgyi'o/ /'di ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro
119b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste/ gang dag srid pa'i 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems can rnams drang bar bya ba de'i phyir/ bdag gi gtso bo thugs rdo rje bya'o/ zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
120a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar gdung bar sems pa gang yin pa'i sems su bsgom pa 'di ni btang snyoms bsgom pa'o/ /de nas de rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs shing
120a2(rgyud 'grel): lus dang bral bar byed pa 'di ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa'o/ /de nas sems tsam du ni byin gyis brlab pa'i gsang sngags oM shU n+ya tA dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba 'dis sems byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam
120a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi stobs kyis sems can gyi don la blo yis gzigs nas sngags pa lha'i skur bskyed de/ gsang sngags sbas pa'i rim pa 'di ni lha'i sku zhes bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i ngos su yi ge raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dra ba'i phreng
120a4(rgyud 'grel): bas 'khrigs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni nyi ma shar ba'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge hUM kha dog nag po yongs su gyur pa las/ sna tshogs rdo rje las rdo rje ra ba dang/ rdo rje gur dang/ rdo rje bcing ba dang/ sa gzhi rdo rje'i rnam par
120a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o/ /'di ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi ye shes yi ge e lta bu kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po las byung ba'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad pa/ /
120a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i snying po'i steng du yi ge raM las yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma dang ro'o/ /gzhan yang de dag gi steng du mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i zla ba nya gang zhing yongs su rdzogs pa dkar po'o/ /de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dpe byad bzang po brgyad
120a7(rgyud 'grel): cu'i ngo bo kha dog dmar po'o/ /de dag gi bar du yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i utpa la dmar po kha ma 'bus pa'i nang du rang gi sems nyid zhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba dang dbyangs dang nyi ma rnams gcig tu zhu ba'i
120b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid las sngon tu brjod pa lta bu'i lha mo ku ru kul+le'i bsgom par bya'o/ /rnam par bsgoms nas snying gar yi ge raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i lte bar h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yang bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i 'od zer rnams kyis mgon po mdza' yas bkug ste/
120b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs nas mchod pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab po/ /gsol ba gdab pa ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA a mri ta nA tha zhes bya ba des mdza' yas kyi sa bon gyis bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i bum pa
120b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka nas 'phro bas bsgoms te/ de nas bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing blugs pas bdag gi snying gar bum pa rnams zhugs te/ zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i spyi bor mdza' yas bsgom mo/ /dus gsum du 'di bsgom zhing lha
120b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni oM ku ru kul+le h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ lhag par yang tsanda dmar po'i phreng bas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /kha zas rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga'i bdud rtsis nan tan gyis sbyang ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM de nyid gsum pa
120b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dis kha zas dang zhal byin gyis brlabs na 'dis zhal gyis gsang sngags 'grub po/ /de nas sngags pas skyes pa 'am bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ /yar gyi ngo'i tshas gcig las brtsams te bzlos brjod khri bya ste/ dus gsum du bcom ldan
120b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma'i skur dmigs te/ smad dkris ras dmar po dang/ lus la ras dmar po gyon nas rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rtsa ba 'dam nas skyes pa
120b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o/ /'dab ma de rnams la dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po brgyad las yongs su gyur pa'i lung ba brgyad khro zhing rgyas ba dga' zhing chags par rim pa bzhin bsams nas dbugs kyis bskyod de/ sna bug nas byung nas bsgrub bya'i sna bug g.yas par zhugs
121a1(rgyud 'grel): nas sgra sgrogs shing gar byas te gdungs shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma la yang dbyangs yig dang po brgyad kha dog cung zad dmar ba dang ldan par rnam par blta bar bya'o/ /de ltar bltas nas de nas rnal 'byor pas utpa la kha ma
121a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bus pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' lta stangs dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdzogs par bkang ste/ pad+ma'i ze ba la brdeg go /des bung ba de rnams rang gi dam tshig gis bskul nas/ dbyangs yig re re khyer te sna bug g.yon pa nas byung nas rnal
121a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i sna bug g.yas par zhugs te/ snying gar rang dang gzhan gyi rnam par shes pa gcig tu gyur par bya'o/ /de nas utpa la'i rtsa ba yis mgrin pa nas bcings te/ lcags kyu yis mngal nas bzung nas drangs pas mi bzod par bsams te/
121a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bas dbang du bsdu zhing rlung gi 'khor lo la bzhag ste/ rnal 'byor pa dga' ba'i sems kyis gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya zhing 'di ltar rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /gsang sngags ni oM ku ru kul+le h+rI(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo me ba sa mA na ya swAhA/
121a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar zla ba nya ba'i bar du mtshan mo kun tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas nang par de 'ong bar 'gyur te/ chags pa dang bcas shing gcer bu skra bshig par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul bas shin tu rgyas pa'i
121a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /oDyaN gyi yul nas byung ba'i lha mo ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po yul ma ga d+har skyes pa dpal byang chub chen por rab tu byung ba'i gnas brtan
121a7(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba ro za ma chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tra yotshhAt+ma ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ myur mdzad ma'i sgrub thabs bcu gsum pa'i bdag nyid
121b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo ku ru kul+le la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ku ru kul+le'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ re zhig dang por sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /bri sku'i cho ga rab tu bstan par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa twa ra na bzhis pa rgyan pa/
121b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i dbus su ku ru kul+le bri bar bya ste/ sku mdog dmar po phyag brgyad pa/ dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis khams rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa/ g.yas kyi phyag na lcags kyu dang/ mda''gengs pa dang/ mchog sbyin mdzad pa dang/ g.yon
121b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag na zhags pa dang/ gzhu dang/ utpa la bsnams pa bri/ shar du zhu ba'i sgrol ma bri/ lhor grub pa'i sgrol ma bri/ byang du snyan sgrol ma bri/ me'i phyogs su gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrol ma/ srin bu'i phyogs su rab tu snang ba'i sgrol ma/
121b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i sgrol ma/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su skul byed ma bri'o/ /lha mo 'di rnams kyi sku mdog dmar po/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngas dbu brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag mchog sbyin pa dang
121b5(rgyud 'grel): mda''gengs pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na utpa la dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje ro langs ma gsus khyim che ba 'jigs pa'i zhal lce 'jib pa/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na sdigs mdzub dang lcags kyu/ g.yon na rdo rje
121b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dang thod pa bsnams pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bar bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje phag mo gsus khyim che ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa 'jigs pa'i zhal lce 'jib pa/ sku mdog dmar po/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na
121b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang lcags kyu/ g.yon dril bu dang zhags pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ral gcig ma sgra thor tshugs su bcings pa/ gsus khyim che ba/ ma mchu tshems kyis mnan/ /snang ba mdza' yas kyis dbu brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas
122a1(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje dang lcags kyu/ g.yon na rdo rje dang dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang ba bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje dbyangs len ma/ don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa/ zhal 'jigs pa gsus khyim che ba/
122a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na ral gri dang lcags kyu/ g.yon na rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i bdag nyid sku bri bar bya'o/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /'di rnams bsgom pa'i rim pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i
122a3(rgyud 'grel): sku de bzhin du rab tu bstan te/ de la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po las yongs su grub par gyur pa'o/ /kha dog dmar po mos par gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung du 'dug par dmigs par bya ste/ bdag gi 'od zer rnams
122a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'jig rten gsum gang bar bya ste/ yi ge yaM sngon po las yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa de'i steng du bsgrub bya bzhag na dbang du byed do/ /'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /
122a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar gyur pa ni/ lag mthil gnyis rgyab sbyar te/ srin lag gnyis mdud pa bcings/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo dang mthe bong rtse sprad/ mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa 'di dpral ba'i gnas
122a6(rgyud 'grel): su bzhag pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /'di ltar bsgom pa'i dus su gsang sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM ku ru kul+le hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ khrir bzlas brjod byas na 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /khrag khrig gis
122a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa'o/ /'bum gyis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /me tog utpa la dang shing arka'i sa sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i don 'thob po/ be ta'i me sbar la/ ma du ba dang 'bras kyi lag pan gyis lan brgya stong du sbyin sreg byas na/ rgyal po'i blon
122b1(rgyud 'grel): po yang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /utpa la stong gis blon po chen po yang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rtsi mar gyi mar me stong lha mo la phul bas rgyal po yang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lha mo ku ru kul+le bdag nyid bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das ku ru kul+le
122b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo chen mo ku ru kul+le/ mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma/ 'dod don thams cad bsgrub pa la/ /yang dag gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes 'dod pa'i bla ma yis/ /slob ma'i bsod nams don du ni/ /de yi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus
122b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rgyud kyi rim bzhin bdag gis bshad/ /dang po kho nar rnal 'byor pas lha'i khang par nye bar 'dug ste/ sa gzhi kun tu dri bzang po'i maN+Dal byas la/ mdun du bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ lha mo'i sku bsams la/
122b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog dmar po dang/ mar me la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /sdig byas thams cad bdag gis bshags/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro bya/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /
122b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su bsngo/ /dang po byams pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /de bzhin gnyis pa snying rje bsgom/ /gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /thams cad rjes la btang snyoms so/ /de rjes sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nya na
122b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang bzhin stong par rnam par bsgom/ /sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran/ /shes rab e yi gzugs can ma/ /nam mkha' khams su bsam par bya/ /pad+ma dmar po 'dab brgyad bzang/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsgom/ /nyi ma'i
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /de steng yongs su sgom pa ni/ /mchog gi sa bon yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer dmar/ /phyag bzhis rnam par brgyan pa'i sku/ /g.yas na mnga' dang lcags kyu bsnams
123a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin g.yon na utpal gzhu/ /lha mo thod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /de yi gzugs kyi bdag nyid ni/ /yang dag rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma/ /gar
123a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhan yid kyis rnam par bsam/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa lA sya sogs/ /yongs su bskor ba dbus ma la/ /arg+ha la sogs sbyin pa dang/ /sna tshogs mchod pa cho gas bya/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs thams cad du yongs su dgang/
123a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rang gi gzugs su bya/ /de bzhin rang la gzhug par bya/ /de nas sngags kyis bzlas par bya/ /phreng ba rang gi kha dog can/ /phyi dang de bzhin rang bdag nang/ /spro dang bsdu ba bsgom par bya/ /oM ku ru kul+le sarba satwA na me wa sa mA na
123a4(rgyud 'grel): ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ 'di nyid bsgom pa byas pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du 'gyur/ /'bum gyis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/ /khri yis 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur/ /bya dang phyugs ni bye bas so/ /bdun 'bum gyis ni lha ma yin/ /
123a5(rgyud 'grel): nyis 'bum gyis ni lha rnams so/ /brgya yis blon po dbang du 'gyur/ 'di ltar rig pa chen po'i 'dzab/ /nyin mtshan spyod lam thams cad bya/ /me tog la sogs bye brag gis/ /rang nyid yang dag mchod par bya/ /byang chub yongs su
123a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngo bar bya/ /bdag nyid de yi nga rgyal bya/ /rang las ji ltar bde bar spyad/ /ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rdo rje brtse ba mkhas pa yis/ /sems can don ni bsgrub pa dang/ /rdo rje mtshan gyis zhus phyir byas/ /de ltar byas pa'i bsod
123a7(rgyud 'grel): nams kyis/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten kun/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma/ /yang dag bde ba thob par shog /ku ru kul+le'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po kriSh+Na badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //
123b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur/ //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ DA kyi nI badzra pany+tsar pany+tsa DA ka sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems
123b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba gang zhig shing chen po yi yal ga'i tshogs dang mtshungs pa 'di rnams ni/ /zhe sdang gtso bo'i nyon mongs rnams te 'gro drug rnams kyi skye las rgyal/ /gang de thub dka' i brtson 'grus la gnas rnam pa
123b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi sku 'chang ba/ /dus dgra rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'dud/ /'gro ba ma lus pa yi 'dod pa mi gcod cing/ /byang chub la ni nges par 'jug pa lnga'i/ /'khor lo rnams ni drang bar ldan pa bri/ /de dag kyang ni bsod nams ldan
123b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyur/ /chu dang 'bras bu rnyed sla ba dang phug rnams dang/ /gang yang rung par 'jam pa'i stan gnas te/ /sngags par gzhan gyi dbang du rgyal ba bsgom/ /blo yi bsam bya bsam par bya ba ni/ /hUM oM tram ya khaM 'di dag ni/ /snying gar ji lta'i
123b5(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bsam/ /bla ma rdo rje mchod pa dang/ /bdun po rnam par dag par bya/ /sdig pa bshags par bya ba dang/ /yang na byed par sdom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang sems 'phags pa yi/ /bsod nams dag la rje yi rang/ /de dag yongs su bsngo bar
123b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la yang dag brten/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /lam la brten te de nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnams bsgoms nas/ /sna tshogs stong par bsgom par bya/ /dngos po bden brdzun rnams dpyad pas/
123b7(rgyud 'grel): brtags pas dmigs su med pa ste/ /des ni 'di ltar gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /dngos po thams cad bsgom par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ mdun du re pa las ni nyi ma rnam par bsgom/ /nyi ma der ni hUM 'byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/
124a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje de nyid kyi ni ra pa dang gur bcing ba yang ngo/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /der ni hUM yig las byung ba/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba/ /
124a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs/ /hUM yig bcu yi sbyor ba las/ /khro bo bcu ni rim bzhin dgod/ /shar du gshin rje gshed po bsam/ /shes rab mthar byed yang ni lhor/ /pad+ma mthar byed chu bdag ste/ /byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o//
124a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan du'o/ /me nyid tu ni dbyug sngon can/ /bden bral du ni mi g.yo bsam/ /rlung nyid du yang stobs po che/ /gtsug tor steng du bsam par bya/ /'og tu gnod mdzes rnam par bsgom/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag
124a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ /rdo rje khro bo drag chen po/ /snying gar khu tshur sdigs mdzub ste/ /g.yas pa rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i tho ba ste/ /dbyug pa rdo rje gzhan mi thub/ /rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma dmar/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rdo rje'o//
124a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbyug pa sngon po rang ming can/ /stobs rgyal gyi ni tri shU la/ /mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur rgyal gyi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /gtun shing rdo rje sa 'og gi'o/ /g.yon
124a6(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba yi zhabs kyi gnas/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i mdog /gshin rje gshed po bsgom par bya/ /gzhan gyi mi thub ces bya ba/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dmar chen po/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nag po ste/ /mtshams
124a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi khro bo nag po che/ /spyi bor rdo rje 'chang pa 'dzin/ /gshin rje rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbyug pa la'o/ /pad+ma zhes bya 'jig rten spyan/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sems dpa' o/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo dbus gnas su/ /bdud las
124b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba bsam par bya/ /'og tu pad+ma bsam byas la/ /khro bo bcu ni bsgom par bya/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni 'jug pa yis/ bgegs rnams skrod par bsam par bya/ nam mkha' i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi
124b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /me yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis chu bsam bya/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /de yi steng du bsam par bya/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du
124b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdag nyid bsam par bya ba yi/ /bum yi ge sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga/ /gnas lnga ru ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje can dang rtag pa nyid/ /gsum pa rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /bzhi pa 'dod chags rdo rje yi/ /lnga pa rta mchog rgyal po'o/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
124b4(rgyud 'grel): zlum po ste/ /rdo rje can gyi zla phyed 'dra/ chos kyi rdo rje pad+ma mtshungs/ /nyi ma yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs/ /rta mchog dpal ni zhes bya ste/ /gru gsum kun tu de yi'o/ /rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste/ /khru bzhi sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ro/ /snang byed? kyi yang
124b5(rgyud 'grel): khru lnga'o/ /pad+ma gar dbang gi ni drug /rta mchog rgyal po dkyil 'khor ni/ /khru bdun pa yi tshad yin no/ /cha ni brgyad pa nyid kyis ni/ /'khor lo'i sgo ru rab tu grags/ /khyud dang lha yi snam bu ni/ /sgo yi tshad du gzhal bar bya/ /sgo yi phyed kyi cha
124b6(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /legs dang 'gram ni nyid yin no/ /mchod rnam nyid kyang de bzhin bya/ /dra ba dra phyed snam bu yang/ /tshangs pa'i skud las cha gnyis por/ /cha drug par ni bya ba'o/ /sgo yi tshad tsam de bzhin dor/ /cha dgu ru ni rab brtags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
124b7(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /shar gyi shar ni rab tu bstan/ /lhor ni sangs rgyas nyi ma yi/ /nub tu rdo rje 'dod chags so/ /byang du rta yi rgyal po'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbus su'o/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lho ru gser dang 'dra ba'o/ /nub tu 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar por shes par bya/ /de yi byang du ljang gu'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad kyi ni grwa yi char/ /sgo dang sgo khyung grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa'o/ /dbus su pad+ma
125a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar te/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gdan/ /rang gi sa bon legs bltas la/ /'khor lo'i rnam par bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan ni/ /A li gzugs der de gzhug go /lha mo
125a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi yan lag ni/ /gru gsum du ni zla ba blta/ /skar ma'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /ka la sogs pa rab tu gzhug /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang/ /byang chub zla ba gnyis pa'o/ /hUM byung rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /'od zer
125a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i phreng ba'o/ /de ltar so sor nges pa ni/ /phyag mtshan lnga la lnga rab dbye/ /rdo rje sems la mi byed pa/ /rnam snang la ni chos 'khor lo/ /rin chen rgyal po'i rin chen te/ /pad+ma bzang po'i pad+ma dmar/ /don grub shes rab ral gri ni//
125a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin no/ /sems dpa' i gzugs su yang dag 'byung/ /dkyil 'khor bdag por rnam bsgom bya/ /mkha' 'gro can gyi phyag rgya sogs/ /zla ba'i 'od zer nor bu'i 'od/ /mA ma kI sogs yang dag 'khyud/ /
125a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus nyid do/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul ming can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /rang gi lus la zhugs pa dang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gtso bo'i/ /srog dang rtsol dang mnyam zhes dang/ /'byung
125a7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jug pa'i ming can dang/ /klu dang rus sbal kri lag can/ /lhas sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo so sor zhu/ /sa bon brgyad ni bsam par bya/ /ming gi dang po g+haM tsaM sogs/ /yi ge las ni lha yo 'byung/ /rdo rje
125b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /za phod spos mo de bzhin du/ /ri khrod gtum mo g.yung mo'o/ /rdo rje rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /skam pa zhags pa ma nyid dang/ /de zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /me tog la sogs
125b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi char/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /nyi lag ma dang mar ma ma/ /rin chen sgrol ma glog lag ma/ /sgeg mo la sogs mtshams char ro/ /pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang/ /'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /gling bu ma sogs phyogs
125b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi char/ /bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lde mig ma/ /sge glags ma dang gos 'dzin ma/ /de bzhin mtshams su spyan sogs so/ /bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /sgo skyong sgo ru dgod pa ste//
125b4(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'bebs pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag kun/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas/ /snying gar g.yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste/ /zla ba nyi ma ro steng du/ /mi bskyod dkyil 'khor phyogs su ni/ /
125b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo lcags kyu sdigs mdzub ste/ /chom rkun rdo rje zhags pa bcas/ /ro langs rdo rje lcags sgrog go /za phod rdo rje dril bu can/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang/ /sangs rgyas dbang gyur gzhan du ni/ /gcig las rim pa bzlog pa'o/ /puk+ka sI sogs
125b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams/ /mtshan ma dang ni mdog bshad bya/ /byang sems bum pa ri rab dang/ /me thabs rgyal mtshan chen po'o/ /nag po dkar po nam mkha' mtshungs/ /khro bo mi bskyod dkyil 'khor du'o/ /me tog dkar po yin te spos/ /du ba mar me ser po'i
125b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od/ /byug pa dmar po lA sye dag /glu ma ser mo gar ma ljang/ /bzhad ma dmar mo gling bu ni/ /ser po pi wang dkar dmar ro/ /rnga 'dzin ljang khu rdza rnga ni/ /dkar mo rang gi phyag mtshan sbyor/ /ho yig dmar po 'od zer bcas/ /gnyis kyi dbus su yi ge
126a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /dri yang na ni mnyam par zhugs/ /zhu bar gyur pas rjes su dran/ /mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyis yang/ /gtso bo la ni glu 'dis bskul/ /khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong thugs dag cing/ /shin tu rnam par dag
126a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos kyis lha'i lus yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs la stong pa nyid spongs shig /khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs skyong sku dag cing/ /gzugs brnyan chos kyi lha'i lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ ri khrod  
126a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ni bdag la mgon pos myur gzigs stong nyid spongs/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten don phyir skye ba gzigs par mdzod/ /khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong gsung dag cing/ /mchog tu so sor rtogs pas lha yi lus ni yang dag
126a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan mdzad pa/ /gtum mo bdag la myur du gzigs nas stong pa nyid spongs la/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten don phyir skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong gzugs sku ba/ /bya ba grub pas thams
126a5(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam pas bdag nyid brgyan mdzad pa/ /g.yung mo bdag la myur du gzigs la stong pa nyid spongs shig /rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten don phyir skye ba bzhes pas mdzod/ /sbos mo sogs kyi gnas 'dug pa'i/ /me tog la sogs
126a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gis glus/ /mtshams kyi lha mo rnams kyis bskul/ /de ltar gtso mo gzhan dag la'ang/ /bskul te sad pas sngon gyi ni/ /smon lam dran pa'i stobs kyis te/ /hUM maM dag las langs par bsam/ /thugs kyi mkha' 'gro stobs chen
126a7(rgyud 'grel): po/ zhal brgyad zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/ /dbang sngon lta bu'i 'jigs pa dang/ /sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs dag ste/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal
126b1(rgyud 'grel): ni nag po ste/ /gnyis ni dkar dang dmar ba'o/ /spyi bo'i dbu ma gtsigs pa ste/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /bdud bzhi po ni mnyam par mnan/ /spyi bor rdo rje nag po 'dzin/ /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang de bzhin seng byi la/ /g.yas
126b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la/ /gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /nyi ma zla ba nyid dang ni/ /mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la'o/ /gri gug thod pa phyag 'dzin pa'i/ /mA ma
126b3(rgyud 'grel): kI dang gnyis med sbyor/ /oM laM dag las lhag par dkar/ /zhal gnyis gnag dang dmar ba'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis mgul nas 'khyud/ /zhabs bzhi la sogs thun mongs pa/ zhal brgyad la sogs
126b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bstan to/ /khyad par spyi gtsug 'khor lo sogs/ /phyag mtshan dag kyang brjod pa'o/ /spyi bor chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin/ /'jigs su rung zhing 'jigs par mdzod/ /rma bya ma he chu srin dang/ /nya yi rgyal po ru spal dang/ /lhag pa'i klu dang ngang pa dang//
126b5(rgyud 'grel): ri bong lhag pa'i g.yas rnams la'o/ /rtsangs pa thu bo sprin shugs dang/ /mig sman 'dra dang byi ba dang/ /g.yag dang dri ldan sa ra sa/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad la'o/ /tri ti dag la rin rgyal ming/ /sku mdog ser po bsgom par bya/ /g.yas dang
126b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi zhal nag po/ /dmar po spyi bor rin chen 'dzin/ /ka ratna dang 'khor lo dag /ne tso dang ni tsa go ra/ /bye'u khra hor mo 'ol pa dang/ /ri skegs rin chen g.yas dag na'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang/ /rigs ldan pad+ma pad+ma che/ /'jigs
126b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni nor rgyas dang/ /mdza' yas g.yon pa dag na'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser bsregs bzhin/ /sgrol ma yis ni mgul nas 'khyud/ /aM paM dag las bzhengs shing dmar/ /rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /
127a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa zla 'od dri ma med/ /spyi bor pad+ma dmar po 'dzin/ /gos dkar mo dang gnyis med sbyor/ /dom dang bya rgod de bzhin pas/ /ba men dang ni stag nyid dang/ /spre'u dang chu srin lce spyang dag /rdo rje chos kyi g.yas dag
127a2(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /bya rog 'ug pa chu skyar ser/ /sa ra sa dang de bzhin ra/ /ri dags phag pa thod pa rnams/ /g.yon pa dag tu rtag tu gnas/ /taM khaM dag las bzhengs shing/ /rta rgyal rta gdong dran par bya/ /spyi bor ral gri dkar po 'chang//
127a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma yis ni mgul nas 'khyung/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /g.yon pa'i zla 'od dri ma med/ /gza' lhag phur bu mjug rings dang/ /sgra gcan mig dmar nyi ma dang/ /spen pa zla ba thod rnams su/ /rta yi rgyal po g.yas
127a4(rgyud 'grel): dag tu'o/ /dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag /'dod lha dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /gcer bu dang ni thag bzangs ris/ /stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o/ /lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis brjod/ /gri gug thod pa nyid yin no/ /rdo rje nyid kyi thams
127a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi/ /snying gar ye shes gnas dgod bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub bya/ /rang sngags yi ge mtshan ma dang/ /phyag rgyar btags pa las byung ba/ /dam tshig snying gar ye shes te/ /
127a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i sbyor bar rab btags pa'o/ /oM d+harmmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /ye shes 'khor lo rang dkyil la/ /lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug cing/ /gzhug pa dang ni bcing ba dang/ /mnyes pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /spyan la gti
127a7(rgyud 'grel): mug rdo rje dgod/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba gnyis/ /sna la ser sna rdo rje dang/ /dag la 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin lus/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs
127b1(rgyud 'grel): can btsun mo rnams/ /phyag gnyis gri gug mgo bo ste/ /srog song steng du yang dag gnas/ /mkha' spyod dang ni sa spyod gnyis/ /de bzhin zhabs 'og gnas pa mo/ /thugs dang gsung dang sku dag la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ger dran/ oM kha tsa ri badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de bzhin
127b2(rgyud 'grel): du du ? ? d+hA ba? At+ma ko haM/ de bzhin du pA tA la ba si ti swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /gsum dang rdo rje ma sogs lnga/ /rig ma brgyad po de rnams kyis/ /mkha' 'gro dbang bskur rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dam tshig
127b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis gang ba yin/ /bum pas rig ma brgyad pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro lnga la dbang bskur te/ /bzhi pa spyi bor 'khor lo dang/ /rin chen pad+ma ral gri 'dzin/ /thugs kyi mkha' 'gro'i spyi bor ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni 'dzin par bsgom/ /de rnams kyi 
127b4(rgyud 'grel): ni dkyil 'khor pa/ /rdo rje'i rjes rims dkyil 'khor kun/ /thugs dang rtag pa rin chen dang/ /dpag med lha mo'i spyi bor 'dzin/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ g.yo shing 'bar bas thod pa ru/ /lcags kyu lnga yis sa bon
127b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga las byung/ /lce la rdo rje nas 'bras tsam/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi myang ba'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a mri ta satwa badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /ye shes las ni mchod sna tshogs/ /brgyad po nges par phyung ba yi/ /lha mos 'khor lo la ni mchod/ /'khor lo'i
127b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gtso bo la'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pA dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams yongs su bskor/ /khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyis mchog ni yongs brnyes te/ /khyod kyis rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun sgrub cing/ /snying rje'i thugs kyis
127b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can sad par mdzad/ /sgyu ma'i spros pas dgos pa bsgrub pa bo/ /he ru ka dpal thugs ni dgyes pa skye/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta stu te badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gzhal yas sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /dbang ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/ /
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi myang ba snang mdza' yas/ /bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan dpal/ /mchod pa don yod grub par brjod/ /rjes su chags pa rdo rje sems/ /yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pa/ /dang byin brlab pa rab tu grub/ /grub pa'i sngon du mtshan
128a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams/ /rim pa mngon du mtshon par bya/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra bar snang/ /gnyis pa du ba lta bu ste/ /gsum pa me khyer rnam pa la/ /bzhi pa mar me gsal ba'o/ /lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa
128a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rmi lam rnam pa skad cig yin/ /snying ga'i nang mos zla ba ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs la mi shigs pa/ /sna tshogs 'od zer gyis ni bskor/ /de las rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rjes bdag med mkha' 'gro ma/ /bsgoms te cho ga yis ni bskul/ /mkha' 
128a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma yi sna yi mthar/ /yungs kar rnam par bsgom par ni/ /'gro ba thams cad yungs kar la/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /de ltar yid kyis bsgom byed pa'o/ /rang byin brlab par rab grub pa'o/ /ru pak+Sha dung bse ru dang/ /bo de tsa dang
128a5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'bras bu/ /mu tig sogs dang byi ru la/ /bsam gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas bya/ /oM d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra ya d+hA ra ya/ mar d+ha mar d+ha/ badzra d+h+ri ka phaT swA hA/ oM sA swa ta/ e hi e hi dzi na dzi ka phaT swAhA/ oM badzra sAurya ta mo bi ta ma na sa ma ya
128a6(rgyud 'grel): stwoM a haM/ ratna d+hIk+ka phaT swAhA/ oM badzra d+harmA sa ma ya stwoM hu lu hu lu A ro li ka phaT swAhA/ oM pu phu phu hi hi pradz+nyA d+hi ka phaT swAhA/ gang tshe rnal 'byor bsam gtan du ba/ /de tshe dag pa rjes su dran/ /snying rje yis ni spyan dag dmar/ /spyan gyi rnams
128a7(rgyud 'grel): dag rdo rje gsum/ /zhal rnams rnam thar brgyad po yin/ /phyag ni stong pa bcu drug go /bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi pos ni/ /zhabs ni bzhi po brjod pa'o/ /phyag rgya yis ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba'o/ /bden pa rnam pa
128b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pos ni/ /dus? pa ru yi yongs byung ba'o/ /gzugs phung rdo rje ma ru gyur/ /tshor bar gsang ba'i gau rim/ /'du shes de bzhin chu ma ste/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /rnam shes nyid ni bdag med ma/ /phung po don dam par ni med/ /skye mched drug tu 'gyur
128b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje ma/ /chu ma ro yi rdo rje yin/ /phrag dog rdo rje gti mug ma/ /rdo rje rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i gau ra ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /sa ni phuk+ka sI ru brjod/ /chu khams ri khrod ma ru'o/ /me ni gtu mor shes
128b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /gzugs ni dkar mor rtag tu bshad/ /sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la g+hasma rI yi gzugs/ /reg la sa spyod ma ru brjod/ /chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma'o/ /glo dang dbugs
128b4(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin smyo/ /khod skran mdzi dang rkang shu dang/ /mchin pa mcher pa'i rang bzhin kyang/ /glang po la sogs rab tu grags/ /rdzi ma'i byi dang so nad dang/ /mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung/ /bad kan 'dzag dang lus spas dang/ /skya sbas 'bras ni rma bya sogs
128b5(rgyud 'grel): rkang spang chil nang rIg skrangs dang/ /rgyu ma 'phel dang lhog pa dang/ /'khru dang rims dang rab 'gas dang/ /ka randa sogs rab tu grags/ /brjed byed dang ni pho mtshan lcags/ /chu bsri ba dang rngo chu can/ /gshang nad skran dang sgro nang dang/ /mig
128b6(rgyud 'grel): ser dom la sogs pa'o/ /rlung dang mkhris pa ma zhu ba/ /skya rims rab rib mchil mas gang/ /gzhog phyed na dang lkog 'bras dang/ /rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o/ /lhag ma rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs/ /bsdus pas du ni bsam par bya/ /
128b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod don grub par byed dang bgegs/ /zhi bar byed dang dge bar do/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas yang dag dgug /lha sogs phyir na gtor ma bya/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya/ /dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam/ /mthar
129a1(rgyud 'grel): byed lho ru dgong pa'o/ /chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la/ /byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya/ /med ni byin za chen po nyid/ /bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhin no/ /rlung du gnas med bsam par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso/ /zla nyi tshangs
129a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lha tshogs dang/ /tshangs pa yis ni rig pa mchog /tshangs pa mdun na 'don nyid dang/ /dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang/ /rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas nyid dang/ /gang zhig 'phrul dga' i lha rnams dang/ /
129a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i gnas su gang gnas dang/ /bde ba can du yang dag gnas/ /'og min gnas su gnas pa dang/ /'od zer can gyi 'jig rten dang/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa rnams/ /de kun steng du bsam pa ste/ /chos 'byung gi ni nang song ba'o/ /stobs
129a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang/ /de bzhin mdza' yas nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang/ /pad+ma pad+ma bzang po rnams/ /lha min dmyal ba thams cad de/ /chos 'byung gi ni 'og tu'o/ /oM las tshangs pa la sogs lha/ /hUM yig las ni ma chags
129a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /a las stobs kyi rgyu la sogs/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis rnams so/ /steng gi lha rnams dkar po che/ /dbang po la sogs nag po mtshungs/ /stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che/ /ngang mtshungs rig mas lus dbang? ldan/ /lag gnyis
129a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bur 'brel/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi stan la gnas/ /tshangs sogs rtag pa'i phyag rgyas gdab/ /mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis/ /stobs kyi rgyu sogs gang dbang ste/ /kun kyang rigs gsum las skyes so/ /dkar mo yis ni dgug pa nyid/ /
129a7(rgyud 'grel): chom rkun ma yi zhags pas gzhug /ro langs mas ni lcags sgrog 'ching/ /za phod dril bus dbang du byed/ /de nas mchod yon zhal bsil sbyin/ sngags 'di yis ni dbul bar bya/ /oM A:hUM/ phyi nas 'thor 'thung sbyin pa ste/ /sngags 'dis gshegs
129b1(rgyud 'grel): lha? gsol bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ h+ri da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hiM me pra ya tsa/ sarbba karma su tsa me tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga ban sarba ta thA
129b2(rgyud 'grel): ga ta mA me muny+dza badzri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): mu(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu gnyis kyis lha rnams tshogs dag dang/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi gtso bo mkha' 'gro lnga/ /byas pa'i bsod nams thob pas dge ba rnams/ nges ni 'gro rnams mkha' 'gro lngar byed shog /
129b3(rgyud 'grel): mi thub zla ba'i gsung gis rnam spras pas/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa lnga yi rgya mtsho rnams/ /rba rlabs chen po bcom par gyur pa ni/ /rmongs pa'i yul rnams med pa ru ni gyur/ /mi thub zla bas rnam par spras pa'i mkha' 'gro lnga'i bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes 
129b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po li la badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis/ rang gi dam chos gsal bar byed pas na/ rang dang gzhan gyi don du legs par bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du
129b5(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI DA ki nI badzra pany+tsa ra saM ha ra Na maN+Dal a nu re nA sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gcig dang
129b6(rgyud 'grel): du mar dpyid pa'i snying pos nyid kyi dngos grub la 'khrul zhi mdzad pa/ /shes rab yan lag 'dus pas bskyed pa rdo rje'i rtse mo'i bu gang gsal zhing 'od 'bar ldan/ /thugs rje shar bar dag pa'i 'khor lor mdzad pas sems can don la brtul bas bcings
129b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyis brgyan kye'i rdo rje la bdag gi spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /rol bcas zhabs ni 'dam skyes ldan pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma phyag 'tshal/ /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag ni/ /rang dran phyir na bri bar bya/ /de nas gzhan yang
130a1(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mang po la dmigs nas snying rje'i ro shin tu rgyas pa la 'jug par byed pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan rnam par brtags pas sems can rnam par rgyas par gyur pa dang/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par bcu
130a2(rgyud 'grel): por sems kyi rgyun yongs su dag pa can dang/ rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bla ma mnyes par byed pa'i skyon rnams la sogs pa dang bral ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson 'grus kyi mthu yis sems rtag tu non ches pa dang/ dpal dang
130a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gur gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing cho ga bzhin du rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i sngags thun mtshams kyi dang por langs te/ rang gi snying gar re pha las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dam pa'i dang po sa bon rnam par bkod
130a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhag la/ dur khrod la sogs pa'i phyogs la lar tsandan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ me tog rnam pas nye bar mdzes pa byas pa'i sa'i char zhing chen la sogs par rdo rje skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ lag pa'i lo ma
130a5(rgyud 'grel): dag ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar yang dag par bsdus te 'dug nas yi ge hUM las 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha' i bar snang gi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par dmigs la mchod pa la sogs pa
130a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de la mchod pa ni 'di lta ste/ /'od kyi sgo nas nges gton pa'o/ /pad+ma'i lag ldan rnam par sgeg /sgeg sogs lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /yang dag par ni mchod par bya/ thogs med srid par skyes pa yi/ sdig sogs cho ga bzhin bshags
130a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bde gshegs tshogs kyi spyan sngar ni/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i phung po bshags/ thub sogs sras dang bcas rnams kyi/ /srid gsum skye bo dngos rnams kyi/ /bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la/ /dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /rnam rtog
130b1(rgyud 'grel): kun ni rab btsom pa'i/ /rgyal ba rnams la dag dbul lo/ /srid pa byed par nges 'joms pa'i/ /byang chub sems su sems gcig ste/ /phyogs bcu kun tu nges par ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ /zhi ba'i dkon mchog gsum 'di la/ /da lta nyid nas
130b2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi'o/ /srid gsum skye bo la phan pa'i/ /rin chen lam ni bdag gis bster/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong zhing/ /mtshan ma med cing rgyu med par/ /gang phyir brtags pas rnam grol bas/ /smon pa dang ni bral par 'gyur/ /de ltar
130b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rnam gsal zhing/ /sgyu ma lta bur rnam bsams nas/ /ma rig la sogs skyon sogs pa/ /de 'gog pas ni 'gog par 'gyur/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod la nga rgyal bya'o/ /bsod nams ye shes dag
130b4(rgyud 'grel): gis brtags pas bsags pa'i dbang la sku gsung nyid 'dod na/ /nyi ma la gnas sna tshogs rdo rje kha gyes 'jigs pas sa bon hUM las skyes mtshan pa'i/ /'di las rab la sogs bzhi po rnams ni skyes par rab tu bsam byas par/ bruM zer las
130b5(rgyud 'grel): byung rtsibs bcu ldan pa'i 'khor lo mi g.yo lta bur 'khor ba byas nas ni/ /de la chu skyes nyi mar mnyam med gshin rje mthar byed la sogs hUM dang mtshan mas bskyed/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis rnam par rol cing g.yo can rnams ni mnan
130b6(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /de yi dbus su hUM dang rdo rje las skyes rdo rje hUM mdzad de/ anda rnyil 'od 'dra ba'i gong bu lta bur sku mdzes gyur/ /sna tshogs na bza' i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rnam par 'jigs shing sgeg pa'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag ni rab sbrel te/ /phyag rgya'i mchog ni
130b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar mdzad/ /rin chen dbu rgyan dang ldan par/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rab tu bzhugs/ /lha mo dka' bzlog ma'i bu la rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /mos pa med pa'i dgra bo'i ri bos mtshan ma can gyi yan lag gi /dam par rab tu bsdus pa'i gnas su
131a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma can gyi zhe sdang la/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi chu skyes zhabs kyis rab tu mnan cing rnam par sgeg pa ste/ /ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed dang/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa dang/ rta mgrin
131a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ dpa' bo 'di rnams sngon po dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ mig sman lta bu la sma ra dmar ser dang/ smin ma rab tu 'khyug pa dang/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa dang/ nags tshal chen po lta bus lus brgyan pa/
131a3(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa ldir zhing sku thung ba dang/ smad stag gi pags pas dkris shing seng+ge'i lpags pa bsnams pa/ kha nas 'bar bi 'dug 'phro ba can gyi klu rnams kyis sku la mdzes pa'o/ /tho ba dang/ dbyug pa dang/ mtsho las skyes pa dang/ rdo rje rnam
