175b1(rgyud 'grel): dran don du/ /de yi tshig ni dris pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams bzod par mdzod/ /rin chen thigs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal shes rab gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
175b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ /a b+hi She ka ratwA? lo ka /bod skad du/ dbang rin chen snang ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcu gnyis phyed kyi phyed med pa/ /bcu gnyis phyed kyi phyed rang yin/ /bcu drug phyed kyi ro yod pa/ /bcu drug phyed
175b3(rgyud 'grel): phyed la phyag 'tshal/ /gang 'dis su kyang mi shes pa/ /gang 'di sus kyang gsal ma byas/ /rgyud rgyud na ni gsang ba bzhugs/ /de yi dbang mchog bdag gis bshad/ /dbang med na ni myur 'grub med/ /rdo rje dbang phyug de skad gsungs/
175b4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag thams cad dbang skal ldan/ /skal ldan min na nam yang min/ /mkhas pas de la sbyin par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje de skad gsungs/ /thams cad mtshan gyis gang ba dang/ /rgyud kun thams cad shes pa dang/ /dbang bskur shes rang
175b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje che/ /de ni bla ma rdor rgyal nyid/ /bla ma 'bad de mnyes par bya/ /rgyud las 'byung bzhin mchod bstod bya/ /yon tan phung po brjod mi nus/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gting dpag dka' / /sku ni rang bzhin dpal dang ldan/ /sems dpa' thams
175b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi ma 'dra/ /ye shes nyi ma bcom ldan 'das/ /gzhan gyi don du khyod ni shar/ /'khor ba'i dran pa'i don du ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar bdag la mdzod/ /de nas yan lag dri zhim bskus te gos bzang brgyan/ /skal ldan gyis ni lhan
175b7(rgyud 'grel): cig dkyil 'khor bri don du/ /sa la mchod pa rab tu 'bad de rnam par bya/ /rin chen sna tshogs sa 'og gzhug cing gter du sba/ /dpal chen rin chen rgya mtsho yi/ /rgyud las dkyil 'khor tha dad gsum/ /me tog yang na rdul tshon par/ /
176a1(rgyud 'grel): yang na ting 'dzin mchog gis bya/ /rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa'i gnas/ /nam yang dkyil 'khor der mi bya/ /skyon ni thams cad bral ba yi/ /gnas su mkhas pas brtsam par bya/ /dang po ji tsam nus kun
176a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /dad pas bla ma mchod par bya/ /bla ma'i zhabs la mchod byas na/ /the tshom med par dngos grub thob/ /rta dang glang po mu tig rin chen gser dngul dang/ /ras la sogs pa sna tshogs ci la dgyes pa dang/ /chung ma
176a3(rgyud 'grel): bu mo sring mo gzugs ni bzang ba dang/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis de rnams thams cad dbul bar bya/ /mgon po'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigs/ /khyod ni bdag gi ston chen po/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /thar pa'i lam nyid bdag la stsol//
176a4(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i 'byung ba bdag la stsol/ /gsang ba'i mchog ni bdag la stsol/ /thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal/ /thams cad mkhyen smad phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes bdud rtsi gtso phyag 'tshal/ /
176a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu khyod ni su zhig yin/ /khyod ni ci 'dod bdag la smros/ /dpa' po chen po bdag skal ldan/ /thog ma'i dbang ni bdag la stsol/ /de nas de yis mnga' yi ras/ /de yi phyi rol yon rnams dbul/ /rnam par snang mdzad
176a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la bsgom/ /dam tshig sems dpar gzung bar bya/ /oM A khaM bi ra sngags kyis/ /me tog phreng ba mig dgab ras/ /las kyi bum pas gtor bar bya/ /yang na dam tshig chu yis gtor/ /hUM hUM phaT phaT sngags kyis ni/ /
176a7(rgyud 'grel): a ti ho brtan brtul zhugs bzang/ /lan gsum arka me tog gis/ /hUM phaT sngags kyis gdab par bya/ /de nas rdo rje me tog can/ /snying gar cung zad bzung bar bya/ /oM su ra te sa ma yastraM/ /de bzhin thams cad rnam par
176b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /ye shes 'bras bu ci 'dod dang/ /dngos grub thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor ma mthong sngon du ni/ /gang yang smra bar ma byed cig /ma yin khyod kyi dam tshig 'di/ /nyams par 'gyur ba nges pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje spyi bor ni//
176b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung la 'di skad smra bar bya/ 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje yin/ /spyi bor bdag gis gsor bar bya/ /khyod kyis gzhan la 'di smras na/ /skad cig gis ni phug nas 'gro /gur gum dang ni tsan dan dang/ /sbrang rtsi yod pa'i chu bsres la/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni de
176b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus blugs/ /de yis dam tshig blud par bya/ /oM badzrod ka mahA dang/ /badzra ku raM bi sha na/ /lan bdun bzlas pas sngags kyis ni/ /lag pa g.yas su sbyin par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na bsreg par byed/ /
176b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'ong/ /'thung zhig rdo rje bdud rtsi chu/ /de ring phan chad khyod kyis ni/ /phyag na rdo rjer bdag la smros/ /bdag gis ji ltar bka' stsol dka' ba sbyin/ /de ltar khyod kyi dad pas bya dgos so/ /gang yang nga la mi mos
176b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mi bya'i/ /de ltar byas na rnam smin dmyal bar 'gro/ /skyes su dri med yid ldan pa'i/ /khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong/ /dkar po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /zhi ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ser po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /rgyas pa'i
176b6(rgyud 'grel): las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dmar po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /dbang gi las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /nag po dag ni mthong gyur na/ /drag po'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ras kyis mig la bkab gyur nas/ /rtags ni 'di dag mthong bar
176b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de nas bla ma rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis brlab ni smra bar bya/ /ji lta bsod nams de bzhin 'ong/ /lha mo rigs kyi rim opa la/ /ji lte ba yi dngos grub yod/ /rang rang gi ni rigs rigs la/ /me tog phabs pa'i bu 'di ni/ /
177a1(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu yi dngos grub 'thob/ /mig dgab ras kyi phreng ba las/ /me tog bzang po lag tu sbyin/ /pra tIts+tsha ho rdo rje 'dzin/ /lan gsum brjod la dbul bar bgyi/ /bla mas me tog blta bar bya/ /dngos grub rab 'bring tha
177a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ste/ yan lag rab kyis phyag rgya che'i/ /dngos grub the tshom med par mthong/ /yan lag 'bring gis sngags dngos 'grub/ /yan lag tha mas chung dngos 'grub/ /rang gi lha mo'i dbus gnas su/ /yang na rang dang gzhan gyi bar/ /me
177a3(rgyud 'grel): tog gang gdan nye de'i yin/ /de yi gnas ni dbus su brlag /dkyil 'khor phyi rol babs na ni/ /cung zad tsam gyi dngos grub 'ong/ /pany+tsa re khA la babs na/ /phyi nas lan gsum dbul bar bya/ /yang ni de yi steng babs na/ /nam
177a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /de la chu yi dbang gcig sbyin/ /dbang gzhan dag ni mi sbyin no/ /sgo dang rta babs phyi rol dang/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyir babs na/ /dngos grub tha ma'ang med gyur na/ /gzhan chen po ni ga la 'grub/ /
177a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' de ring nyid/ /khyed ni nan tan mig phye ste/ /bdag gis thams cad mig phye bas/ /rdo rje mig ni mchog gi mchog /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i don/ /dang po sgo skyong la sogs nas/ /dkyil 'khor ji lta bu yi gnas/ /
177a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mtshams la sogs so sor bstan/ /bcom ldan 'das sku ji lta bur/ /rab gnas khrus kyi chog bya/ /de ltar slob ma la 'bad de/ /rtse gcig gis ni khrus bya'o/ /bum pa chos kyi dbyings ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod/ /
177a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla A li kA lis 'byung/ /de yis nang du bsam par bya/ /lha mo dang ldan mi bskyod pa/ /sems can zhu ba'i rang bzhin can/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /las kyi sems dpa' ang de yin no/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/
177b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma chen po ji ltar bya/ /bdag dang 'dra ba'i don du ni/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la stsal/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gzhi las 'byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag gis sbyin/ /oM hUM
177b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ni rdo rje chus/ /'khor los bsgyur dbang bdag gis bskur/ /chu yi dbang ni bskur ba yis/ /mgo bor mi bskyod rigs 'byung ngo/ /de 'bras me long ye shes ni/ /dri med yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gser mo Da bzo byas
177b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /yang na ras la bri ba mchog /'jig rten khams ni grangs med na/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni bzhugs pa kun/ /dbu rgyan gzugs su bsgom pa ni/ /mgo bo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ /oM mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsi mi/ /'khor los sgyur las khyad pa
177b4(rgyud 'grel): che/ /dbu rgyan dbang gis mgo bor ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de 'bras mnyam nyid ye shes ni/ /dri med yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sgeg mos gzung nas su/ /hUM hUM hUM ni brjod nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ji ltar
177b5(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdag gis khyod dbang bskur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rab grub phyir ni rdo rje gzung/ /slob ma'i snying gar gtugs byas la/ /lag pa g.yas par sbyin par bya/ /oM hUM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rdo rje
177b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis mgo bor ni/ /snang ba mdza' yas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de 'bras so sor rtog pa yi/ /ye shes gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdor dril sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di/ /gnyis med dngos po shes rab thabs/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
177b7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /lag pa g.yon par 'di zung shig /'khyud nas kun tu sbyar nas su/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i dngos por 'dug /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti stwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa min ya ka /dril bu'i dbang gis mgo bor ni/ /don yod grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de 'bras bya ba
178a1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa ni/ /dri med yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dang ni rdor dril ni/ /spyi bor steng du gzung byas la/ /oM sh+rI nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /dngos po lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo'i/ /sngar gyi rigs kyi rim
178a2(rgyud 'grel): blta'o/ /ming gis dbang gis mgo bor ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rigs 'byung ngo/ /de 'bras chos dbyings dag pa ni/ /dri ma med pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di ni dbang bskur lnga yin te/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /rigs
178a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i bdag nyid kyang yin no/ /'byung lnga'i rang bzhin yang yin no/ /dpal 'di yis ni dbang bskur bas/ /thams cad kun la dbang byed 'gyur/ /yan lag lnga ni yod pa'i dbang/ /de ni slob dpon gyi yin no/ /yang na lha mo dbang du
178a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /shes rab ma yi las yong phyir/ /kye yi rdo rje rgyud las gsungs/ /ye shes snying po der yang bstan/ /lag pa dag gis 'khyud pa ni/ /bcu drug lon pa'i shes rab 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor ba/ /slob dpon
178a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang du gsungs pa'i gzhung/ /lha mo 'am ni slob dpon dbang/ /sdom pa'i mchog ni gzung nas su/ /sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis/ /dam tshig gsum yang zhu bar bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang/ /thugs rje'i gter gyis bdag la stsol/
178a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan don bya ba ni/ /khyod kyi bka' drin drin gyis so/ /bcom ldan yang dag dpal bla mas/ /rdo rje de nyid gzung bar bya/ /hUM gi dngos po rdo rje mchog /thog ma tha ma med bdag nyid/ /oM mchog gi dang po skyes bu ste/ /rdor
178a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin thams cad bdag po yin/ /haM hAM hiM hIM huM hUM ste/ /'di yis rdo rje byin gyis brlab/ /a las rdor dril skyes ma ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma/ /hUM hUM phaT phaT phiM phiM ste/ /'di yis dril bu byin gyis brlab/ /'di ni mchog gi
178b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos po yin/ /shes rab sgyu mar gsungs pa'o/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bzung bar bya/ /thog ma byang chub rgyal bas gzung/ /rdo rje mchog gi ye shes ni/ /mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu'i gzugs/ /ston pa 'di yi tshig gis ni/ /slob ma'i lag tu sbyin par bya/
178b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni sngags ni yod pa'i sa/ /rtse gcig gis ni dkrol bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra g+haN+Da ma hA na de swa rU pe bin du dz+nyA na ma ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rang yid brtan pa'i de nyid kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin can/ /rang gi lha yi dngos po ni/ /sku yi
178b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas gsal bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rigs/ /dam tshig gsum ni dpa' bor gzung/ /de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid don/ /nang gi mtshan gyis sbyor ba dang/ /lha yi rnam dag de kho na/ /mtshan dang 'byung ba smra bar bya/ /rnam snang mdzad
178b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon ji lta bur/ /de lta bur ni slob ma bzung/ /de la gnang ba sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas ci mdzad khyod kyis gyis/ /sems can thams cad phan don du/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho lta bur 'dug /thams cad ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /khyod kyis chos kyi
178b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor/ /'di ni dam tshig 'dul ba yis /de ni gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /ye shes lnga dngos zhi ba ni/ /ye shes rang bzhin mi phyed la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag byed pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje
178b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yis/ /nyid kyi phyag na ji ltar bsnams/ /rdo rgyal brtul zhugs mi shigs pa/ /khyod kyis de ltar gzung bar gyis/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta naM sid+d+hi sa ma ya badzra naM/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag rang nyid/ /mchod sbyin khu tshur ldan pa yis/
178b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni bdag gis lung bstan bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdor sems yin/ /sems can thar pa 'grub don du/ /ngan 'gro rnams ni dran par gyis/ /yang dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyed/ /khams gsum gyi ni thub pa khyod/ /sangs rgyas byang
179a1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' dang/ /'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu/ /dgra bcom pa ni yang dag pa'i/ /byang chub tu ni khyod lung bstan/ /phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu rab/ /'dis gsungs pas ni khyod kyis rnyed/ /de
179a2(rgyud 'grel): nas skyabs ni sbyin pa ni/ /gsang ba'i sgra ni yod pa'o/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni yang ma byed/ /dam tshig chen po yod pa ni/ /hUM phaT kyis ni
179a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'o/ /sdig pa thams cad med pa ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /phyi nas shi ba yod med de/ /srid pa yang dag dngos grub kyis/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das bor ro/ /rdo rje rin chen nang
179a4(rgyud 'grel): yod pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi rung/ /de ni 'byung ba tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dam pa'i chos la smad mi bya/ /nams kyang bor bar mi bya'o/ /ma rig pa 'am gti mug gis/ /phyi nang 'jigs pas
179a5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni/ /nams kyang spang bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /bla ma smad par yong mi bya/ /rang bdag yongs su bor nas ni/ /dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bya'o/ /ji ltar bde bar bde bzung
179a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'ongs 'byung/ /yan lag bzhi po 'di dag dang/ /gnang ba'i sbyin pa phyir mi ldog /dbang ni dbang lnga zin nas ni/ /phyi nas 'bad de sbyin par bya/ /dgongs dang dgongs min bye brag ni/ /slob dpon dbang du shes par bya/
179a7(rgyud 'grel): bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud las ni/ /dbang ni drug tu bshad pa'o/ /phyi ma'i rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang/ /bdun par gyes pa yod pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes da ltar ni/ /phyi ma'i phyi ma dpal rnal 'byor/ /'di dgu'i gyes par shes par bya/ /
179b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las gsungs pa'i rim pa'o/ /chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang/ /dril bu ming dang de lnga dang/ /rigs gsum dam tshig yod pa ni/ /dbang ni brgyan du gyes pa gsungs/ /brtul zhugs lung brtan skyabs sbyin ni/ /de dag bcu gcig gcig yin
179b2(rgyud 'grel): no/ /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o/ /yang na so sor shes par bya/ /dbang bskur 'di ni bcu bzhi pa'o/ /slob dpon mdun du rtse gcig gis/ /de nas gus pas zhu bar
179b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /byang chub rdo rje dpa' chen po/ /gsang ba'i dbang ni bdag la stsol/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje 'byung ba bdag la stsol/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal rmad
179b4(rgyud 'grel): byung khyod/ /bde chen bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang gi rigs kyi bu mo rab/ /skyes bu 'di la dgongs pa yin/ /rang gi rigs ni med gyur na/ /gzhan ma gang yang mtshan ldan rung/ /bcu gnyis yang na bcu drug gam/ /med na nyi shu lon pa
179b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ang rung/ /de ni nu sra gyes pa dang/ /ma btsas pa dang brtan pa dang/ /skra gnag mig dkyus ring ba dang/ /skad snyan dag tu smra ba'o/ /ha cang sbom min phra ba min/ /yan lag dkar min gnag pa min/ /ha cang thung min ring ba min/ /longs spyod
179b6(rgyud 'grel): dag la mkhas pa dang/ /sked dbus phra zhing b+ha ga rub/ /sku smad cha ni rab zheng che/ /khu ba mang zhing snying po chung/ /phyi zheng che la sra ba dang/ /dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa'i lus/ /'dod che gas cha la mi dga' min/ /smin ma ring zhing bar ma chad/ /gzhu
179b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos 'dra zhing 'od 'phro gnag /g.yon gyi srin lag rtsa ba la/ /'khor lo yang na pad+ma ra ni/ /rdo rje ral gri dngos gsal ba/ /su la 'di 'dra'i rtags yod pa/ /phyag rgya de yi gsang ba'i dbang/ /don ni 'grub par nus pas so/ /de las khrus sogs
180a1(rgyud 'grel): byug pa bya/ /dad pas bla ma la dbul bya/ /khyad par gyi ni tshig kyang brjod/ /mgon po khyod la 'di mtshar ro/ /de nas slob ma phyir gyed bya/ /nang min ha cang ring ba'ang min/ /rim pas bu mo dbang bskur bya/ /de la
180a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang chos bshad par bya/ /phyag rgya'i brda dang dbang gi don/ /skad cig rnams kyang de ltar ro/ /de nas gcig tu sbyor ba yis/ /legs dgyes dgyes pa rab bgyid do/ /snang ba rig bya 'dus pa ni/ /ye shes gsum ni 'byung
180a3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /yang dag ye shes gsum skyes na/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi rung/ /spangs na 'gro ba'i gnas su ni/ /bde chen sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'gro na de ni chad pa yin/ /shes rab ye shes gsal yin no/ /dpal
180a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang 'dus pa'i nang nas kyang/ /rdo rje nyi nub zhes ni 'byung/ /mtshams ni snang ba thob pa yin/ /rim pa lnga pa las kyang gsungs/ /de ni gsang bar bshad pa yin/ /gsang bar snang ba mched pa bshad/ /'dud nas de ni snang ba
180a5(rgyud 'grel): mched/ /de ni gcig pu pho brang gsang/ /der ni rang gis shes par bya/ /sems ni 'dam skyes nam mkhar min/ /de nas slob ma dgud par bya/ /de nas ras kyis gdong yang dgab/ /pad+ma rab kyi kha dbus nas/ /rdo rje rgyal po
180a6(rgyud 'grel): drang par bya/ /bu yi 'bad nang du ni/ /spom po tha lhag gis mnan no/ /rtsa gnyis mchog gi nang nas ni/ /longs spyod 'khor lo'i nang du btang/ /skyes bu bdud rtsi ji lta bu/ /khyod smos bdag ni dga' ba yin/ /e ma'o mchog gi bdud
180a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi min/ /e ma'o ye shes bdud rtsi rab/ /e ma'o ro ni brjod mi lang/ /e ma'o rdo rje bdud rtsi rab/ /de ring bdag skyes 'bras bu mchog /de ring bdag gi na rab tu rgyal/ /de ring bdag ni 'khor las rgyal/ /da ring bdag la the tshom med/
180b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi bka' drin yang dag mchog /brjod med gnas ni bdag gis rnyed/ /de nas yang ni zhu ba bya/ /bstod pa sna tshogs rab bgyis te/ /ye shes bde ba'i gnas bzhugs te/ /rgyal 'gyur rgyal 'gyur mgon po khyod/ /A li kA li gnyis
180b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag can/ /legs dgyes bde mtsho rgyal gyur cig /mchog dang chang ba'i dbus su ni/ /rol gcig khyod ni rgyal gyur cig /mchog gi dbang phyug khyod kyis ni/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bdag stsol/ /khyod kyi bka' drin de nyid kyis/ /rang
180b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ye shes bdag rnyed 'ong/ /yang na gcig bu'i gzhung du sbyor/ /yang na gzhan gzhung gzhung bzang ngo/ /shes rab ye shes dbang 'di ni/ /brtags la de nyid sbyin bya ste/ /'dod chags chags bral med pa dang/ /mnyam nyid ye shes sems
180b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang/ /chos rnams thams cad mi chags pa/ /ji ltar pang chus mi gos bzhin/ /de la 'bad de dbang gi rgyal po ni/ /gcig pu'i yan lag ma la 'dir skyon med/ /bla mas rtog pa med par sbyin par bya/ /ye shes zla gsang rgyud las de
180b5(rgyud 'grel): skad 'byung/ /don zin nas ni skad cig gis/ /ma dang 'dra bas bla ma dbul/ /'chang ba'i sbyor thabs la sogs kyis/ /dang por bu mo'i 'dod mchog bya/ /de nas skad cig dga' yon tan/ /rang bzhin de yang gsal bar bya/ /'di ni rang bzhin
180b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni gnas/ /gnyis kyi bar na de ni yod/ /rdo rje dbang phyug ma yi rtsa/ /nyid ni 'di yi nang na bzhugs/ /kun rdzob dngos po'i gzugs su ni/ /khyod ni bud med gzugs yin gyi/ /khyod ni gcig pu don dam par/ /phyag rgya chen po nyid yin no/ /
180b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis thams cad kun bskyabs na/ /byang chub rab ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /shes rab skyabs sbyin byas langs na/ /slob ma'i lag tu sbyin par bya/ /'di nas khyod bzung bzang ba yin/ /rjes su mthun par sangs rgyas gsung/ /ye shes gsum gyi rim
181a1(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /dam pa'i bde ba myong byed cing/ /sangs rgyas rin chen snod kyi ni/ /g.yon ngos la ni rtsa yi gnas/ /de ni kha ga mu kha dngos/ /rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma ni nyid/ /thabs gzhan dag gis byang chub ni/ /nam yang rnyed par
181a2(rgyud 'grel): yong mi 'gyur/ /de pas lhan cig mi gnas pa/ /dus 'di phyin chad ma byed cig /de la yan lag dri zhim gos bzang brgyan/ /yan lag me tog sna tshogs mang pos brgyan/ /gos med chu skyes sig sig ngag byas te/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas
181a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar ston par byed/ /dri chen dri chu za ba 'di/ /skyes bu khyod kyis nus sam ci/ /rak+ta shukra sha chen dang/ /bud med brtul zhugs de bzhin no/ /b+ha ga'i pad+ma 'drib nus sam/ /skyes bu smos dang ji lta bu/ /lha mo bdag gis ci mi nus/ /
181a4(rgyud 'grel): rak+ta shukra sogs za nus/ /rtag tu bud med brtul zhugs bgyid/ /b+ha ga yang ni bzhib par bya/ /de nas dga' ba'i bdag nyid des/ /byams pa'i spyan ras kyis ni gzigs/ /bde ba thams cad 'dug pa ni/ /bdag gi pad rgyas e ma'o/
181a5(rgyud 'grel): gang 'di rab dang byed pa yi/ /de yi mdun du bdag 'dug gis/ /ji ltar pad+ma'i don gyis cig /yang dag sangs rgyas mnyes sogs bya/ /nyid kyi bde chen rgyal po ni/ /'di na dus rtag yod phyir ro/ /bde ba chen po'i dmar thigs 'di/ /
181a6(rgyud 'grel): ngo yi chu skyes kyis mnyes kyis/ /de nyid gsum gyi dga' sbyor bas/ /rdo rje chu skyes bskyed par gyis/ /brtan pa'i don ni khyod kyis gyis/ /brtan pa med na bde mi 'grub/ /sngar gsungs pa yi bla ma'i bka' / /ma brjed rtse gcig gis ni bsam//
181a7(rgyud 'grel): rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma yi rtsa/ /g.yon gyi ngos la bzhugs pa ni/ /bla ma'i man ngag yang dag gis/ /phra mo'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /lta ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /sa bon 'babs par mi bya'o/ /sa bon snying po yod pa na/ /ngo mtshar
181b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i bde ba 'byung/ /thams cad bde ba'i gter gyur pa'i/ /byang chub sems bde babs gyur na/ /phung po rnam shes brgyal 'ong ba'i/ /dngos grub rab de ga la 'grub/ /la la mnga' la mnyam sbyor bas/ /reg bya la ni bde 'di 'byung/ /de dag
181b2(rgyud 'grel): smin pas mchog gi dga' / /snang ba mchod pa'i gzugs can tsam/ /bskyod pa'i reg bya babs pa yis/ /ched dang snang ba thob pa yin/ /lha ba brten pas de nyid la/ /rnal 'byor pas ni mi g.yos blta/ /la la'i lta ba nam mkha' yi/ /mda' la
181b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi pho brang mnan/ /rdo rje skyil krung gi ni sems/ /rin chen nang du blta bar bya/ /gsung lam gyis ni brjod med pa'i/ /ye shes mchog 'di skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni de nyid man ngag yin/ /mkhas pa yis kyang rnyed dka' ba/ /skal dang ldan
181b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don bsgrub phyir/ /da ni bdag gis gsal bar byas/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu ma yang ni mi dmigs so/ /de ni yang dag dri med gnas/ /bde ba chen po'i 'bras gzugs can/ /ye shes lta ba'i rnal 'byor na/ /
181b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba med pa'i bde ba brtan/ /snga dro dus ni nyin gcig dang/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du ni/ /dpal rdor dbang phyug ji lta bur/ /ye shes nga rgyal brtan sbyor ba'o/ /kye mgon gang gis khyod la bstod/ /ji tsam bdag gis khyod bstod
181b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /tshad med pa dang brjod mi nus/ /rmad byung chen po gzhal du med/ /khyod kyi yon tan yang dag ni/ /kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus/ /cig gis dad par ci bstod kyang/ /de ni bdag la bzod par mdzod/ /reg bya nang bdag nyid phyag 'tshal/ /
181b7(rgyud 'grel): reg bya nang 'jam la phyag 'tshal/ /reg bya nang grol la phyag 'tshal/ /reg bya nang sbyin la phyag 'tshal/ /bzhi pa'i dbang bskur mchog 'di ni/ /mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la stsol/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsod par bya/ /khyod kyis brdzun du
182a1(rgyud 'grel): smra bar gyis/ /ma byin par yang khyod kyis yod/ /gzhan gyi bud med spyad par gyis/ /'di rnams byas na sdig med cing/ /bsod nams chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de rnams khyod kyis nus na ni/ /bzhi pa'i dbang ni sbyin par
182a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin la/ /mgon po chen po bdag gis ni/ /slob pa'i spyod pa sems kyis brtag /ji ltar dbang sbyin rim pas gsungs/ /gtong dul gting ring spyod yod na/ /dbang ni rin chen tshig gis sbyin/ /shes rab ye shes ma  
182a3(rgyud 'grel): rnyed na/ /dam tshig sbyin par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs phyir ro/ /phyag na rdo rjes ma gnang ngo/ /yang dag dbang ni ma rnyed na/ /phyi nas de ltar sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur de ni bzhi pa can/ /bzhi ru gyes pa yod pas so/ /bum pa la
182a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs nu reg res/ /dbang po'i 'bras bu dga' ba yin/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba mchog gi dga' ba yin/ /gsum pa gcig tu sbyor ba yi/ /shes rab 'dod chags me 'og gis/ /yongs su gyur pas chad pa
182a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de nas shes rab ye shes bshad/ /de yi 'gog pa bzhi pa yin/ /rang bzhin de ni de ltar 'ong/ /de ni dgongs par bshad ma yin/ /mkhas pas 'bad pas shes par bya/ /bzhi pa yi ni don rnams la/ /mi mthun pa ni mang smra ste/ de
182a6(rgyud 'grel): la gzhan ni 'di skad gsungs/ /btang snyoms dngos po bsgom pa yis/ /'bras yod bde pa'i dngos po ni/ /ye shes gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /btang snyoms dngos por bdag sbyor ba'i/ /lha mo'i de nyid bsgom pa yis/ /'bras bu'i rgyun
182a7(rgyud 'grel): ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gzhung gis de skad gsung/ /lha yi dngos po med pa dang/ /btang snyoms dngos po yod pa yis/ /bde ba yod pa 'bras bur 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gzhung gis de skad gsung/ /bag chags bde ba khyer nas ni/ /
182b1(rgyud 'grel): bag chags ma yin bde bar 'gyur/ /yang dag mchog ni rdzogs pa yin/ /gzhan gyi gzhung gis de skad gsung/ /bag chags ma yin bde ba'i dngos/ /lha yi bsgom pa yang dag gis/ /rab tu bde ba'i ye shes 'byung/ /de ni gzhan
182b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsungs pa'o/ /de gzhung tshad ma ma yin te/ /de don tshad ma yang ma yin/ /btang snyoms bsgom pa'i don gyis ni/ /'bras bu bde ba rnyed 'gyur na/ /nam mkha' me tog skye ba'i dpe/ /de bzhin gsungs pa kha che yi/ /rin chen rdo rje
182b3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi ni/ /ma mthong ba la bsgom pa med/ /mthong ba la yang bsgom pa med/ /bdag la btang snyoms sbyor yod dam/ /lha yi bsgom pa yod pa yis/ /'bras bu rgyun du rnyed 'gyur zer/ /de ni rmongs pa'i gzhung yin no/ /thams cad
182b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i btang snyoms kyis/ /dngos po ma yin 'ong ba yin/ /dngos po ma yin lha yi dngos/ /de skad 'byung ba su yi gzhung/ /'byung ba yin na de nyid min/ /dngos po'i gzugs can 'khrul ba yin/ /dngos po mi rtag bden pa yin/ /
182b5(rgyud 'grel): de yi don la the tshom med/ /btang snyoms dngos po yod pa dang/ /lha yi dngos po med pa yis/ /dri med 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur na/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'god par 'gyur/ /lha yi dngos po med gyur na/ /btang snyoms de yis ci zhig bya/ /yod na
182b6(rgyud 'grel): de la btang snyoms dgos/ /dngos po min na mi dgos so/ /rtag pa yi ni gnas med do/ /ri bong rwa sogs dpe dang 'dra/ /bag chags bde ba bzung na ni/ /bag chags ma yin 'ong 'gyur na/ /de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i tshig /'bru nad las ni
182b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam yang ni/ /'bras la sogs pa 'byung mi srid/ /mnyam pa kun gyi gzhung lugs so/ /yang dag rab tu de'i bsgom pa yis/ /rab tu bde 'bras 'byung 'gyur na/ /de la khyad par ci zhig yod/ /ci phyir don du sgom par byed/ /rab bde ba
183a1(rgyud 'grel): la khyad yod na/ /de la bsgom pa bya dgos so/ /khyad par gnas 'gro na yang skyon/ /de ni de nyid mtshan ma yin/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchog dga' dngos/ /lha yi dngos po rab bde ba/ /sgyu 'phrul ye shes chen po yi//
183a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu de ni rab bzhin gzhung/ /rang brtags yang na gti mug gis/ /de la mkhas pa rnams ni 'khrul/ /de yi gzhung lugs gsal brtags nas/ /phyi nas rang gzhung gsal bar bya/ /shes rab ye shes zin nas sems/ /myong ba de ni
183a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa yin/ /de yi man ngag slob rnams la/ /slob dpon gcig gis tshig gis bshad/ /shes rab ye shes zin nas su/ /slob dpon slob la gsungs pa 'di/ /rdo rje nyi ma nub las ni/ /'di yi ye shes gsal bar 'gyur/ /
183a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag de yi don shes ni/ /gzhan bzhi pa rab yin par gsungs/ /shes rab ye shes zin nas su/ /mtsho skyes 'byung bar babs pa ni/ /rin chen skar khung kha mi reg /thams cad kyi ni dngos po la/ /'du shes med pa bzhi pa min/ /gzhan dag
183a5(rgyud 'grel): de skad gsung ba yin/ /shes rab ye shes zin nas su/ /'dam skyes 'byung ba babs pa 'di/ /rin chen skar khung kha reg pa/ /'di yis dngos po thams cad la/ /dran pa med pa bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan dag gis ni de skad gsungs/ /shes rab
183a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes zin nas su/ /dang po'i yid ni nam mkha' i dbyings/ /babs bas chos rnams thams cad la/ /rnyed pa med par gyur pas so/ /de ni bzhi pa yang dag rab/ /gzhan gyis de skad gsal bar gsungs/ /thams cad pad+ma 'byung ba ni//
183a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dbyings su babs gyur na/ /chos thams cad la btang snyoms so/ /gzhan gyis bzhi pa gsungs pa'o/ /de dag thams cad dor byas te/ /rigs pa med pas gzhung lugs min/ /shes rab gang yin ye shes gang/ /de yi 'bras
183b1(rgyud 'grel): bu gang yin gsungs/ /'di yi don de mi shes na/ /gzhan gyi gzhung la 'bras bu med/ /ma zin na ni myong ba med/ /zin na myong ba yod pa yin/ /zin na myong ba ci zhig yod/ /song nas 'ongs pa ga la yod/ /zin nas myong ba phyir gyi ste/ /byol song
183b2(rgyud 'grel): gi ni las yin no/ /dang po dang ni zin nas gcig /phyi ma nus nas de bzhin no/ /zin nas nub pa yod pa yis/ /de la dpe ni gang gis byed/ /zin nas nub pa de ni gcig /de la khyad par ci yang med/ /zin nas rin chen kha la ni/ /ma reg 'gro ba
183b3(rgyud 'grel): de gzhung na/ /'gro na de ni chad pa yin/ /de la blta rgyu ma mchis so/ /reg nas 'gro ba de dang mnyam/ /gong du smras pa de yin no/ /dang po nam mkha' i dbyings la ni/ /rim pas gzhan yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /thams cad de ni babs gyur na/ /tha mal
183b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /tha mal pas ni bde chen ni/ /nam yang shes pa ma yin no/ /de la bde chen med par ni/ /ye shes 'byung bar ga la 'gyur/ /ye shes srid pa nyams dga' ba/ /shes rab mya ngan 'das las chad/ /de gnyis 'bras bu
183b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid yod/ /de yi 'bras bu don dam yin/ /de bzhin kye yi rdo rje yi/ /le'u brgyad pa'i nang nas gsungs/ /de ni gnyis med zhi chen po/ /'dod chags chags bral med pa dang/ /rang rig brjod du med pa dang/ /rtog pa thams cad med pa'o//
183b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin sgrub thabs sogs kyis ni/ /yan lag gsum ni yod pa yi/ /rang bzhin nyid ni bzhi pa'o/ /la la mnga' la mnyam sbyor ba/ /sgrub thabs phyi ma yin par bshad/ /hUM phaT kyi ni mnyam pa ni/ /bsgrubs pas de ni sgrub thabs so/ /
183b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs nang na sems yod na/ /rtags ni 'di lta bu dag skye/ /'dar dang rdul dang myos pa dang/ /lus mi brtan par dbugs rgod dang/ /bkrag dang drod ni de ltar brgyad/ /'bras bu'i dus na skye bar 'gyur/ /sgrub chen yan lag 'bras bu 'di/
184a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsum ni med pa'o/ /rang bde mchog ni zhi chen po/ /ye shes 'od ni rang bzhin can/ /de yi rdzogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /'bras bu 'bad de shes par bya/ /de 'bras ye shes rigs pas ni/ /slob ma la
184a2(rgyud 'grel): ni tshig gis ni/ /bla mas don ni bshad par bya/ /blta bar dga' pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /dbang gsum las gzhan gzhan na mang/ /bzhi pa gang na yod pa yin/ /'bras bu gzugs can de nyid ni/ /gsal bar de ltar bzhi pa'o//
184a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin dpal rin rdor zhabs kyis/ /dpal bsgom pa yi rim las gsungs/ /gsum ni med pa gsum rang ste/ de bzhin gzhung yin de ltar ro/ /gzhan gyi don la rab dga' bas/ /ro yi dgug pas dbang du bya/ /gsang pa'i
184a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba ci brjod pa/ /thugs rje can rnams bzod par mdzod/ /thabs kyi rgyud ni 'dus pa las/ /de lta'i gzhung lugs med na yang/ /de bzhin rigs pa ci smras pa/ /shes rab rgyud kyi rim las so/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis
184a5(rgyud 'grel): med dngos/ /de ni rgyal bas gsungs pa'o/ /'khor los zhi ni mnyam sbyar ba/ /phra mo'i thig le de nang du/ /rang bzhin gcig gcig gzhan ma med/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos po can/ /gzhan ma gsum ni 'dab la gnas/ /'khor
184a6(rgyud 'grel): lo re re so so yin/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma gsum/ /chu skyes lte ba yod pa'o/ /de ni phyi rol shes par bya/ /brgyad po brgyad ni de nang du'o/ /de yi nang na gsang ba bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod/ /baM gi
184a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po yang dag 'jam/ /sna tshogs can ni g.yo ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen de na gnas/ /rang bzhin ye shes mtshan nyid do/ /'phyang ba'i rtsa yi nang na bzhugs/ /khams gsum du ni rol pa mdzad/ /gsum ni rab tu
184b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ste/ /nang dang phyi rol bar ma yin/ /phyi rol g.yas kyi ra sa nA/ /nang gi g.yon gyi la la nA/ /dbus kyi a ba d+hU tI la/ /nyid kyi 'dug sa byed pa'o/ /gcig pu yi ni g.yo mo yi/ /kun rdzob tu ni gsum du 'gyur/ /de bzhin
184b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni gcig /sna tshogs gzugs su yod pa'o/ /dbang byed longs spyod brlag pa ni/ /de rnams ngal sor bstan pa'o/ /dbang byed mgrin pa'i gnas su ni/ /longs spyod par du mchog 'di bstan/ /brlag ni kha las
184b3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /de ni chad pa gsol ba'o/ /mchog ni mgrin pa'i gnas su ste/ /rang bzhin bar na yod pa'o/ /nang dang phyi rol dbus kyi ni/ /rnal 'byor de yang mi shes na/ /de dus rang bzhin mi rnyed de/ /shes na rnyed par the tshom
184b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ de ni shes rab skyabs yang dag /shes rab bla ma'i kha las 'gyur/ /rtsa rnams de ni med 'gyur na/ /khu ba khrag ni sbyor ba med/ /khu ba khrag ni med gyur na/ /rnam par shes pa sbyor ba med/ /rnam par shes pa med gyur na//
184b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad g.yo ba med par thal/ /g.yo med bde ba chen po ni/ /nam yang shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po med gyur na/ /nam yang byang chub mi rnyed de/ /ting 'dzin bzlas pa sbyin pa ni/ /bskal pa brgyar ni spyad na yang/ /
184b6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag de ni med gyur na/ /ji ltar rdo stengs sa bon bzhin/ /de ni thams cad 'grub don du/ /thabs ni cung zad bdag gis bshad/ /thabs gang gis ni rnal 'byor rnams/ /rang bzhin gyi ni gnas der 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg thabs
184b7(rgyud 'grel): ni med gyur na/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /lte ba'i hom khung gtum mo'i gnas/ /shes rab rang rig mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje chu skyes mnyam sbyor bas/ /yang dag 'jigs par 'bar ba'o/ /phung po lnga yi rigs lnga 
185a1(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /rnam par rtog pa'i sreg pa dang/ /de bzhin spyan la sogs pa ni/ /skye mched khams ni gzugs can no/ /phung po la sogs yaM shing dang/ /dang por sreg rdzas gsal bar byas yam shing thams cad bsreg pa'o/ /
185a2(rgyud 'grel): haM gi dngos po kha bub ni/ /yon po'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/ /smin khrag 'khor lo'i nang na yod/ /de nas de ni yang dag 'bab/ /shukra bdud rtsi rab rgyun no/ /de yi gsang ba'i sreg rdzas sbyin/ /lte ba'i hom khung phyi rol min/ /yang
185a3(rgyud 'grel): dag par ni dgyes nas ni/ /ci bsams pa ya 'bras bu smin/ /'od kyi gzugs ni gtum mo yin/ /a ba b+hU tI zhi ba'i gzugs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs lam gnas/ /'gro dang 'ong ba yang dang yang/ /sgra yi rtse mo 'bum gyi
185a4(rgyud 'grel): cha/ /che bar lta bas mthong mi 'gyur/ /de yi ro yod mnyam pa yis/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin la/ /phra mor lta ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /mchog gi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yi nang na sems yod na/ /skad cig gcig
185a5(rgyud 'grel): gis byang chub sems/ /'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te/ /lung las gsal bar byas pas so/ /bdag gis sngon med rang bzor ni/ /rgyud rnams don las mi mang po/ /de yi 'bras bu ji snyed par/ /bla ma rab kyi bka' drin no/ /
185a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten tshad med myur bar ni/ /de yis 'gro ba grol bar shog /srid pa'i gti mug dgon pa la/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis lam rab stong/ /shes rab dpal ni gsang bas ni/ /rin chen snang ba gsal byas pas/ /su la bdag
185a7(rgyud 'grel): gis dbang bskur bas/ /bdag la de bzhin gang gis thos/ /de ni rang gis 'di shes la/ /gzhan dag la yang 'chad nus so/ /gang la bdag gis bskur min la/ /gang gis bdag la thos min la/ de ni rang gis mi shes te/ /
185b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la 'chad pa nus min no/ /dbang rin chen snang ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhabs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhabs dang/
185b2(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi lo tsa ba ?ma dge bsnyen chos kyi ye shes dang/ /phyug brtsams dbang phyug rgya mtshos zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI mahA dz+nyA na DA ke shwa ra sA d+ha naM no pi ka /bod skad du/ dpal chen po ye
185b3(rgyud 'grel): shes mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das na bzhugs/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das dang bral/ /bzhugs dang bral las rnam grol ba/ /brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan thig
185b4(rgyud 'grel): le'i rgyud dbab po/ /rgyud kun gyi ni mnga' bdag che/ /gang gi drin gyis rnyed sla ba/ /bla ma'i zhal snga bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rgyud 'di yi ni rgyal po yis/ /skal ldan rnams ni 'grub don du/ /rgyud kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa yi/ /mdor
185b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad/ /dri med chu yis bskor ba yi/ /ne'u srid 'jam po dang ldan pa/ /me tog 'bras shing yod pa yi/ /der gnas he ru ka mnyes bya/ /dang po rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /'di lta bur ni rab bsgom?
185b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar yaM yi ge 'bru/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi steng du raM yig 'bru/ /raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de gnyis yongs su gyur pa yis/ /'bar ba'i me ni yang dag bsgom/ /rtog pa'i bdag nyid lus
185b7(rgyud 'grel): po kun/ /me de yis ni bsreg par byed/ /bde 'khor bdud rtsi yod pa dang/ /'od du ? ba'i gzugs bsgom bya/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba yis/ /bsregs pa'i lus po gso bar bya/ /dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /dbang po'i
186a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang mtshungs par blta/ /gzugs kyi phung po'i bdag nyid ni/ /'gro ba kun la khyab pa yin/ /de ni gti mug yin pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bdag /tshor ba'ang de bzhin kun la khyab/ /rin
186a2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan nga rgyal phyir/ /'du shes kyang ni 'gro la khyab/ /snang ba mdza' yas chags pa'i phyir/ /'du byed 'gro la khyab pa ste/ /don yod grub pa phrag dog phyir/ /rnam par shes pas 'gro kun khyab/ /mi bskyod pa ni zhe sdang
186a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gzugs su ni/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid bzhugs/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ /rang rang gi ni rang 'od can/ /shes rab dbang po dag pa yin/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung//
186a4(rgyud 'grel): mA ma kI sogs khams yin no/ /legs dgyes dbang mo rnal 'byor ma/ /nam mkha' i khams su shes par bya/ /de kun gyi ni ngo bo bdag /yin par 'di dag dpyad par bya/ /chos 'di kun gyi rang ngo bos/ /bdag med ma skyes pa yin
186a5(rgyud 'grel): no/ /de dag 'khrul pas mig yor ni/ /smig rgyu chu zla ji bzhin ni/ /byang chub kyi ni tshogs bsgoms pas/ /sems tsam nyid la rab gnas shing/ /de nas rang snying mkha' par du/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sems kyi
186a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon de dbus su/ /'od zer lnga ni rab tu phro/ /de yi snang bas mdun du ni/ /nam mkhar gser gyi padmo che/ /'od zer 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ /lte ba yod pa'i 'dab ma 'bum/ /'dab mar sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /chos kyis phyag
186a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya 'dzin pa'i mchog /dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' i ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' i ngo bo nyid/ /nam mkha' khyab par mthong nas su/ /mchod pa byas nas skyabs su 'gro /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor
186b1(rgyud 'grel): bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rdzas yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'dus gtso la/ /byang chub thob par skyabs su mchi/ /rang dang gzhan ni 'grub don du/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/
186b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems mchog 'byung byas nas/ /sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer/ /'gro ba kun la phan don du/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir/ /dgyes mchog byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /de nas tshangs pa yi ni gnas/ /
186b3(rgyud 'grel): byams pa la sogs ldan bsgom bya/ /bu gcig pa yi ma lta bur/ /brtse ba'i sems kyis mthong ba yin/ /de bzhin sems can thams .cad la/ /sems bgyid de ni byams pa'o/ /gang gi thabs kyis sems can 'di/ /sdug bsngal
186b4(rgyud 'grel): ma las bdag gis gdon/ /de lta bur ni gang zhig sems/ /de ni snying rjer bstan pa'o/ /sdug bsngal me las bton pa yis/ /rang gi yid ni dga' ba yin/ /bdag gis sems can phan don byas/ /de ni dga' bar bshad
186b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'dul dka' gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /de la zhe sdang bskyed mi bya/ /btang snyoms kyang ni mi bya ste/ /sems can nang na yod phyir ro/ /de lta min na smon lam ni/ /the tshom med par don med 'gyur/ /skyon la btang
186b6(rgyud 'grel): snyoms ldan pa'i sems/ /de ni btang snyoms mchog yin no/ /de yi bsod nams kyi ni tshogs/ /yang dag par ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ye shes tshogs ni 'phel don du/ /stong pa nyid ni bdag nyid yin/ /'das pa dang ni ma
186b7(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs pa/ /da ltar byung pa'i khor ba gsum/ /ngo bo nyid bral stong pa yin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin no/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM swa b+hA ba shU n+ya tA satwa d+harmA swa b+hA ba shU n+ya tA haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa
187a1(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ de yis ye shes kyi ni tshogs/ /yang dag par ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /tshogs gnyis po ni rdzogs pa yis/ /the tshom med par byang chub 'thob/ /de nas paM byung pad+ma ni/ /kha dog dmar po 'dab
187a2(rgyud 'grel): ma brgyad/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi steng du sa bon hUM/ /'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba yin/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa yis/ /skad cig gsum rgyal nyid du 'gyur/ /sku mdog gnag la 'jigs
187a3(rgyud 'grel): byed che/ /bskal pa'i me bas drag 'jigs che/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi dang ni ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyis bdud bzhi po ni mnan/ /zhal ni re re spyan re re/ /rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis bdud phur 'dril/ /
187a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ni ral gri dbyug pa 'dzin/ /de lta bu yi khro rgyal po/ /bdag rang nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag ni sum b+ha nyid yin phyir/ /de la go cha bgos ma yin/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+na grih+na hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na pa
187a5(rgyud 'grel): ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ /oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ shar phyogs la sogs se gol gyis/ /sum b+ha'i rnam pas sngags gdab bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje sa yi 'og /hUM las 'od ni spro bar bya/ /de yi 'od kyis
187a6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba yis/ /rtsig pa dang ni bla re'o/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar ba yin/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba'o/ /oM b+hA g+hA g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha rA dz+nyA na pa ti/ kA
187a7(rgyud 'grel): ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ badzra mud ga ra badzra kI la ya/ a ko Ta hUM phaT/ da lta'i cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i gur ni bsam par bya/ /de'i dbus su snyoms pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi b+ha ga'i dbyibs/ /rlung la sogs
187b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo bzhi/ /de yi nang du bsgom par bya/ /yaM gi yig 'bru las 'byung rlung/ /dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du ni/ /nag po rgyal mtshan dang ldan bsgom/ /ram gyi yig 'bru las byung me/ /
187b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar/ /me lce dang ni ldan pa ste/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du bsgom/ /baM gi yig 'bru las byung chu/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dbyibs lta bu/ /bum pas mtshan pa kha dog dkar/ /me yi steng du
187b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /laM gi yig 'bru las byungs/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbyibs lta bu/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa kha dog ser/ /chu yi steng du bsgom par bya/ /'khor bzhi yongs su gyur pa las/ /gzhal yas khang du rab tu bsgyur/ /gru
187b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra byed chun 'phyad dang/ /'dod dang rin chen la sogs brgyan/ /de yi phyi rol dur khrod bcas/ phyogs mtshams bye brag brgyad po ru/ /gtum drag de ni tshig
187b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /dbyibs can de ni ma tshig pa/ /tshang tshid dum bur gyur pa yin/ /'bar ba dum bur ma gyur pa/ /dmyal sogs 'jigs par bshad pa yin/ /mi bzad pa ni 'jigs par byed/ /ha har rgod ni mdung rtser bskyon/ /
187b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yer ka can ni 'gegs pa'o/ /pa ta li dang pun da li/ /sa le shing dang shi ri Sha/ /u dum ba ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /a shwa ha nA ge sar shing/ /dur khrod re re shing re ni/ /dpa' bo sogs kyis dbang du byas/ /bya rog byi la 'ug pa
187b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /stag dang khyi dang bya rgod phag /sha za'i gdong bcas brgyad po ni/ /shing rnams steng na 'dug pa yin/ /bya rog spyang kyi 'ug pa dang/ /dpa' po khyi dang srin po dang/ /phag pa dang ni ro langs dag /rang rang rnam par 'og na
188a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /de lta bu yi dur khrod kyis/ /gzhal yas khang ni yang dag bskor/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /lte ba'i nang du phyag rgya ni/ /gru gsum me tog kun da mtshungs/
188a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla A li kA li las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin can/ /rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa/ /phyag rgya yi ni dkyil du bsgom/ /bde ba chen po 'byung ba ni/ /mchog gi dga' ba'i pho brang las/ /rdo rje ro lang ma ni 'phrog /
188a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni dang po'i ro las so/ /gnyis pa'i ro ni 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje dra ba ma ni 'phros/ /gsum pa'i ro ni 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje rtse mo ma ni 'phros/ /bzhi pa'i ro ni 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje zlum po ma ni 'phros/ /gcer bu dang ni skra
188a4(rgyud 'grel): grol ba/ /shar sgo la sogs shes par bya/ /gnag dang dmar dang ser dang dkar/ /spyan gsum pa dang phyag bzhi pa/ /chu srin nya dang seng ge dang/ /ga ru Da ni phyag g.yas bsnams/ /ka pA la dang kha TwAM ga /sgeg mo yi ni phyag
188a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bsnams/ /gzhan gnyis rdo rje mda' gzhu ni/ /rna ltag tu ni 'gengs par mdzad/ /kun kyang phyag rgya lnga po 'chang/ /sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /'jigs byed ro yi gdan gnas nas/ /sems can rnams kyi don
188a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /yang na shes rab thabs sbyor bas/ /bde chen rgya mtsho'i pho brang las/ /rdo rje'i ske rags ma ni 'phros/ /de ni lnga pa'i ro las so/ /drug pa'i ro yi 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje ser mo ma ni 'phros/ /bdun pa'i ro yi 'byung ba
188a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rdo rje rgod ma ma ni 'phros/ /brgyad pa'i ro yi 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje nyi ma mo ni 'phro/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mnyes byed gnas/ /mtshams ni bzhi pa dag na bzhugs/ /rnga dang de bzhin gling bu dang/ /rgyud mangs? dang ni rdza rnga
188b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rdza rnga chung ngu chal chung dang/ /tam+bu ra dang ka ra to/ /de rnams phyag ni gnyis gnyis shes/ /gzugs gnyis pa la 'jigs chen ma/ /yang ni shes rab thabs sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i nang gi pad chen las/ /rdo rje legs
188b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes ma ni 'phros/ /de ni dang po'i dga' ba las/ /gnyis pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho ma ni 'phros/ /gsum pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba las/ /rdo rje glang chen ma ni 'phros/ /de dag gnag dang ser dang dmar/ /phyag rgya
188b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ni grwa na bzhugs/ /gur gum ro dang ga pur dang/ /de yis pad snod bkang ba'o/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag na bsnams/ /kha TwAM ga ni g.yon na'o/ /gru gum phyag rgya dbu steng du/ /mdzub rtse gnyis ni thur du btsugs/ /g.yon brkyang
188b4(rgyud 'grel): ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub rab ster ba'o/ /yang ni shes rab thabs sbyor bas/ /rang bzhin gyi ni dga' ba 'byung/ /rang gi rig mi dang ldan pa/ /rang bzhin las ni nyi 'od zhu/ /de nas smon lam gzhan
188b5(rgyud 'grel): don du/ /rnal 'byor ma la lha mos zhu/ /bde chen legs dgyes mgon po bzhengs/ /rdo rje legs dgyes bdag dag mdzod/ /mgon po khyod min bdag ro 'dra/ /thugs rje ro yis bdag skye mdzod/ /kye mgon stong pa'i
188b6(rgyud 'grel): chad pa'i mtshan/ /rdor mcho ma bdag dga' bar mdzod/ /pad+ma'i kha phye rol gcig rol/ /mgon po stong pa'i rang bzhin min/ /a la la la legs dgyes mgon/ /rdo rje glang chen ma dga' mdzod/ /khyod rang gis gsungs
188b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag min ni/ /sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /glu 'di yi ni dor mdzad nas/ /oM hUM 'od du zhu las 'phros/ /de las rdo rje gri gug ni/ /yongs su gyur pa las ni nyid/ /dpal chen ye shes mkha' 'gro che/ lha mo legs 
189a1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes dbang mos 'khyud/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /snying rje yis ni rngaM ma bzhengs/ /sku mdog sprin gyi gnag dang mtshungs/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /zhal ni re re spyan gsum pa/ /zhabs
189a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig gyen du bsgreng ba ste/ /bdud bzhi yan lag ma dang ldan/ /zhabs gcig gis ni gnon pa yin/ /thod rlon phreng ba'i do shal byas/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan nyi ma bzhugs/ /dpa' bo mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan/ /phyag rgya
189a3(rgyud 'grel): drug gis yan lag brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/ /thor cog zla ba phyed kyis mtshan/ /sku smad gshin rje'i pags pas dkris/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa'o/ /gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang/ /g.yon nas
189a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'i zhal dang ldan/ /mkhyud pa'i phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa na ni dril bu'o/ /nyi ma mda' dang ka pA la/ /khrag gis bkang ba g.yas na bsnams/ /zla ba gzhu dang kha TwAM ga /rdo rjes mtshan pa g.yon na bsnams/ /
189a5(rgyud 'grel): legs dgyes dbang po de dang mnyam/ /yang na phyag ni gnyis dang ldan/ /zhal gcig pa dang spyan gsum pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /phyag na gri gug snod ni bsnams/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing/ /mchog
189a6(rgyud 'grel): gi rnam pa rang 'od 'byung/ /mtshan kun dang ni ldan pa'o/ /skra grol ba dang spyan ring ba/ /sku smad ske rags bar du chad/ /ji ltar sgo sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /brgyad pa la sogs pa yis bzhugs/ /de bzhin gru gsum grwar bzhugs pa//
189a7(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa yis ni shes par bya/ /de lta'i ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /bdag nyid dang ni bcas par bsgom/ /de nas bde ba chen po'i gzhi/ /pad+ma'i snod kyi dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi lha yi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag nyid/
189b1(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i me 'od tsha ba yis/ /bdag rtse de ni zhu bar bya/ /rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyis/ /dkar byas dag byas so/ /sngags kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis ni/ /rang gi lce yi 'dab mar bzhag /phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yis/ /lus ni de yis
189b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tshim bya/ /oM yo ga a mri ta shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA yo ga a mri ta shud+d+ho haM/ de nas mgon po'i snying po ni/ /thams cad 'grub don bzlas par bya/ /oM mahA kro d+he shwa ra dzA ya we dza yaTTaTTa hA sa ma hA ka pA lA gne b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT
189b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o/ /oM badzra Ti dzu gri h+raM h+riM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM so ra ta sa ma ye shwa re hUM hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags so/ /oM kliM bliM dzliM phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /thog mar
189b4(rgyud 'grel): oM dang hUM phaT mthar/ /bar du ming ni spel bar bya/ /'khor gyi lha mo thams cad kyi/ /mchod pa'i sngags su dran pa'o/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /de nas gtor ma btang par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas/ /  
189b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyab dang rgyab ni sprad pa'o/ /mthe'u chung lug rgyud rnam pa'i tshul/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni cung zad dgug /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad dang/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad tshur sbyon/ /sha dang nya la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'di long
189b6(rgyud 'grel): snoms dam tshigs srungs/ /bdag gi don thams cad la grogs mdzod/ /sgrub thabs 'di la dad pa yod pa de la srung ba'i don du gsol cig /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ gru gsum phyag rgya ster bzhag ste/ /'bad pa yis ni gtor
189b7(rgyud 'grel): ma btang/ /las rim de dag kun rdzogs nas/ /de 'og rnam par dag par bya/ /dga' ba bzhi ni rab gnas phyir/ /zhal bzhi po ni mdzes pa yin/ /de nyid ye shes gsum dag pas/ /zhal ni so so'i spyan gsum mo/ /srid dang
190a1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das gcig pa/ /de bas zhabs gcig gyen du bsgreng/ /pha rol phyin pa drug lam gyis/ /phyag rgya drug pos yan lag brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa chen po yis/ /gshin rje'i pags pas sku smad
190a2(rgyud 'grel): dkris/ /byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid yin/ /de bas sprin gyi mdog dang mtshungs/ /gnyis su med pa'i shes rab thabs/ /de phyir rdo rje dril bu ldan/ /bdud kun sdigs par byed pa'i phyir/ /mda' dang gzhu ni khengs par
190a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gengs/ /snang ba dang ni snang ba mched/ /de la bdag rang bdag po yin/ /de bas zla ba nyi ma gnyis/ /rol pa yis ni phyag na bsnams/ /dngos dang dngos min rtog pa med/ /de phyir mgo bo'i pad+ma'i snod/ /chos kun stong pa'i ngo bo
190a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /de bas kha TwAM ga bsnams pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid yin/ /zla ba phyed pas thor tseg brgyan/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin ngo bo yis/ /de bas mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan/ /snying rje chen pos rngam pa'i don/ /de phyir yang
190a5(rgyud 'grel): dag 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /mu stegs rnams la khrel rgod phyir/ /rus pa la sogs pa yis brgyan/ /bdud kun gyis ni mi tshungs pa/ /de bas bdud kyi steng na bzhugs/ /chags pa la sogs spangs pa yis/ /de phyir dur khrod
190a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du rol/ /de kun dag pa shes pas na/ /da ni ngal bso bya ba'o/ /rang gi snying gar mkha' pad du/ /dri med rgyas pa'i zla ba bsgom/ /de yi dbus su tshul tsam ni/ /mchog gi rnam pa skye med mkha' / /phra mo'i 'od kyi rang bzhin
190a7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /rlabs med pa yi rang rig go /de nyid bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub chen po 'dod gyur na/ /de la the tshom mi bya'o/ /gang zhig rgyud kyi nang med pa/ /de ni bdag gi rang bzo min/ /
190b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di byas bsod nams rnyed pa gang/ /sems can kun gyis thob par shog /dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po longs spyod rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA sh+rI
190b2(rgyud 'grel): gub ta nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba pA paM shud+d+hAgne pU dza nA ma sa ma d+hi/ bod skad du/ sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa'i
190b3(rgyud 'grel): me'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mahA mu dra ti la las/ /'byung ba khang pa brtseg ma ru/ /snying rje byang chub sems ldan pas/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khrus byas te/ /sngags ni bye ba
190b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bar bya/ /oM badzra na la ka mre ta ma lan d+ha ro te dang ro ro ga swAhA/ rdzogs dang rnal 'byor ma 'dus nas/ /bdag la lung stsol sbyin byed ma/ /bcu drug lon pa'i mtshan bzang mo/ /si la ga pur ma ba yod pa/ /kye bu 'di khyer sbyor
190b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gyis/ /lung ston thob pa'i pu mo la/ /dbang bskur rtsa ba'i rgyu 'bras bshad/ /shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /n+ya gro d+ha lhag la zhugs te/ /rtog pa'i khams la rnal 'byor bya/ /dus kyang ngal so mnyam par gzung/ /rdul
190b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis me sbar dngos po sbyar/ /yam shing me spar dkyil 'khor gsal/ /bsreg rdzas pad+ma'i mar bzhu ste/ /dgang gzar haM las rdo rje dgang/ /hoM khung phyi rol 'dzag mi bya/ /reg bya med pa'i mchod pa yis/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor
190b7(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong dang mkha' 'gro 'ang mnyes/ /nyam thug nas gshegs su gsol/ /bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang/ /chos sku thob par the tshom med/ /mar me rdzas rnyed ji bzhin du/ /dus thams cad du mi gnas
191a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lus 'di nan tan gang byed pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yin zhes bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gsang ba'i man ngag rin chen rdo rje dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI  
191a2(rgyud 'grel): A nanda puShpa mA lA/ bod skad du/ dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyed tshal ye shes thig dpal las/ /gsang mchod don gyi rgyu yi phyir/ /dga' ba yi ni me tog phreng/ /ye
191a3(rgyud 'grel): shes mkha' 'gro la 'dud bya'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi ye shes chen po shin tu zab pa'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i/ /dpal dbu rgyan pa'i rdo rje gnas chen po'i gtso mo dpal ldan yan lag rab ma'i zhabs kyi
191a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i bka' drin gyis/ /gang zhig yongs su shes pa de ni slob ma dam pa'i tshogs kyis dga' ba khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po la gnas nas/ /'gro ba'i gtam bstan par bya'o/ /dang po re zhig chu ngos chen
191a5(rgyud 'grel): por nye bar 'dug nas/ bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa gsol te/ brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa bya'o/ /brtul zhugs chen po'i dus su grong pa'i chos kun brtags dang gzhan dbang du 'dzin pa spang bar bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i
191a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod par gyur pas 'dod pa lnga bza' bar bya'o/ /gnyis su med pa'i sems kyis su/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa bsnyen/ /zhes lung ngo/ /de ni tshangs pa'i spyod pa'o/ /thig le dang tshul gyi ngogs gnyis kyi bar du/ /rdo rje skyil
191a7(rgyud 'grel): krung bcas nas sems rin chen gyi nang du slebs pa lta ba chen pos lta bar bya zhes man ngag go /yang na chu ngogs chen po'i rtsa ba'i bskyed pa'i gnas su bzhugs te thig les tshul phug nas thams cad khyab par byed pa
191b1(rgyud 'grel): char yang chen por 'jug par bya'o/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las/ ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don gyi gnas dang/ bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba dang brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa dang/ 'dod pa lnga bstan pa
191b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ thig tshul la sogs pa'i rim pas bzhag pa dang/ chang yang chen po'i 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du dbang
191b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba bstan par bya'o/ /chu dang dbu rgyan dang rdo rje la sogs pa bcu gcig gi dbye ba dga' ba bcu gcig dang ldan pa/ dang po'i rtsa ba'i gnas su gtsug tor rin po che'i g.yas g.yon zla ba nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rkan phyi nang du
191b4(rgyud 'grel): ro ma 'jug pa slebs pas rtsa bzhi nye bar rnyed pa'i myong ba las 'dar ba la sogs pa'i ro thob pa'i chu'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o/ /de ni shin tu kun dga' ba'i mchog gser las grub pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam pa'i bum
191b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bru dang/ 'bras bu dang kha rgyan dang/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang/ dar la sogs pa dang ldan pa bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i dus su rol mo sna tshogs gang dang glu dang mchod sbyin dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phan la
191b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang/ dri zhim po'i me tog chen po bkod cing 'chal par bkram pa dang/ spos chen po sna tshogs kyi dri du ma'i ro la nye bar grub par byas pa gzugs sna tshogs kyi mchod sbyin sems can thams cad
191b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag dang ldan pa de'i dam tshig gis dus su dbul bar bya'o/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las dga' ba bcu gcig gi bdag nyid dang ldan pa/ 'dar pa'i ro la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i mchod pa dang bcas pa'i chu'i
192a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gyi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du sngags kyi dbang bskur bstan te/ ka ba gcig pa sgo dgu
192a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa/ /de'i snying ga'i nam mkha' i dkyil gyi gnas su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dag pa chu shing gi me tog lta bu'i dngos po/ /kha sbub sdong bu dang bcas pa/ /yi ge rab mchog gi ni gnas/ /de'i lte
192a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa/ /de ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang/ 'gro ba'i gnas gsum du 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed do/ /bzhi pa'i gnas su 'am/ /dang po'i gnas rang bzhin gyi skabs su rang dbang du bzhugs so/ /dang po'i
192a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas su 'khyug pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa bzhin nam mkha' i rang gi dga' ba'i dus su 'don no/ /dbus kyi gnas su gsal byed dang bcas pa rtog med 'od kyi bdag nyid dga' ba'i dus su 'byung ngo/ /mdza' ma'i gnas su shin tu
192a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs las grub pa skye 'jig byed pa chad pa'i dga' ba'i dus su 'byung ngo/ /bzhi pa'i gnas su dbyangs dang gsal byed dang dga' ba dang/ skad cig dang ro dang rgyu la sogs pa dang bral ba dang/ brjod du med par rang rig
192a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rlabs med pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo'i thig le dang/ tshul la sogs pa dang/ rtsa'i kun spyod dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dang/ phra ba la sogs pa dang/ srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ 'khor lo dang ye shes
192a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rgyud dang sngags dang rim pa dang/ bstan bcas dang/ sgron ma dang/ spyod pa dang brtul zhugs dang/ longs spyod dang rlag pa dang/ dbang dang/ rtog pa'i bya ba dang/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa dang
192b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa dang/ shar ba dang nub pa dang/ dus dang dus tshod dang/ skabs la sogs pa dang/ thog ma dang par dang mthar dang/ bzlas pa dang/ mchod sbyin dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ rtag pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/
192b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa dang/ mdza' med 'od kyi ngo bo la sogs pa dang bral ba de ni yi ge mchog gi gnas zhes bya'o/ /de yang rgan mchu'i 'phar ma tshigs rgyas pa'i sgo 'gag pa byas te/ bde ba chen po khong du chud par byed pa rdo rje'i bu mo blangs
192b3(rgyud 'grel): te mchog gi yi ge'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /pad mnyam 'phar ?ma sbyor ba yi/ /rdo rje ye shes stobs kyis kyang/ /hUM phaT kyis ni mnyam sbyor las/ /mngon par dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma mnyam par
192b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i sngags brjod pa'i dus su dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa byas nas/ /bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems mdud pa'i nang na yod pa rtog med ma'i snying gar 'gro ba rlabs dang bral pa'i rnam pa rang gi
192b5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis tshor bar byas nas bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin dbul bar bya'o/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las/ /ke ba gcig dang sgo dgu dang/ /mchog gyi yi ge'i sngags kyi brjod pa dang/ /gnas gsum gyi don dang/ bdud
192b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i mchod sbyin dbul ba'i don bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhin ni yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan te/ po la kak+ko la gnyis med
192b7(rgyud 'grel): par sbyong ba'i ro las bde ba chen po'i dga' bas myong pa'i nang gi reg byed bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi sbyor bas kun myong nas/ /de dag nyid phyi'i reg bya'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab chu'i gter bzhin du/ /dbus nas rlabs pa'i rnam 
193a1(rgyud 'grel): pas ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba rdzogs par byas nas/ rang gi gnas su phyis rab tu mthim mo/ /de yang shes rab kyi rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i nang na yod pa bde ba chen po khong du chud par
193a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa sgo dgu'i bdag nyid kyi sku'i 'khor lo drug gi nang du char yang drug gi ye shes snang bar byed pa/ srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba'i nang du gnas par rang gi
193a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal thabs byed do/ /sna tshogs pad+ma kha sbub shin tu 'dzum pa yang ma yin/ rab tu rgyas pa yang ma yin pa sdong bu dang ldan pa gzhon nus chos kyi 'khor lo'i thig le'i gdan
193a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /pi raM b+hu ti zhal snga nas tshul gyi rang bzhin de ni shes rab chang yang bdag nyid lte bar dga' bas grub pa'i pad+ma zhes bshad do/ /dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i rgyud las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zhig thig
193a5(rgyud 'grel): le dang mtshul dang/ char yang dang/ dga' ba de ni rtsa bzhis 'jug pa dang/ gnas pa dang 'gro bar byed pa gsum stan cig ces gsungs so/ /srog gi rtsa'i nang nas 'gro ba gsum 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang 'gro bar byed pa zhes
193a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal grub pa'i bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma'i zhal nas thos te 'dir bstan to/ /lung las gsung gi bdag nyid rtog med thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus su sku gsung thugs kyi rang gi ngo bo spom pa nyid do zhes gsungs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma
193a7(rgyud 'grel): dang dbus ni sku gsung thugs dga' ba gsum dang bral ba phra ba tor ya zhes bya ba'i man ngag go /dpe'i slob dpon ni de yang rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su /gnas byed pa dpal rig ma'i thog ma'i gnas
193b1(rgyud 'grel): su chu skyes kyi lte ba'i dbus su phra mo'i rnam pa zhes 'chad do/ /dpal badzra b+hu ti'i zhal snga nas/ dbus kyi pad+ma spom po'i rnam pa'o/ /tha ma'i gnas dag gnyis la phra ba zhes bya ba dag nyid kyi ye shes kyi gnas nye ba'i lta ba zhes bshad do/
193b2(rgyud 'grel): yang rig pa rmad du byung ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyi rang gi ngo bo las don de ni tor ya'i man ngag go /phra mo'i man ngag rab tu shes pa'i shes rab dga' ba bskyed pa shin tu mtshan dang
193b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ dang por bla mas byin gyis brlabs te/ mchod pa dang dri med pa dang/ blo gros kyi sku skyes bu'i lag pa'i pad+mar byin nas shes rab dang thabs gnyis kyi lag pa gzung ste/ sangs rgyas rin po che'i snod kyi bya gdong la sogs pa'i
193b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas blta zhing 'gro ba'i tshig sbyin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi dbang bskur ro/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las/ gnyis kyi dbye ba'i rnam pa'i shes rab bstan pa dang/ rtsa bzhi'i rtags rab tu blta ba dang/ 'jug pa dang gnas pa
193b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'gro ba spom pa dang/ phra ba'i gnas blta ba dang/ shes rab thabs gnyis su med pa'i gzhung dang/ bya gdong la sogs pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes
193b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du don de kho na nyid kyi dbang bskur ba bshad de/ rtog pa kun gyi dra ba'i phyi'i rnam pa spangs nas nang gi reg bya 'jam pa'i shes rab mchog gi 'od kyi ngo bo can de dang lhan cig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas
193b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bdag nyid mchog gi dga' ba bde ba chen po kun tu spyod nas de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa dpal ratna b+hu ti'i zhal snga nas ye shes chen po'i de kho na nyid
194a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'o/ zhes bshad do/ /ye shes kyi rten brten pa dang/ gnas dang bye brag dang/ dga' ba la sogs pa dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dang nges par bstan pa dang/ bsam gtan la sogs pa dang sbyor ba yod
194a2(rgyud 'grel): do/ /shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas ye shes chen po'i 'byung ba'i dus su/ bla ma'i man ngag las rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug la reg pa dang/ rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil du bde ba chen po brtan par byed pa zhes
194a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba de ni man ngag go /ye shes kyi sa la mngon par zhen pa'i yid la rtags brgyad rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtags yongs su grub pas gnas gsum yod pa'i nyams su myong ba bla ma'i lta bas yin na'ang/ de lta
194a4(rgyud 'grel): mod kyi skye ba med pa'i snang ba gsal ba'o/ /da ni mchog gi rmad du byung ba zhi ba chen po rang gis nyams su myong ba dga' ba mdzes pa/ brjod du med pa yi ge dang bral ba/ mi zad pa/ dpyod pas mi rnyed pa/ mi rtog pa/ shin
194a5(rgyud 'grel): tu lkog tu gyur pa/ dbang pos ltar med pa/ mdza' med pa gting dpag dka' ba zab pa tshad med pa/ skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyi 'od rab/ de ni
194a6(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid ces bya'o/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las/ /ye shes chen po bstan pa dang/ bde ba chen po bstan par byed pa dang/ de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu'i don bstan pa zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o// //
194a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod don du mchod pa'i cho ga bshad de/ dang por re zhig slob dpon sngags dang/ /rgyud dang dbang bskur ba dang man ngag la mkhas pa rang gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang
194b1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi gnas kyi snying por 'jug na thig le dang tshul dang/ char yang dang dga' ba chen po dang/ bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho gas thig gdab pa la sogs
194b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor sku ni zhes par brjod/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi ni sems/ /dkyil 'khor gsum du rtog pa'o/ /de ltar shes pa'i man ngag gis phyi dang nang gi rim pas spyad par
194b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje gur chen po rdo rjer ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i gnas chen po rmad du byung ba zhes bya'o/ /
194b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad mi sdug ci sbyang tshogs drag po/ /'jigs rung sha za'i kha dang ha har rgod/ /nag po'i me dang de nas 'jigs byed brgyad/ /shing sogs dang ldan rmad gyur 'jigs byed bstong/ /me tog mig rdzi nA ga ge sar dpal/ /
194b5(rgyud 'grel): pa tra pa la shar khar sha mi/ /dpa' bo du ma rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyis/ /dpal dang ldan pa dur khrod rgyal po shin tu mdzes/ /lung las yi dags sreg pa'i dus su dur khrod kun la rngam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rngam pa'i
194b6(rgyud 'grel): skabs su shing kun la me tog dang 'bras bu dang yal ga 'phel bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod la dbang byed pa shin kha na dpa' bo kun gnas so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpa' bo kun sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/
194b7(rgyud 'grel): bya la dang bya rgod dang/ nyi mas 'jigs pa dang/ stag dang/ glang chen dgrad dang/ ce spyang dang/ khyi dang/ rta dang brgyad ni ha har rgod chen por rjod par byed pa/ mche ba 'jigs par dgrad pa zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa
195a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis pos sha chen po'i mgo bo la sogs pa za bar byed pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis na zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang/ g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal bya rog dang/ phag dang/ rta dang
195a2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen dang/ dom dang/ ne'u le dang/ nya dang chu srin dang/ bya khyung dang sha ra ba dang/ khrung khrung dang/ sbrul dang/ rma bya dang/ spyod mar dang/ phyi ba dang/ 'byung po kha cig ni gzugs sna tshogs pa zhes bya'o/ /phyi la la sogs
195a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rang rang gi byad gzugs zhal gnyis po shing gi 'og na phan tshun shin tu khro bas sha chen po la rtsod pa/ 'jigs pa'i byad khas khangs pa/ gyen du ce spyang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /lung las phyogs dang mtshams bye brag du
195a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad phyag bzhi pa rang gi stan steng na rang gi yan lag ma dang ldan pa/ rus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed pa/ phyag gi snyim pa cod pan du bcings nas 'dud pa kho na'o
195a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan yang dpa' o chen po dang po'i grub pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po dur khrod chen po'i dbus su utpa la sngon po'i mdog shes rab yan lag ma dang sbyar ba las mchog gi dga' bas mdzes pa /
195a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ me'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa/ 'jigs byed chen po gdan gyi steng na rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis zla ba dang nyi ma zhabs kyis mnyan pa /
195a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang dril bu dang rde'u chung dang thod pa bsnams pa/ phyag rgya lngas yan lag brgyan pa/ mi bskyod la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i phreng bas ral pa'i dbu rgyan dar gyis bcings pa/ shes rab ma yang sku mdog 'dra ba zhal gcig
195b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa/ phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ skra grol ba phyogs kyi na bza' can/ nu ma sra ba dang mtho ba/ rkeng zheng lus phra ba'o/ /yang na dpa' bo chen
195b2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gzugs sna tshogs kyi zhal/ gnag pa dang dkar ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ nam mkha' i kha dog dang ljang khu dang/ pad+ma sngon po lta bu dang/ zla ba dkar ba dang/ dmar chen dang/ utpa la sngon po dang 'dra ba dang/ gur gum gyi mdog
195b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mig sman dang/ du ba'i mdog dang/ sprin dang/ gser 'od dang/ nag ser dang ser po'i gzugs bya'o/ /dpa' bo chen po'i yan lag ma/ zla ma dang/ g.yon pa ma dang/ nyi mnyam ma dang/ rlung za ma dang/ bsil sbyin ma dang
195b4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i 'dab ma dang/ khag yod thor cog ma dang/ nyi ma 'dul ma dang/ zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang/ ljar brtson ma dang/ 'od 'dun ma dang/ tshangs pa'i ma dang/ khyab 'jug gi ma dang thog kha ma dang/ thams cad skyed byed
195b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ dpa' bo'i yum dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bde ba chen po'i dga' bas dgyes pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ dpa' bo chen po shin tu mdzes pa/ dpal nam mkha' dri med dang shin tu rtsal chen dang/ lha'i dbang phyug dang gsang
195b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag po dang/ 'od drag dang/ nye dgra dang/ mchog dga' dang/ thams cad kyi byed pa po dang/ utpa la'i snying po dang/ zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang/ nag po 'dul ba dang/ rmad byung dpa' bo dang/ dregs chen dang /
195b7(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po drag 'joms dang/ ri rab brtan po dang/ nam mkha' i zhal te dga' ba bcu drug gis rnam par dag pas dga' ba chen po mthar gyi dus su rtog med ma 'byung ba'i rngam ba dang bral ba'i nang gi reg bya'i yid ye shes kyi
196a1(rgyud 'grel): skabs su rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu las steng gi rlung g.yo ba med par gyur pas/ thig le dang tshul nang gi rang bzhin gyi rlung rang gi gnas pa las gang zhig blo bur gyi rngam pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi rngam pa'i dur
196a2(rgyud 'grel): khrod du dpa' bo chen po bzhugs so/ /lung las sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po bzhi/ 'dab ma brgyad kyi pad+ma'i rnam pa ge sar la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i dbus su gnas gcig dang ldan pa'o/ /zhes
196a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /lung las dang po'i gnas chu skyes kyi shar gyi 'dab mar oDyAN du gzugs ldan ma/ byang du dzA land+ha rar bum ldan ma/ nub tu pul+li rar bya rog sna/ lho'i 'dab mar kA ma rU par du ma/ me mtshams su mA lA bar glang
196a4(rgyud 'grel): chen kha /srin bu'i mtshams su sind+hu ra dang po'i stobs ma'o/ /rlung mtshams su nA gar ltogs ma'o/ /dbang ldan mtshams su sing ga lar lce ri sa ma'o/ /de dag ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas shes rab dang thabs gnyis su
196a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sbyor bas thams cad nang gi dga' ba zhes gsungs so/ /dbus kyi gnas kyi pad+ma'i shar gyi 'dab mar mu mu nir lo mi rang/ byang du de bi ko Tir lto ba che/ nub du ko lu tar dri ldan ma/ lhor arpu ta ra dri rdo ma/ me'i
196a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su ha ri ke la bar bsil sbyin ma/ srin po'i mtshams su ko ta bar 'od ma/ rlung mtshams su lampa kar dbyangs snyan ma/ dbang ldan mtshams su kany+tsa karpu ling nya ma/ de dag ni zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa'i mchog dga' o/ /tha
196a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i shar gyi 'dab mar las kyi grong du utpa la'i dri/ byang du gser gling du pad+ma'i khri/ nub tu kongka nar mtsho me tshig byed/ lhor b+hindar rkang ring me'i mtshams su yi dags 'dus par rus ldan ma/ srin po'i
196b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su rgya mtsho'i ngos su chu srin mig ma/ rlung gi mtshams su tsa ri trar nya'i kha/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su gzhon nu'i grong khyer du sna tshogs yan lag ma'o/ /de dag ni 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa dang/ dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur
196b2(rgyud 'grel): khrod chad pa'i dga' ba'o/ /bzhi pa'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i shar du kisma rar ga pur lus ma/ byang du ke ra tar rma bya'i sgro ma/ nub tu ne pa ler 'dod ma/ lhor kar nub zar dag pa'i lus ma/ me'i mtshams su 'chi med grong khyer du sgra legs
196b3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ srin po'i mtshams su mi yul du sna tshogs pad ma/ rlung gi mtshams su 'og tu 'dod pa'i ske rags ma/ dbang ldan mtshams su ri rab rtser pad+ma'i zhal lo/ /de dag ni byi la dang/ sbyor ba dang nye ba'i sbyor ba'i rang bzhin dga' 
196b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /dang po'i lte bar shar gyi lus 'phags su srog ma/ dbus su byang gi sgra mi snyan du la la nA/ tha ma'i nang du ba lang spyod du ra sa nA/ bzhi pa'i gnas su lho'i dzam+bu'i gling du a pa d+hU tI'o/ /lung las dpa' bo chen po dang
196b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas par nang gi 'khor lo'i rim pa'i shes rab thabs kyi rnam par dag pa zhes bltas te/ de ni lam dang nye ba'i lam mo /dur khrod brgyad kyi nang du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la A li kA li hUM gi yi ge rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin
196b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi 'od kyi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba/ zhal bcu drug pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ bde ba chen po mngon par dga' ba'i rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor la bzhugs zhes bya'o/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng
196b7(rgyud 'grel): ba las/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas kyi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du bsam gtan bstan te/ dpe'i
197a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa mi spar ba'i bya bas ye shes chen po'i 'byung ba'i phyir steng gi tshigs rgyas pa'i don du man ngag las sgo gzhan thams cad 'gog gi /lus la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis
197a2(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa de ltar ma yin zhes mchod do/ /de'i rjes su rgyal ba'i sras mo bzhin du rang gis dbang bskur pa sra ba dang mtho ba'i nu ma dang/ pad+ma mdzes pa dang utpa la'i 'dab ma ring ba'i spyan can/ tsan dan rlom pa'i dris khyab pa/ bla
197a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i man ngag las bsrub dang bsrubs pa chen pos rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i gnas nye bar bltas te/ yang na btsums pa dang phye ba la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor bas/ lte ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i 'od chen po'i bdag nyid gtum
197a4(rgyud 'grel): mo rab rgyas par las kyi rlung gis grogs byas te rang gi gnas su rang gi 'od kyis dga' ba dang mngon par dga' ba dga' ba dang bral bas 'bar ba dang/ myos pa dang chung zad g.yo pa rnam par g.yo ba dang/ khro ba chen pos shin tu 'bar
197a5(rgyud 'grel): par rmad du byung pa/ glog chen po'i g.yo ba'i rnam pa ltar sgra chen po sgrogs pa kho nas gsang ba'i lte ba'i gnas kyi dbus nas langs te/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phung po dang khams dang/ skye mched la sogs pa shin tu bsregs
197a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dang po dang dbus dang tha ma'i lam nas smin phrag gi 'khor lo'i lam o rgyan gyi tshigs rgyas par gser sgro'i dzA land+ha rar spyi gtsug gi mtshams su nang gi bu ga'i bde ba chen po'i gnas bdud rtsi'i gnas su 'jug go /der rang dga' 
197a7(rgyud 'grel): bas ngal so nas dga' ba'i 'od kyis bde ba chen po grub pa/ byang chub kyi sems shin tu khengs par gsol nas mngon par dga' ba'i nang gi reg bya las/ ro chen po 'ong pa'i dbang gis sngar bsregs pa yang rab tu tshim pa'i don du thugs rje chen
197b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i sprin rtag tu rgyun ma chad par bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char 'bab par byed do/ /de nas yang rten gyi rtsa'i 'khor lo 'dzin khyer te/ zhi ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i dga' ba'i dgyes pa'i yid kyis rlab pa dang longs spyod dang dbang gi nga rgyal gyis
197b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas su rjes su gshegs so/ /brlag pa dang longs spyod dang ngal so ba dang 'gro ba dang khengs pa dang bum pa dang dus dang tshe dang gnas skabs dang/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dang/ dbus la brten nas chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du bde ba
197b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i bdag nyid kyi gtum mo bskul bas go rims su rtsa'i 'khor lo shar ba'o/ /dz+nyA na b+hu ti'i zhal snga nas rtsa zhes bya ba'i dngos po med pa na/ bde ba chen po la sogs pa phyi nang gi reg bya nye bar mi rnyed de/ mi rnyed pa'i phyir dga' ba la sogs
197b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dang dbang gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi man ngag chad pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po mi shes pa'i phyir byang chub mi rnyed do zhes bshad do/ /de bas dpe'i slob dpon gyis rtsa'i 'khor lo spom phra la sogs pa'i bsam
197b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan spangs nas/ bla ma rje btsun gyis bka' stsal par bya zhes bshad do/ /dang po yan lag g.yas g.yon du longs spyod ma dang/ 'jigs ma dang/ 'khri ma dang/ gug ma dang/ sha pa rim dang/ ri bong ma dang/ bdud rtsi ma dang/ bad kan ma
197b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ri ma dang/ phung po ma dang/ 'dod ma dang/ chang 'tshong ma dang/ gos ma dang/ ser ma dang/ rkang gos ma dang/ phra mo dang/ tshim ma dang/ skar ma dang/ ri dags ma dang/ shin tu khengs ma dang/ lug ma dang/ khro ma dang/
197b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ma dang/ nag mo ma zhes pa dang/ chags pa dang/ 'jig pa dang/ mi dga' ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ snying rje dang/ sred pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ ngo tsha ba dang/ dge ba ma yin pa dang/ rang gi ngo bo min pa/ len
198a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sdud pa dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang/ yi gar mi 'ong ba dang/ rnam par chags pa dang/ nang dang/ khro bo dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ 'dzem pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ nga rgyal dang/ bstan
198a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ stobs te/ dpral ba dang/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ smin ma dang/ ske dang/ glo ba dang/ mjug do dang/ brla dang/ pus mo dang/ rje ngar dang/ rkang pa g.yas g.yon phyed phyed kyi cha'i grangs nyi shu rtsa bzhi
198a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dang/ khengs pa dang mchog dang chad pa'i shar ba'i rtsa rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi don no/ /dbus kyi rkeng rus kyi dbyug pa'i snying po'i nang/ rgan mo dang/ stag ma dang/ dpa' bo'i blo ma dang/ g.yo sgyu ma dang/ nges par
198a4(rgyud 'grel): sems ma dang/ dmar mo dang/ gshol ma dang/ ring ma dang/ bdud rtsi yon tan ma dang/ lam dga' ma dang/ 'khor lo'i kha ma dang/ rnam par sgeg ma'i nga rgyal ma dang/ 'od dang/ brtson pa dang/ phrag dog med pa dang
198a5(rgyud 'grel): mi brtan med pa dang/ btang snyoms dang/ gtong phod dang/ dga' ba dang/ g.yo sgyu med pa dang/ glu dang/ sgra dang/ gar dang/ btub pa la sogs pa kho na ste/ tshangs pa'i bu ga dang/ tshangs pa'i lte ba dang/ spyi bo dang/ rkan dang/ sko
198a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ snying ga dang/ lte ba dang/ 'doms dang/ gsang ba dang/ lte ba dang/ me'i pad+ma dang/ gzhang kha'i kun pa ka'i rang bzhin dga' ba 'byung ba'i rtsa gsum gyi dra ba'i sdom pa rten dang brten pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag du bde ba chen
198a7(rgyud 'grel): po khong du chud par byed pa/ 'od kyi bdag nyid can reg bya med pa/ ye shes kyi me'i nam mkha' i rang bzhin gtum mo 'am/ rtog med pa zhi ba'i rang gi ngo bo bde ba chen po'i pad+ma'i lte ba'i gyen du 'jig rten gyi khams du ma khyab pa/
198b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa/ stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo'i dbus thams cad kyi bdag nyid gcig pu'i ro'i rang bzhin/ dpal rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes man ngag las so/ /dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng pa las
198b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum na yod pa'i rtsa'i dra ba'i sdom pa dang gsum po chen mo'i sbyor ba rten dang brten pa'i ye shes kyi don bstan pa zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don rnam pa dang bcas
